SA16hvsatssu:572: mahākāruṇikatvāt bhavaduḥkhahṛdvacanena mahopāye na sattvānāmuddharaṇāya vyavasāyaduḥkhānyupādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:573: tathāgato mahākaruṇayā sattvānāmuddharaṇāya loke 'smin taptāyaḥpiṇḍavat kṣaṇamapyasahyaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaṃ kāyamupādāya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:574: bhagavān buddhaḥ subhāvitopākṣācittaḥ tadupekṣācittamupekṣya sadā mahākaruṇācittamācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:579: ātmano mahāhitaṃ prāpayati parāṃśca mahāhitaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:581: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ cittaparijñāne paramakuśalaḥ yathoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ sattvaparamārthasya suvijñaḥ kṛpāvān hitakārī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:586: yathoktamekottarāgame tathāgatavarge- svayamāha- ahaṃ puruṣasārathiḥ puruṣāvataṃsaḥ puruṣahastī śramaṇānāṃ paramo brāhmaṇānāmapyuttamaḥ āryāṇāmadhipo 'pramattacārī,
SA16hvsatssu:598: yathā vyavadāna sūtre śāriputrastathāgatasyābhimukhaṃ tathāgataguṇān stauti /
SA16hvsatssu:609_0: (u) tathāgataḥ svayaṃ pravacanaṃ praśaṃsati- mayā bhāṣito dharma ādau madhye 'vasāne
SA16hvsatssu:609_1: ca kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātamanulomakaṃ brahmacaryamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:611: jinaśāsanamakālikaṃ kalyāṇañca bālye yauvane vārdhakye ca kalyāṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:619: ādau madhye 'vasāne ca sarvadā viduṣāṃ kamanīyam,
SA16hvsatssu:621: nānyasūtravat rādau mahat madhye sūkṣmamavasāne sūkṣmataram /
SA16hvsatssu:636: [tadyathā] yo duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ yo vā duṣṭasvaraḥ śabdaḥ sa yajamānaṃ hinasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:646: santi kānicana anyāni sūtrāṇi ca deva[putra]bhāṣitāni /
SA16hvsatssu:650: yathoktaṃ vinaye- dharmo nāma yat buddhabhāṣitaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:651: śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ nirmitabhāṣitaṃ devabhāṣitaṃ vā saṃkṣipya yāni loke subhāṣitāni tāni sarvāṇi buddhabhāṣitāni /
SA16hvsatssu:668: tathāgatāt śrutastu samyagarthe nikṣiptaṃ yathārthaṃ vacanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:674: ayaṃ paryavadātadharma ucyate [yo] na sūtramātrānuyāyī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:675: santi ca jinaśāsanasya tisro dharmamudrāḥ- sarvamanātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:676: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā anityāḥ- śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:677: imā stisro dharmamudrāḥ sarvairapi vādibhirna śakyāḥ khaṇḍayitum /
SA16hvsatssu:686: atha tathāgataḥ svayaṃ svadharmaṃ stauti- mama dharmo nirodho nirvāṇagāmī samyak sambodhijanaka aupanāyika iti /
SA16hvsatssu:694: buddhāgama ucyate sarve saṃskṛtāḥ sādīnavā nāniśaṃsāsthānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:695: na tu yathā brāhmaṇāḥ brahmalokādīn praśaṃsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:698: tathāgatasya san dharmo nirvāṇāya bhavati ityataḥ samyaksambodhijanakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:706: buddha dharmaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ- svākhyāto [bhagavatā] sāndṛṣṭikaḥ akālikaḥ aupanāyika ehipaśyakaḥ pratyātmaṃ vedayitavyo vijñaiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:714: buddhadharmo dṛṣṭa eva loke vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:720: ataḥ sāndṛṣṭikaṃ pūjāsatkāraṃ prāpayan aurdhvavipākaṃ nirvāṇaśca prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:724: buddhadharmo na kañcana divasaṃ māsaṃ vatsaraṃ nakṣatraṃ vāpekṣya mārgo bhāvyate /
SA16hvsatssu:725: asmin divase māse vatsare va mārgo na bhāvyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:726: na brāhmaṇadharmavat vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta grīṣme rājanya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:735: baddhadharmaḥ svakāyena sākṣātkartavyo bhaviṣyati na parānuvartanena /
SA16hvsatssu:736: yathāvocadbhagavān- mā bhikṣavaḥ kevalaṃ mama pravacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
SA16hvsatssu:737: svayameva parīkṣadhvam ayaṃ dharma ācāritavyaḥ ayamanācaritavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:738: na yathā tīrthikā vadanti svaśiṣyān- praśnaprativacanaṃ mā kurudhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:745: upavāsādau paramamugdhāḥ śraddadhante vijñaiḥ sukhaṃ na vedyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:749: yathā kaścit rogānmuktaḥ adhyātmaṃ pravivekaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:751: kecit sadoṣaṃ dharmaṃ vadanti yathā khakkaṭalakṣaṇā pṛthivī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:752: kiṃ khakkaṭalakṣaṇam ityasya spṛṣṭvā vedayitavyam iti prativacanaṃ na vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:753: yathā jātyandho nīlapītalohitāvadātān na vyavahartuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:755: na sa buddhadharmasya paramārthaṃ vyavahartuṃ śankoti /
SA16hvsatssu:757: atha buddhadharma adhyātmamadhigantavyaḥ na dhanādivat svayamadhigamya parasmai pradātavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:758: yathā pārāyaṇa sūtre bhagavānāha- nāhaṃ [bhikṣava] ucchetsyāmi vaḥ kāṃkṣām /
SA16hvsatssu:763: pṛthagjanā avidyāparvatapraticchannā na śraddhadhanta imaṃ dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:771: laukikā hi bahavo dṛṣṭaphalaṃ paśryanto na jānanti tatkāraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:775: uttānacetanā laukikā buddhadharme na gabhīrasaṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:777: tṛṇamapi hetupratyayaiḥ sañcitaṃ parīkṣayituḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ gabhīraṃ vivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:778: yathā bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ pratītyasamutpādadharmo gahanaṃ vastu /
SA16hvsatssu:783: (u) kecidvā dino vadanti- nedaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:784: ānando mahān śrāvako dharmalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī kathaṃ vadiṣyati pratītyasamutpādadharma uttānaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:787: na hi sa karmakleśān suvivicya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:788: āditaḥ śikṣitasya vastunaḥ paryantaṃ labdhavato [vā] uttānakasaṃjñotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:796: tathāgate nānāhetupratyayadṛṣṭāntairarthaṃ prakāśayati sati subodhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:797: bālā api jānanti yathā sudā ya śrāmaṇerādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:798: buddhadharmaḥ sāravān sarvapravacaneṣu tattvārthaḥ pradhāno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:799: na yathā bhāratarāmāyaṇādīni tattvārthaṃ vinā kevalākhyānarūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:800: yathā vā rāghabrāhmaṇa āha- bhagavān bhikṣūn arthadharme paramārthadharme yogaṃ śikṣāpayati yadutāsravakṣaye / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:802: na brāhmaṇā iva brāhmaṇadharmaṃ vadanta ātmana eva bodhimanuprāpnuvanti;
SA16hvsatssu:825: yathā alaṅkaraṇāya puṣpāṇi vikīryante mālā vā dhriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:829: pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhoktasya dharmasya paścādgāthayopadiṣṭasyārthaḥ spaṣṭapratītaḥ śraddhādārḍhyakṛdbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:833: kecidāhu- śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ na kāvyapratirūpayā gāthayā racayitavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:838: yathāha sūtram- sarve lokāḥ supraṇītavacananirūktikā mama pravrajitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:843: yat sūtramaprativacanamavibhaṅgaṃ yathā catuḥpratisaṃ vidādisūtram tat sūtramityucyate sapraśnaprativacanaṃ sūtrantuyathocyate- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:850: yathā kaścit daridro vividhānyakuśalakarmāṇi kṛtvā durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:856: kintu saṅgīti kārā gabhīrasūtrārthān saṅgṛhyābhidharme prākṣipan /
SA16hvsatssu:857: yathā bāhyābhyantarasaṃyojanikaḥ puruṣaḥ sadā rātrāvarthaṃ vibhajate /
SA16hvsatssu:858: ityanena hetunā ayamarthaḥ saṃyojanaskandhe niveśitavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:865: dvividhāṃ gāthāṃ vihāyānyat gāthārahitaṃ sūtram udānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:869: tāni sūtranidānāni kadācit sūtra eva vartante anyatra vā vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:873: yathoktaṃ sūtre- viduṣāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ sakramaṃ sārthaṃ savibhaṅgamavikṣepakam /
SA16hvsatssu:881: tathāgato 'nāgataṃ vastu kathayannapi atītaṃ pratyutpannamupādāyaiva kathayatītyataḥ pṛthaṅ nocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:883_0: kecinna śraddadhante yanmahāmunaya upaśamābhiratā na vikṣepavighāte suprītikā laukikasaṃbhinnapralāpānnirviṇṇāḥ
SA16hvsatssu:884: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgasya pratilābhī puruṣo dvau māsāvatītya ekamakṣaramuccārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:887: yathoktaṃ- tathāgato vaipulyataḥ saṃkṣepataśca dvidhā dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:896: upadeśaḥ- mahākātyāyanādayo mahājñānino bhagavadbhāṣitaṃ suvistṛtaṃ vyabhajanta /
SA16hvsatssu:907: āhvanīyaṃ, prahvanīyaṃ dakṣiṇeyamañjalikaraṇīyamanuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ dāyakānāṃ hitakaram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:909: tathāgata śrāvakasaṅghaḥ aneḍakaṃ śīlaṃ dhārayan yāvadalpāparādhe 'pi paramatrāsaśaṅkī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:911: narakādibhyo 'pyabhītāḥ śīlaṃ saprayatnaṃ dhārayantaḥ kevalaṃ saddharmābhiratā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:929: yā sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayaṃ prāpayati na kevalaṃ vighnayati /
SA16hvsatssu:932: kṣīṇakleśānāṃ jñānaṃ bhavati yaduta kṣīṇā me jātiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:943: kṣetraṃ pañcavidhadhānyānyatiśayena saṃvardhayati na vināśaṃ gamayati /
SA16hvsatssu:944: tathā saṅghakṣetramapi aṣṭāṅgasamanvitamityato dāyakānāṃ guṇān vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:949: (u) caturvidhāḥ pratipattayañcaturvidhāḥ pratipannakāḥ śīlasamādhiprajñādiguṇāśca pariśuddhā ityataḥ saṅgha ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:952: srotaāpattipratipattau trayaḥ pudgalāḥ śraddhānusāripratipannako dharmānusāripratipannako 'nimittānusāripratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:954: yo 'labdhānātmaśūnyatājñāno bhagavacchāsane śraddadhāno bhagavadvacanamanusṛtya pratipanno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:956: yathoktaṃ sūtre ahamasmin vastuni śraddhayā pratipannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:958: labdhe tu tattvajñāne na śraddhāmātramanusṛtya pratipadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:959: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nāsti kārako nāsti śraddhālurityādi prajānan uttamapudgalo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:962: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo dharme kṣāntisukhaṃ prajñayā bhāvayati sa śraddhāpratipannakaḥ [yaḥ] pṛthagjanabhūmimatikrāntaḥ srotaāpattiphalañca nālabhata /
SA16hvsatssu:966: ayaṃ śrutacintāmayaprajñāyāṃ sthito dharmaṇāṃ kṣāntikāmasukhacittaṃ samyak bhāvayan anātmaśūnyatājñānamalabhamāno 'pi laukikaṃ dharmakṣāntyābhāsacittamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:971: sa krameṇa uṣmādidharmeṣu sthitau bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñāṃ labhamāno 'pi maulanāmnaiva śraddhānusārītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:973: asmāt sūtrāt vaktavyamavaśyaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ lapsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:974: na vaktavyaṃ jīvitānte na lapsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:977: yathogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṃgamyārocayanti- amuko 'rhan amuko 'rhatpratipannako yāvadamukaḥ śrotaāpannaḥ amukaḥ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:982: ayaṃ labdhānātmajñāna ūṣmamūrdhakṣāntyagradharmeṣusthito dharmamanusṛtya pratipadyate yadanātmaśūnyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:984: imau dvau pratipannakau satyadarśanamārgamavatārya nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata ityato 'nimittapratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:986: laukikamārge saṃyojanaprahāṇāt phalatrayapratipanna iti na prathāṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:989_1: sayojānanāṃ parikṣayāt srotaāpanno bhavati avinipātadharmā niyataḥ sambodhiparāyaṇaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:990: (pṛ) yaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sa satyadarśanaprahīṇakleśo 'tyantaparikṣīṇāpramāṇaduḥkhaḥ pṛthivīsama iti aupamyasūtramāha /
SA16hvsatssu:992: (u) idamuttaratra vakṣyate yaduta satyadṛṣṭikṣayādanye kṣīṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1002: yathā ca navanītādi saptadinaparamaṃ sevamānasya dhruvā glānirapi jarjaritā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004: yathā ca saptaphaṇasarpadaṣṭaḥ pudgalakāyaścaturbhūtabalāt saptapadāni gacchati nāṣṭamaṃ viṣabalādgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1014: ya ekaṃ dvau vā prahāya trīn caturaḥ pañca vā yāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1021: sa dve vā trīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvati saṃsarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1024: sakṛdāgāmī imaṃ lokaṃ sakṛdāgatya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1027: ayaṃ sakṛdāgāmī ihaiva vā janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1031: sa ihaiva vā janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1053: kaścidutpannaḥ san anāsravamārgeṣu prakṛtyā sthito 'bhisaṃskāramaprayujya parinirvāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1063: yo dvayostriṣu vāyataneṣu utpadya [parinirvāti] sa madhyamendriyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1073: yaḥ pūrvabhave srotaāpattiphalasakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptaḥ paścātpravṛttakāyena anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1075: dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyī ti paramatīkṣṇendriyo dṛṣṭa eva kāye nirvāṇaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1076: atha pudgalo dvividhaḥ śraddhāvimukto dṛṣṭiprāpta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1096: anurakṣaṇalakṣaṇa iti kiñcidviśiṣṭendriyatvāt yaḥ samādhimanurakṣati sa na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1099: mṛtalakṣaṇaḥ tato 'pi kiñcidviśiṣṭendriyo bhaveṣu paramaṃ nirviṇṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1103: sthitalakṣaṇa iti yaḥ samādhiṃ labdhvā na parākramate na ca parihīyate sa sthitalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1118: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- yo bhikṣavo macchrāvakaḥ śayane paryaṅke vā ahamahamikayā pratilabdhāt [āsrava]kṣayānna parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1121: pūrvoktā aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā navāśaikṣāśca [militvā] saptaviṃśati [pudgalāḥ] laukikaṃ sarvapuṇyakṣetram /
SA16hvsatssu:1133: śūnyalakṣaṇatvāt sarve rāgadveṣādayaḥ kleśā anutpannā nākuśalaṃ karmotpādayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1135: tairlabdhvā dhyānasamādhayaḥ sarve pariśuddhāḥ mahālpaiḥ kleśairviśaṃyuktatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1138: aṣṭakṣetraguṇasamanvitvāt saptavidha samādhipariṣkāraiḥ surakṣitatvāt saptāsrava sannirodhitvāt āsravairaduṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:1141: uktaṃ ca sūtre prasthānacitamātra eva kuśaladharmamācaritumabhilaṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:1145: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre yasmāddāyakād gṛhapateḥ śīlavato bhikṣuḥ satkāramādāya apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1146: sa dāyakto gṛhapatirapramāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1151: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātānmahataḥ puṇyasya pratilābhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1156: saṅghadānasya pratigrahītā pariśuddha ityatastaddānamapi avaśyaṃ pariśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:1162: (5) pariśuddhacitto bahuśo ['lpaśo vā] dadāti tathā deyaṃ caturvidham /
SA16hvsatssu:1163: saṅghasya dānamavaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā prasādhayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1170: yadyekasmin puruṣe utpannā śraddhā cittaṃ kadācit pariśodhayet kadācidvā prakampeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1173: kasmiṃścidutpannaḥ snehaḥ cittaṃ na gurukuryāt na pracīyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1174: saṅghe tūtpannā bhaktiḥ cittaṃ gurukuryāt apramāṇālambanatvāt cittaṃ pracīyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1182: idaṃ ratnatrayaṃ sarvasya lokasya prathamaṃ maṅgalam /
SA16hvsatssu:1183: yathoktaṃ maṅgalagāthāyām- buddho dharmaśca saṅgaśca etanmaṅgalamuttamam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1184: atha kānicitsūtrāṇi maṅgalādīni śaikṣāṇāmāyuryaśaḥprasaravardhanāni iti sūtrakartāro 'bhiprayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1201: bhagavato mahākaruṇācittena sarvalokānāṃ hitakaratvāt taddharmo 'pāryantikabādha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1203: bhagavadupadiṣṭaṃ śāstrantu cāturvargīyāṇāṃ sattvānāmātiryagjantūnāñca santārakaṃ bhavati iti nāsti pāryantikabādhā /
SA16hvsatssu:1213: bhagavadabhisandhimajānatāmupadiṣṭaṃ vṛtheti tat ātmanaḥ kleśāyaiva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1214: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvau puruṣau bhagavantaṃ nindataḥ eko 'śraddhādveṣābhyāṃ nindati,
SA16hvsatssu:1217: vidvānapi buddhābhisandhimanavabudhya buddhabhāṣitaṃ na vicārayituṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1221: sarve bhikṣavo nānāvidhāḥ parapravādino nālabhanta tathāgatāśayam /
SA16hvsatssu:1223: yathā ca kaścit mahāntaṃ vṛkṣaṃ chitvā atikramyaiva mūlamatikramyaiva skandhaṃ śākhāpalāśāni paryeṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1227: kiñca bhagavān śariputramapṛcchat ke śaikṣāḥ ke ca sāṅkhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1231: iti ānanda stathāgatamāmantyāha- abhisambodhisamadhigamāt pratilabdhe mārge hitaṃ bhavatītyatadapi yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1233: dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ samyak dṛṣṭirbhavati parato ghoṣāt yoniśaśca (SSS_39)
SA16hvsatssu:1236: yathā cāha bhagavān- yadi mayā kasyacit dharma upadiṣṭaḥ so 'pratilabdhamadabhisandhitvāt kalahāyate / iti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1240: ato jñātavyameva vādinaḥ tathāgatamapratipadyamānā yathārutamanuvartamānāḥ kalahāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1242: tadā bhagavān bhikṣūnabravīt- bhāvayathemamartha nānandopamitākāram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1243: sarve vādina āhuḥ- arhan agradakṣiṇīya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1246: [evam] annapāne sthūlavastunyeva na jānanti [yathāvat] kaḥ punarvādastathāgatenabhisandhāya bhāṣite sūkṣmadharme /
SA16hvsatssu:1253: jānantyapi ca vaktuśca vivakṣā yasya vastunaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1254: tatrāsti dvidhā mārga āryamārgo laukikamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1257: atha parapravāda sūtre 'pi bhagavān saṃśrāvayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:1259: (SSS_40) udāyibhikṣudharmadinnādibhibhikṣuṇībhiḥ kṛtaṃ bhagavacchāsanaṃ bhagavān śrutvā [tadeva punaḥ] śrāvayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:1262: evamanyaḥ “tathāgatamūlāḥ sarvadharmā” ityādi praśnaḥ sarvaḥ pratyuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1265: śāstre viracitte hi arthaḥ sugamaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1268: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānavocadbhikṣūn- yathāpraṇītaṃ śāstraṃ samyagdhārayata /
SA16hvsatssu:1270: ataḥ sūtrādarthamādāya śāstraṃ nikāyānta rātmanā pṛthak sthāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1272: kiñca bhagavān nānāsattvānāṃ santaraṇīyānāṃ kṛte lokādīni śāstramukhānyuktavān /
SA16hvsatssu:1274: svātyādayo bhikṣava āhuḥ- tadevedaṃ vijñānaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1284: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1290: āha ca- dīrgharātraṃ bhāvitacitto mṛta ūrdhvajanmabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1297: yathoktaṃ sūtre eṣu pañcasu skandheṣu nāstyātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1302: yathā bhagavān āha- skandhānāṃ santatyāsti saṃsāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1308: [yathā vā] mṛgā ramāteti snuṣāṃ māteti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1310: yathoktaṃ sūtre- jihvā rasaṃ vijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1311: jihvāvijñānaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti na tu jihvā /
SA16hvsatssu:1312: yathā śaktipratihataṃ puruṣaṃ prati vadanti puruṣo 'yaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1315: yathā vā daridraḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuriti vyapadiśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1317: kiñca bhagavān tīrthikānākārayati brāhmaṇāniti śramaṇāniti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1318: kṣatriyabrāhmaṇādaya iva buddho 'pi vyavahārataḥ pūjyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1325: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ mūlaṃ mahāsamudravat /
SA16hvsatssu:1326: yathāha sūtram- skandhāyatanadhātūnāṃ pratyayāḥ sāmagrīmātram na kārakaḥ nāpi vedakaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1328: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat laukikā vadanti sukhamiti [tat] āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1329: yat āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti [tat]laukikāḥ sukhaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1334: yatra rūpamityākhyāyate tatra yadatītaṃ yadanāgataṃ vartamānam sarvaṃ tat rūpamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1339: na tu sarvaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśasya hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1340: tṛṣṇasti cet avaśyaṃ sā vedanāmupādāyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1341: na tu sarvā vedanā tṛṣṇāyā hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1342: kadācit samagraheturucyate yathā sparśapratyayā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1343: kadācidasamagra heturucyate yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1349: iti ca caturbhirdhyānaiḥ prasrabdhimānapi na sukhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1352: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaścai- tyavandanāya pādāvutkṣipati sa āyuṣo 'nte deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1354: sūtrāntaramāha- anantaryasya kartā na deveṣūtpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1356: uktañca sūtre- kāmānāmanubhavitā nāpāpakaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1358: srotaāpannaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmānupabhuñjāno 'pi na durgatipatanīyaṃ karma karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1360: api coktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1362: yadi tadaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata (SSS_43) iti vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:1364: atha coktaṃ sūtre- śrotraṃ pratītya śabdañca śrotravijñānamutpadyate na cakṣurvijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1369: viniścitam- yathocyate- buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1372: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ [teṣāṃ]nirodho nirvāṇam ityādi mukhaṃ viniścitam /
SA16hvsatssu:1389: yathocyate- adbhuta mūlikā surabhipuṣpañca na vātarogapratikūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1393: kiñca vadanti tisro vedanā- duḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1398: āha ca- duḥkhamidaṃ trividhaṃ navaṃ purāṇaṃ madhyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1411: yathā ekavastukathane anyadapi vastu samalakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1415: yathā bhagavānā ha- ya udayavyayalakṣaṇadṛṣṭidvayaṃ na prajānāti sa sarvaḥ sarāgī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1421: yathocyate- annadānaṃ prayacchati pañca guṇān- āyuḥ varṇaṃ balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1426: api tu kārṣāpaṇamupādāya labdhamadyate ityataḥ kārṣāpaṇamadyata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1436: yathā vadanti- upacitadharmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1438: yathā vadanti- mūḍhaiḥ saha saṃvāso duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1445: yathāha saptāsravasūtram- tatra dvau vastuta āsravau,
SA16hvsatssu:1456: yathoktaṃ sūsre- dvau puruṣau staḥ jño 'jñaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1464: yathā vadanti- kaścinmuṇḍitakeśaśmaśruko dharmapaṭaṃ paridadhānaḥ parigṛhītabuddheryāpatho 'pi bhagavacchāsanād dūrībhūtaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1466: yastu śraddhendriyādisamanvāgataḥ sa gṛhastho 'pi aprākṛta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1467: yathoktaṃ sūtre- caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ kaścit saṅghasyeryāpathe 'vatīrṇaḥ na saṅghagaṇitaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1478: śraddhendriyalipsunā bhagavacchāsanaṃ śrutvā uddiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣamādāya yathāvaccaritavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1480: kiñcānena śāstreṇa dvividhaṃ hitaṃ bhavati ātmahitaṃ parahitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1487: ya ātmanā śīlādīn sampādayati na parān śīlādiṣu sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1490: yat kaścidātmahitāya pratipanno 'pi pareṣāñca dānādimahāphalaṃ sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1495: sa ātmanā dharmacaryāmanuvartamāno 'pi parārthamupadeśāt ātmano 'pi hitamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1496: yathoktaṃ sūtre- parasyadharmamupadiśan pañcavidhaṃ hitaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1498: tatra pravacanamātrasyottamaṃ hitaṃ bhavati yadyathoktamācarata āsravāḥ kṣīyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1502: atha sa puruṣa idānīṃ jyotiṣi sthitaḥ paścādapi jyotiḥ parāyaṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1503: laukikāḥ sarve bhūyasā tamastamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1504: yaḥ kaścid buddhaśāsanamācarati sa tamaso jyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1506: dānādīnācaran na [tādṛśaṃ] hitaṃ vindate yādṛśaṃ buddhadharmaṃ śṛṇvan [vindate] /
SA16hvsatssu:1507: yaścālpa[mapi] buddhapravacanaṃ śṛṇoti sa prativedhajñānalābhī san sarvakleśān bhaṅktvā apramāṇahitaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1508: yaktoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ- tamastamaḥparāyaṇaḥ tamojyotiḥparāyaṇaḥ jyotirjyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotistamaḥparāyaṇaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1509: kiñca caturvidhāḥ parāyaṇāḥ anussrotogāmī pratisrotogāmī sthitātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:1511: yaścittaikāgryeṇa bhagavaddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya saptabodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1514: punaścaturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sadābhavanimagnaḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhavānnirgatya punarnimagnaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1518: kaścit laukikaśraddhādīnutpādya na dṛḍhayati panaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1520: yaḥ śraddhādīnutpādya śubhāśubhaṃ vivecayati sa nirgamaparīkṣakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1522: yo bhagavaddharmasya samyagarthaṃ vetti sa naiva sadā nimagno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1525: sa ca guṇābhāvayitetyucyate yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati sa kiñcid duṣkarma kurvannapi durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1526: yastu bhāvayati kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ sa bahu duṣkarma kurvannapi na durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1528: kāyaṃ bhāvayan krameṇa śīlasamādhiprajñāskandhānutpādya karmāṇi prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1530: - uktañca sūtre caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- kecit agambhīratīkṣṇānuyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1535: samanantaro yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa sadāgatya cittaniviṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1537: caturtho yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa kaśmiṃñcitkāla āgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1538: sa yadi bhagavataḥ śāsane samyacchāsraṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1543: nāsti puṇyapāpaṃ [nāsti] karmaphalamiti mithyādṛṣṭau yaḥ patati saparāneva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1544: yaddānamācarati sa ātmānamapi vyābādhate parānapi vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1552: yathoktaṃ sūtre kathāsamprayogeṇa [pudgalo] veditavyo yadi vā kathyo yadi vākathya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1553: yo viduṣāṃ dharmaṃ pṛṣṭhaḥ sthānāsthāne na santiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1561: yathā nāthaputrādayaḥ svayaṃ vadanti asmākaṃ śāstā āptaḥ tadvacanamevānuvartāmaha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1575: ātmano vā mānasikī tuṣṭhiḥ āryapravacanadharmaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1576: tatra yo bhagavaddharma samyak jñātvā pravakti sa kathyo bhavati / nānye /
SA16hvsatssu:1579: vibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na vibhajya vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1580: pratipṛcchāvyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na patipṛcchya vyākaroti sthapanīyaṃ praśnaṃ na sthapayitvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1584: [tena] yathā buddho bhagavān [tathā] loke nāsti tatsama itīdṛśamanumānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1591: sthapanīyaḥ praśna iti yo dharmo 'bhūtarūpaḥ kintu prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:1593: kiṃ śāśvataḥ utāśāśvata ityādi yadi kaścit pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1597: kiñca santi caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sāvadyaḥ badyabahulaḥ alpāvadyaḥ anavadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1598: sāvadya iti yasya kevalamakuśalaṃ naiko 'pi kuśaladharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1605: bhagavacchāsanasya samyagarthavedī dvaividhyaṃ bhajate alpavadyo 'navadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1612: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāri saṅgrahavastūni- dānaṃ priyavacanamarthacaryā samānārthatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1626: tadā te sattvā na prakampyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1630: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dharmapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam na pudgalapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1631: yadyapi kaścidevaṃ vadet mayā bhagavataḥ sammukhāt śrutaṃ bhadantaśca sammukhādvā pūrvānte śrutamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1633: yadvacanantu sūtre 'vatīrṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇāviruddhaṃ vinayānuloimitañca tatpunarādeyaṃ syāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1641: anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti yo bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1643: anityatādijñānameva dharmalakṣaṇam dharmo 'yaṃ śaraṇīkartavyo na pudgalāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1644: dharmapratiśaraṇaṃ vadatā sarve dharmāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1645: ataḥ punarucyate nitārthasūtrapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na neyārthasūtrapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1647: yaducyate arthapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśareṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1648: yo 'yaṃ vyañjanārthaḥ sūtre 'vatīrṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvirodhī vinayānulomakaśca tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1660: uktañca sūtre- catvāri devamanuṣyāṇāṃ cakrāṇi śubhavardhakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1661: pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satparuṣopāśrayaḥ ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:1665: pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā nāma yat bādhiryamūkatādyabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1666: ātmanaḥ samyak praṇidhānaṃ nāma samyak darśanamidam /
SA16hvsatssu:1668: asya śāstrasyādhyetā cāsminnevāyuṣi satyaprativedhākhyaṃ mahāsārārthaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1669: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ sāradharmāḥ vacanasāraḥ samādhisāro darśanasāro vimuktisāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1672: sarve anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇamiti yadvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1675: imaṃ samādhimupādāya saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ ityādi bhāvanā samyagdarśanaprāpiṇī bhāvanāmayaprajñāparipūraṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1684: śrutasaddharmā san yoniśo manaskāramutpādya anityādinā dharmān samyagbhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1685: anayā bhāvanayā dharmānudharmaṃ pratipadyate yadutānāsravaṃ darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1692: śūnyatādarśanena kleśānāṃ viyogaṃ labhata iti tyāgādhiṣṭhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1694: kiñca bhagavacchāsanasya samyacchāstraṃ śrutavataścatvāri nirvāṇagāmini kuśalamūlāni aṅkurībhavanti yaduta ūṣmadharmo mūrdhadharmaḥ kṣāntidharmo laukikāgradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1695: anityādyākāreṇa pañcaskandhān bhāvayato 'varaṃ mṛdu nirvāṇagāmi kuśalamūlaṃ cittasyoṣmakaramutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1708: yastathāgatasya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa hānabhāgīyaṃ visaṃyujya trīṇi kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate //
SA16hvsatssu:1711: atha yastāthāgatadharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa catussatyāni savibhaṅgāni samprajānāti duḥkhasatyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1718: santi ca catasro vijñānasthitayo rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1721: santi ca catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedeja aupapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1725: catvāra āhārāḥ- kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ audārikaḥ sūkṣmo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1729: manaḥsañcetanāhāro yat kadācit puruṣāḥ sañcetanāpraṇidhānena jīvati /
SA16hvsatssu:1730: vijñānāhāraḥ antarābhavikanārakārūpyā nirodhasamāpattipraviṣṭhāḥ satvā adṛṣṭavijñānā api vijñānapratilambhe vartanta ityato vijñānāhārā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1740: ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni cakṣurādīni ṣaḍindriyāṇi vijñānasaṅgatāni sparśāyatanamityākhyāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1742: āsu sthitiṣu viparyayabalāt vijñānaṃ sābhirāmaṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1743: aṣṭau lokadharmāḥ- lābho 'lābho yaśo 'yaśo nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1748: sarve ca dharmāḥ pañcadhā vikalpyante- pañca skandhāḥ dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo dvādaśa nidānāni dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1751: yat cittaṃ strī puruṣaḥ śatrubandhurityādisaṃjñāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1753: śatrurbandhurmadhyastha iti yat puruṣaṃ vikalpayati tat tisro vedanā janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1755: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu yat trividhāḥ kleśā utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1757: eṣāṃ pravṛttyā kāyopādānānyupādatta iti pañcopādānaskandhā ityucyante /

SA16hvsatssu:2495: tacca karma phalasya hetuṃ kṛtvā niruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:2498: tathāgataśāsane asti vā nāsti vā iti sarvamupāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2505: cittasyotpādo nātmani niśrayata iti ca viśadam /
SA16hvsatssu:2508: tathāgataḥ prajānāti- karmaniruddhamapi phalasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2513: tasya ca karmaṇo nirodhe 'pi vipāko na praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2524: prākṛto jano mohādabhūtasmṛtyā pūrvagṛhītaṃ niyatalakṣaṇaṃ paścānniruddhamapi utpadyamāna[mivā]nusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:2529: bhavānāha- na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhiṃ labdhavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:2532: bhavān bravīti- adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2545: uktañca bhavatā- sūdīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:2558: bhagavānāha- sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanāni /
SA16hvsatssu:2560: pṛthivyādīni dravyāṇi saṃkhyādayo guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇādikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:2565: ākāśe [ca] padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2575: bhagavataḥ śāsana upāyatayā sarvamastīti vā sarvaṃ nāstīti vocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2588: āśvalāyanasūtre hi bhagavānāha- yadā pitarau sannipatitau bhavataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2591: vatsasūtrañcāha- yasmin samaye sattva imaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipati punaścittotpādanakāyamanupādāno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2595: uktañcasūtre- vyavakīrṇaṃ karmābhisaṃskṛtya vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2597: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- catvāro bhavāḥ pūrvakālabhavo maraṇabhavo 'ntarābhava upapattibhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2600: āha ca- yamarājo 'ntarābhave pāpinaḥ santarjya vyatyastaṃ pātayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2602: tathāgato 'ntarābhavamupādāya sattvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ prajānāti ayaṃ sattvo 'smin upapattisthāna utpadyate sa sattvastasminnupapattisthāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2603: uktañca sūtre- divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati sattvān cyavamānānupapadyamānāṃśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:2606: laukikā api astyantarābhava iti śraddhadhānā vadantimriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni asmādbhavāt [bhavāntaraṃ] krāmanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2610: imaṃ kāyaṃ visṛjya parakāyamanupādānasyāntarā vyucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2615: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā- āśvalāyanasūtra uktam astyantarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2618: yadyāryā na jānanti- ayaṃ kaḥ kuta āgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2625: anena brāhmaṇena kalpitam- anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2626: ata evaṃ prativakti- santyantarābhave pañcaskandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2628: sa kāmarūpadhātvorantarā kāyamupādāya tatra parinirvṛta iti antarāparinirvāyī /
SA16hvsatssu:2630: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścinmriyamāṇaḥ kutra gacchati kutrotpadyate kutra tiṣṭhati itīdamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2631: bhavānāha- vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2632: kāyamupādāyeti vacanaṃ loka utpadyata iti cedamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2633: catvāro bhavāḥ sapta bhavā iti ca bhavaduktaṃ sūtramayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:2647: bhavānāha- mriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavāntaraṃ krāmantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2653: pūrvanivāsajñāna uktaṃ jānāti ayaṃ puruṣo 'smiṃlloke mṛtastasmiṃlloka utpadyata iti na tūktam antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2663: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadimaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipan kāyāntaramupādatte tadahaṃ vadāmi upapattiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:2689: nahi pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ santatyotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2703: yathoktaṃ sūtre lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nāstitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2707: tasya virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dharmacakṣurbhavati / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:2708: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:2710: āsravakṣayasūtramāha jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2711: pratipattupratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ svayamajānato 'pi sadā bhāvitatvāt āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2712: (SSS_79) bhagavānāha satyeṣu udapadyata cakṣuḥ jñānaṃ vidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2715: sūtre ca bhagavān kaṇṭhata āha anupūrveṇa satyābhisamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2718: kleśānāñca catussatyeṣu caturdhā mithyācārā bhavanti yaduta nāsti dukhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:2723: yogī ca cittaṃ samādhāya idaṃ duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanigāminī patipat iti vikalpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:2724: yadyekasmin citte syāt kathamevamanupūrveṇa samādhivikalpo bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2729: bhavānāha lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nastitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2732: tathā cet ṣoḍaśabhiḥ cittakṣaṇaiḥ dvādaśabhirākāraiśca mārgo labhyata iti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2733: bhavatoktaṃ yatsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānato dharmacakṣurbhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2734: tathā cet cittadvayena mārgalābhaḥ syāt- adyaṃ samudayacittaṃ dvitīyaṃ nirodhacittaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2736: bhavānāha anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:2738: bhavatoktaṃ āsravakṣayasūtramāha rūpādīn jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravānāṃ kṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2741: bhagavān svayaṃ bravīti caturṣu satyeṣu jñānaṃ cakṣurvidyā prajñodapadyateti na bravīti anupūrveṇa ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇāni bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2742: (SSS_80) bhavatoktaṃ bhagavān kaṇṭhenāha- anupūrveṇa satyabhisamayaḥ śreṇyārohaṇavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2749: evaṃ ca ṣoḍaśabhireva cittakṣaṇairmārgalābha iti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2753: [yogino] na [nānā]satyāni bhavanti kintu ekameva satyaṃ bhavati yaduta duḥkhanirodhadarśanamādyābhisambodhi nāmakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2754: dṛśyadharmādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt yogī ūṣmagatādidharmānupūrveṇa caramanirodhasatyarūpaṃ satyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2760: (pṛ) kena kāraṇena parihīyate kena kāraṇena na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2762: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pañca hetavaḥ pañca pratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ parihāṇāya saṃvartante /
SA16hvsatssu:2770: āha ca sūtram dvividho 'rhan parihāṇalakṣaṇo 'parihāṇalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2771: api coktaṃ sūtre yadyamuko bhikṣuḥ vimuktimukhāt parihīyate tadidaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2773: kumbhopamaṃ kāyamidaṃ viditvā nagaropamaṃ cittamidaṃ sthāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:2774: yudhyeta māraṃ prajñāyudhena jitañca rakṣedaniveśanaḥ syāt // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2783: dapadyata ityādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ jñātavyaṃ parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2786: kecidvadanti āryamārgānna parihīyate dhyānasamādheḥ paraṃ parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2787: (pṛ) tathā cet arhan dvividho na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2792: yathā gaudhiko bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍvāraṃ [cetovimukteḥ] parihīṇaḥ asinā ātmānaṃ jaghāna /
SA16hvsatssu:2795: tathāgatāśāsane hi vimuktiḥ pradhānā na samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2797: tasmāt samādheḥ cyutasyānāsravaṃ cyavate na tu anāsravātparihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2800: kṣīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ na navo 'sti sambhavo viraktacittā āyatike bhave ca /
SA16hvsatssu:2801: te kṣīṇabījā aviruḍhacchandā nirvānti dhīrā yathāyaṃ pradīpaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2803: śailo yathā caikaghano vātena na samīryate /
SA16hvsatssu:2804: evaṃ nindāpraśaṃsāsu na samiñjanti paṇḍitāḥ / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2809: kiñcāha- āryasya kṣīyamāṇaḥ samudayo na punarbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2815: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye śaikṣā nirvāṇamārgaṃ paryeṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:2817: yeṣāmāsravāḥ kṣīṇāḥ na teṣāṃ punarāsravā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2819: kiñcāha- vidvāna kuśalabhāvanaḥ kuśalavāk kuśalakāyakarmāntaḥ karaṇīyānna cyavata iti / api cāha-
SA16hvsatssu:2831: āha ca- dharmān mithyābhāvayato bhikṣostraya āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2832: arhan punarna mithyābhāvayatīti na ta āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2833: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ya āryaprajñayā prajānāti na sa parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2835: kīñcārhan tisro vedanāḥ samyak prajānāti [tāsā]mutpādalakṣaṇaṃ nirodhalakṣaṇamāsvādalakṣaṇaṃ mārgalakṣaṇaṃ nissaraṇalakṣaṇañcetyato notpādayati saṃyojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:2836: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyai stribhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2840: yathoktaṃ sūtre- satyavihārī āryo naiva parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2844: kiñcārhan akopyāṃ [ceto]vimuktiṃ sākṣātkṛtatvān ityato na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2845: arhan tathāgataśāsane sāramarthaṃ pratilabdhavān yadutākopyā cetovimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2846: kasyacit karacchedavat tatsmaraṇe 'smaraṇe ca sadā karacchedo 'styeva /
SA16hvsatssu:2849: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- śraddhādināmindriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt arhan bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2852: tadyathā dahano 'dagdhaṃ dahati dagdhvā ca napunastatra pratyāvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:2853: evaṃ bhikṣuḥ ekā daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgata ityato na kadāpi parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2854: (pṛ) dvividho 'rhan iti bhavatodāhṛtasūtramāha- asti aparihāṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2859: jinaścet punarutpannaḥ syāt ucyate na tu so jinaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:2860: jino bhūtvā na jāyet tātvikaḥ sa jino mataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2861: yo 'rhan punaḥ kleśānutpādayati na sa jino bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2862: arhataḥ kṣīṇajātitvāt na punaḥ kāyo vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2863: bhavataḥ sūtraṃ yadyapyāha- arhan parihāṇadharmā punaḥ parihīyeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2878: kleśā hi sadā cittena saha saṃprayogajāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2885: yaḥ kleśaḥ sahajo bhavati na sa āgantuka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2890: cittamidaṃ tatkāla eva niruddhaṃ na malanimittavat bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2891: cittaṃ tatkāla eva vinaṣṭaṃ kena malena lipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2900: kintu tathāgataḥ cittaṃ nityaṃ sthāyīti vadatāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛta āha āgantukamalakliṣṭaṃ sat cittamapariśuddhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2901: kiñca kusīdasattvā ye śṛṇvanti cittaṃ prakṛtito 'pariśuddhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2903: na te cittavyavadānamārabheran ityataḥ tathāgata āha prakṛtipariśuddhamiti //
SA16hvsatssu:2915: bhavatāṃ śāsane yadyapyucyate cittaviprayukto 'nuśayaḥ cittasamprayuktasaṃyojanaparyavasthānasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2918: uktaṃ hi sūtre- avidyāyoniśomanaskāramithyāsaṅkalpādibhyo rāgādīni saṃyojanani prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2920: yadyapi bhavatāṃ śāsana uktaṃ- cirābhyastasaṃyojanaparyavasthāpako 'nuśayo nāma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2926: yujyata iti cet sarve 'pi dharmāḥ pratyutpanna hetorupadyeran nātītahetoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2927: tathā ca na karmajo vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2929: anuśayānāmeṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt kathaṃ punaste janakahetavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2938: śāstramāha- kāśyapīyā vadanti ananubhūtavipākaṃ karma atīte 'dhvani asti /
SA16hvsatssu:2949: yathā payo nirodhe daghno hetukṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:2961: śāstramāha- mahīśāsakā vadanti tathāgata saṅghavartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2963: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ catasṛṣu pariṣatsu antargataḥ yaduta sattvapariṣat prāṇipariṣat manuṣyapariṣat āryapariṣat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2965: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakapariṣadi antargata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2969: (pṛ) saṅghārāmāgragasya tathāgatasya dāyakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṅghadāyaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2974: (pṛ) bhagavān gautamīmavocat- imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghe dehi /
SA16hvsatssu:2975: tadā ahamapi pūjito bhaviṣyāmi saṅgho 'pi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:2978: yathoktaṃ sūtre yo rogaprekṣī sa māṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2985: ato jñāyate na bhagavān saṅgāntargata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2986: kiñca bhagavān na saṅghakarmapraviṣṭaḥ nāpi anyasaṅghavastusamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2990: śāstramāha- vātsīputrīyā vadanti asti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2995: yathā bahuṣu sūtreṣu tathāgato bhikṣūnāha- nāmamātrataḥ prajñaptimātrata upayogamātrataḥ pudgala ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2997: nāmamātrata ityādinā jñāyate na paramārtha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2999: yo na paśyati duḥkhañca sa ātmānantu paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:3000: duḥkhadarśī yathābhūtaṃ sa ātmānaṃ na paśyati // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3004: api ca sūtre bhagavānavocat- yatrāsmīti tatreñjitam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3005: yadvastu sat na tatreñjitaṃ bhavati yathā cakṣuḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:3007: tatra tatra sūtre ca ātmavādaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3010: kiṃ nu satveti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:3018: nāstyātmā na cātmīyaṃ na sattvo nāpi mānavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3036: bimbisārapratyudgamanasūtre bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- vibhāvayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ prākṛtānāṃ prajñaptimanurudhya vadāmi astyātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:3039: kiñcāha- pañcaskandhānupādāyāsti nānāvidhaṃ nāma yaduta ātmā sattvo mānavo deva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3043: sthavirapūrṇakaḥ kaścit tīrthikaḥ āha- yadi puruṣo mithyādṛṣṭayā asantamastīti vadati /
SA16hvsatssu:3046: yamakasūtre śāriputro yamakamavocat- kiṃ yamaka samanupaśyasi rūpaskandho 'rhan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3048: kiṃ samanupaśyasi vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamarhan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3054: yadevaṃ parimṛgya [dṛṣṭa eva dharme satyataḥ sthirataḥ] nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3055: tatkalyaṃ nu te vyākaraṇaṃ arhan [kāyasya bhedāducchidyate vinaśyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:3056: abhūtkhalu me [āyuṣman] śāriputra pūrvaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam,
SA16hvsatssu:3057: idaṃ punarāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā tacca pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prahīṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:3064: uktañcaśreṇikasūtre- trayāṇāṃ śāstṝṇāṃ yo nopalabhate pratyutpannamātmānamūrdhvabhāvinaṃ vātmānaṃ tamahaṃ śāstāraṃ buddhaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3067: yadi mataṃ satyātmani ātmeti saṃjñā na viparyāsa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3088: astyekāntata ātmeti yo vadati sa ṣaṇṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnīmanyatamasyāmanupatati /
SA16hvsatssu:3094: paramārthatastu astyātmeti brūvato hi doṣo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3098: api cātmadṛṣṭimūloddharaṇāyāha bhagavān yathā mogharāja [māṇava]pṛcchāyāṃ bhagavān mogharājaṃ pratyāha-
SA16hvsatssu:3101: evaṃ lokamavekṣantaṃ] mṛtyurājo na paśyati // iti
SA16hvsatssu:3107: kasmāt caturṣu vyākaraṇeṣu caturtha sthapanīyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yaduta bhavati puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] bhavati ca na bhavati ca [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt],
SA16hvsatssu:3108: naiva bhavati na na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:3115: tatra bhagavānevamāha- tasmin samaye ahameva mahāsudarśano rājā evaṃkāya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3116: pūrvakebhya utpannā idānīntanāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ na tu purāṇā eva /
SA16hvsatssu:3119: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛtapuṇyo ubhayanna nandati / iti /

SA16hvsatssu:3236: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:3302: savijñānānāṃ skandhānāṃ santatyā samudācāre sati asti karma asti vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3304: tasmāt pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmā ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3313: (u) satyaṃ nāma catvāri [ārya]satyāni yaduta duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī patipat /
SA16hvsatssu:3319: tathāgataḥ svayamimaṃ dharmaṃ sādhayannapi sattvānāṃ tāraṇāya tatra tatra viprakīrṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:3330: rūpaskandho yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya dharmāśca /

SA16hvsatssu:3354: (u) yatkiñcit tatsarvamiti vadan rūpalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhārayati nānyadastīti /

SA16hvsatssu:3364: (pṛ) kasmāt pṛthivyādaya eva rūpaṃ na śabdaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:3396: kecidvadanti rūpādi vihāyāsti mahābhūtam iti yathā vaiśeṣikādīnām /

SA16hvsatssu:3417: kiñcāha- ahamimāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ dagdhvā vidhūmaṃ bhasmasātkariṣyāmīti /

SA16hvsatssu:3443: (SSS_101) tattu sāśrayayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakamiti na tathāgataśāsanaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:3446: khakkhaṭādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ kimarthā bhavantiiti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā bhavati iti prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3448: ato jñāyate catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3457: khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ snehalakṣaṇo 'bdhātuḥ ūṣmalakṣaṇastejodhātuḥ īraṇalakṣaṇo vāyudhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3459: rūpādi bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyate /

SA16hvsatssu:3465: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭaṃ vastudharmaḥ kharagataṃ prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3474: sūtre cāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi [māṃsa]piṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī /

SA16hvsatssu:3494: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti /

SA16hvsatssu:3515: laukikāḥ sarve śraddadhante yāvadaṣṭaguṇā āpa iti yadbhavato vacanaṃ tat vyavahārānuvartanamātrato vadanti na dravyamahābhūtā [nuvartana]taḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3516: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- upādāyadharmāḥ sarve prajñaptyātmakā iti /

SA16hvsatssu:3521: bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣu[rbhikṣo] catvāri mahāmūtānyupādāya rūpaprasāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3525: dharme dharmo vartata iti mātraṃ vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3526: yadbhavānāha- khakkhaṭādayaḥ kimarthā bhavantīti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā iti bhavanti iti prāpyate iti /

SA16hvsatssu:3559: yathā kalpāvasāne kalpādau ca mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:3571: utkaṭakarmabalastu na bāhyapratyayamapekṣate tathā dharmā api syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3578: kenārthena khakkhaṭādito rūpādirutpadyate na rūpāditaḥ khakkhaṭādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3584: na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe hetū iti /

SA16hvsatssu:3590: rūpameva prakāśa iti na pradīpaḥ pṛthagbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3600: yathā sapratidhe vijñānasya cakṣūrūpaṃ hetupratyayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3604: pūrvaniruddhaṃ cittaṃ hetuḥ iti kathaṃ yugapajjāyamānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3605: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3606: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3617: (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3618: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3620: rūpādayo jāyante na caturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /

SA16hvsatssu:3622: khakkhaṭādinā catvāri mahābhūtāni nirūpyanta iti yadavocadbhavān /
SA16hvsatssu:3626: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:3635: yathoktaṃ sūtre- khakkhaṭā[di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā nirdiśyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3636: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭagatadharmaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3641: saṃjñākriyāyai yat kiñcan khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sarvaṃ tat pṛthividhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3651: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti- paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya chettāraṃ puruṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3659: kiñca tathāgate tejovatī samādhimupasampanne tatkāyā dvividhāni jvālārūpāṇi niścaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:3664: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi kāye 'smin nakhalomakeśādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3667: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā] māpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3668: tatra kiṃ pṛthivīdhātuḥ yaduta prajñaptitaḥ kṣetram,
SA16hvsatssu:3671: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro 'pi nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3674: mahābhūtāni tu dravyataśca prajñaptitaśca santīdaṃ mithyāśāstram /
SA16hvsatssu:3675: ṣaḍdhātu sūtre ca bhagavānāha- keśalomanakhādīni pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3676: hastipadopamasūtre coktam- keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3680: yadavādīḥ bhagavānāha- yaccakṣurmāsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3681: vacanenānena bhagavān pradarśayati pañcendriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3684: kecidvadanti indriyāṇi nānāsvabhāvajāni yaduta pṛthivīmahābhūtāt sambhūtaṃ ghrāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3685: tatpratyākhyānāya bhagavānāha- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi caturmahābhūtasamavāyātmakāni śūnyānyavastūni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3688: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3693: pṛthivyādīnāṃ khakkhaṭagatadharmādayo viśiṣṭāḥ vāyostu na tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:3695: yadavādīḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktuḥ tanmahābhūtalakṣaṇāni vinirbhaktāni syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3699: yo dharmo lakṣaṇādanya na sa āśrayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3703: (u) āśraya iti saṃjñāyate nānyadvastu lakṣaṇasyāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3709: yathā ātape kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ sparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3710: candrikāyāṃ kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ śītasparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3731: ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni na vinirbhāgalābhina iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3734: (u) tathā cet vāyau kadācidgandho 'stīti gandho vāyugataḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3746: evaṃ kiṃ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpena yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni sahajātāni apṛthagbhāgavartīnīti //
SA16hvsatssu:3750: pūrvaṃ yadavādīḥ- na vayaṃ brūmaḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānekāni ityato 'navadyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3753: tīrthikāḥ sarve siṣādhayiṣantītyata ścaturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmekatvanānātve udāharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3754: ato bhagavān prajñaptau catarṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmudāhṛtatvāt teṣāmarthamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:3756: laukikāḥ svabhāvataḥ pṛthivyādimahābhūtāni jānanto 'pi na vidanti [teṣāṃ] vastubhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:3761: asti dvidhā āśrayārtha ityuktvā mahābhūtāni dravyāṇīti yadavocaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3764: [aṣṭaguṇā āpa iti] vyavahārānuvartanato vadanti na tu dravyamahābhūtā[nuvartana]ta iti yadvacanaṃ tadayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:3766: yadi vā pravacane yadi vā loke na hetupratyayairvinā rūpādiṣu caturmahābhūta saṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3768: rūpādiṣu hi puruṣa iti saṃjñā na hetupratyayairvinā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3769: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so 'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:3772: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3779: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:3782: evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3784: yadavocaḥ- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3786: yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:3787: tathā mama śāsane 'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam /
SA16hvsatssu:3790: yadavādīḥ- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhautiko rūpaprasādaḥ cakṣuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3795: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:3796: [tatra yo dharmaḥ] sa evāśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:3807: (pṛ) yadāha bhavān- khakkhaṭabahulo rūpādi [samavāyaḥ] pṛthivīmahābhūtamityataḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3812: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3819: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:3829: anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi //
SA16hvsatssu:3833: yadyapyāha bhavān- yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduriti (1) /
SA16hvsatssu:3837: bahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā mṛtpiṇḍa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3840: mama saṃśliṣṭasaṃṅghātāṇuṣu idaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ labhyata iti asti khakkhaṭatā /
SA16hvsatssu:3847: upalabhyante kilāsmābhiḥ ekasminneva dharme bahavaḥ sparśāḥ khakkhaṭo 'pi mṛdurapīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3848: yadapyuktam- khakkhaṭatā mṛdutā cānyonyamapekṣata iti nāsti niyateti (4)
SA16hvsatssu:3861: yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3862: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3889: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3892: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati /
SA16hvsatssu:3893: yathāha sūtram- caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3900: (pṛ) abhidharma uktam- apāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sneha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3907: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:3926: (u) karmeti kevalaṃ lokasatyato vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:3931: yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru /
SA16hvsatssu:3947: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3950: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3953: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3956: ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:3966: gurulaghutvavikalpo 'vaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇeṣyata ityato na gururlaghuḥ rūpādisaṅghātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3967: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3968: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi /
SA16hvsatssu:3975: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3976: (u) yathā parihitavastraḥ puruṣo 'spṛṣṭo 'pi jñāyate [ayaṃ] balavān abalavān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3987_0: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:3987_1: styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā
SA16hvsatssu:3995: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3997: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā rūpādisaṅghātavikalpakriyayā /
SA16hvsatssu:4016: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4019: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:4032: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:4034: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:4039: (u) śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4043: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso 'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4045: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:4048: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4057: sattve 'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4060: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:4067: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4071: bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha /
SA16hvsatssu:4072: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ [iti]khakkhaṭādīnāṃ vikalpe 'pi nāsti kaścanopakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4076: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4082: bhagavān pratyāha- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4086: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4091: pañcendriyāṇi caturmahābhūtamayānīti parididṛkṣayā bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣurbhikṣo [ādhyātmikamāyatana] catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4092: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:4099: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4101: bhagavān prāha- cakṣurādīnindriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavantītyato 'yaṃ bhikṣurjānāti adravyasan cakṣurdharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4103: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4104: yathā prajñayā aprapañcayitā vadati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti /
SA16hvsatssu:4108: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4111: vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4126: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4134: (u) na yujyata [idam] yathā prasādamupādāya āpaḥ sphaṭikam /
SA16hvsatssu:4135: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva /
SA16hvsatssu:4141: na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4167: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4172: dharmatā ca tathā- ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4173: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4175: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4178: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4184: cittadharmaśca tathā syāt- yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4203: yathoktaṃ sūtre- manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4220: yathokta sūtre- paṭaṃ datvā rūpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:4231: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4246: yathā vadanti- annaṃ datvā pañcavastu- vipākān labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4255: yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:4268: yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4270: ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti /
SA16hvsatssu:4275: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4279: yadbhavānavādīḥ- cakṣuḥ saprabhatvāt sudūraṃ rūpaṃ patihantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4290: upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4300: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:4304: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4318: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4327: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4334: bhavato hṛdayam- yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4339: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4344: bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4348: tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4349: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4358: yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4359: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:4364: uktañca sūtre- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4370: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4371: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4375: (pṛ) āha ca- mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti /
SA16hvsatssu:4388: kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti- cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4391: āha ca bhagavān- paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4392: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati /
SA16hvsatssu:4399: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4400: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4401: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4403: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4404: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4422: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4423: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4424: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4425: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4428: yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo 'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4433: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4434: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4436: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4439: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4440: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4441: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4442: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4443: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4444: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4446: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4450: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4454: tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge 'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4463: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4471: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4475: eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4484: yadbhavānavādīḥ- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā cakṣurmyāṃ dṛśyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4486: laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4490: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4492: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa]rasaṃ vettīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4493: tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4494: ata āha- jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4495: yadbhavānavādīḥ- indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4498: na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4512: idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4521: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4522: śrotrādivijñānaṃ dvividham- kiñcitprāpya vijānāti kiñcidaprāpya vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4527: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4542: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4547: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam /
SA16hvsatssu:4553: bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4557: viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4567: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4568: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4573: aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4574: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:4575: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4577: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4590: śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4599: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4600: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4607: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4611: yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4620: rūpadarśane 'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4642: tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4646: (pṛ) rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4673: yathā bhavataścakṣū rūpaṃ prāpyāpi kadācitpaśyati kadācinna paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4674: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ prāpya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ paśyati na tu sūryakarma /
SA16hvsatssu:4684: kasmād dūrasthaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi karma na paśyati tat pāṭaliputrādi āsannaṃ janapadanagaram /
SA16hvsatssu:4685: yadi bhavān manyate pāṭaliputrādi na ābhāsagatamityato na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4686: mama cakṣuraprāpyāpi rūpaṃ nābhāsāgatamityato na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4690: rūpasyābhibhāvakaviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā rātrau tejo dṛśyamanyadadṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4691: bhūmiviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā prathamadhyānagatacakṣuṣā dvitīyadhyānagataṃ rūpaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4692: tama āvāvaraṇānna dṛśyate yathā tamasi ghaṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4698: aprāptyā na dṛśyate yathā prabhāgatā aṇavoḥ dṛśyāḥ prabhābāhyāstu adṛśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4699: saukṣmyānna dṛśyate yathā puruṣākāraḥ sthāṇurna vivektuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4705: yat vātopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat viparyastaṃ nīlakṛṣṇādirūpaṃ paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:4710: yat parikhedopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4722: (pṛ) pañca viṣayāḥ jñānābhāsagatatvāt jñeyā bhavantīti jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:4724: (u) ūrdhvabhūmikatvānna jñāyate yathā prathamadhyānacittaṃ dvitīyadhyānatadūrdhvadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4725: indriyaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā mandendriyasya cittaṃ tīkṣṇendriyasya cittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4726: puruṣaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā śrotraāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāminaścittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4727: balaprabhedānna jñāyate yathā yanmanovijñānaṃ yasmin dharme balavihīnaṃ na tena manovijñānena sa dharmo jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4729: manovijñānavijñeyadharmo na vikṣiptacittakamanovijñānena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4730: yathā pratyekabuddhamanovijñānabalavijñeyadharmo na śrāvakamano[vijñāna]balena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4736: yathā janāḥ saṃsāre pūrvānubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ smaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:4738: āryāstu yadi vānubhūtaṃ yadivānanubhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryajñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4739: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt jñāyate yathā rūpadhātukacittamanubhūya kāmadhātukadharmān vijānānti /
SA16hvsatssu:4740: viparyayāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā satkāyadṛṣṭikacittaṃ pañcaskandhālambanaṃ nairātmyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4742: balāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā mṛdvindriyaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇendriyasya cittamāvṛtatayā na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4745: (u) vikṣepaviparyayabhūtāveśā mānamadacittapramoṣā madyena vā auṣadhavyāmohena vā cittavibhramaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:4753: tasmādyadyaprāpya paśyati kasmānna sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatīti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:4761: pratyutpanneṣu jñānamutpadyata iti yadavādīḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ vijñānamapi pratyutpannamātraṃ jñāpayet paracittajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:4763: tat ṣaṣṭhamanaindriyeṇa pratyuktameva yaduta indriyaviṣayavijñānānugamakālaḥ sannipāta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4764: pratītya mano dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata itīdaṃ vacanañca tadā vyarthaṃ syāt prāptyabhāvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4771: yadavādīḥ viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śabdaḥ śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4775: yathā bhavānāha viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe bhāṣamāṇe śabdāt śabdasantatyā tanurbhūtvā na punarudbhavatītyato na śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4778: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmirgatvāpi sūryamaṇḍalamātraṃ paśyati na sūryasya karma /
SA16hvsatssu:4781: śabda audārikaḥ san śrūyate sūkṣmastu na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4782: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmiḥ sudūraṃ gacchannapi na śatasahasrāyutayojanāni prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4783: prasannasalilādyāvṛtaṃ suṣṭhu paśyannapi bhittyādyāvṛtaṃ tu na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4790: tadā tu na kaścitpratikūle vāyau śṛṇotīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4792: tadā śabdo 'pi pratikūlavāyau na kiñcidapi na śrotavyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4798: yadavocaḥ śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyata ityataḥ prāptipakṣe na rūpasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4813: idānīṃ śabde kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śabdāntaraṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4825: evaṃ ghaṇṭātaḥ śabda [udgate] sati ghaṇṭā niśśabdā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4827: ato jñāyate śabdo ghaṇṭāyāṃ vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4830: yadi śabdo ghaṇṭāmāśrito ghaṇṭātaścāpi viyujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4834: dṛṣṭe vyavahāre ca nāsti kiñcit yathā ghaṇṭāsantatirutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4835: śabdasya cāsti digbhāgabhedo yaduta prācīśabdaḥ karṇadeśaṃ prāpnoti tadā na syāt ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4843: tathā no cet viddhaśabda iti nocyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4844: yaḥ śabdo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sannikṛṣṭaśca tau yugapat śrūyetām /
SA16hvsatssu:4846: na hi paśyāmaḥ kṣaṇikadharmaḥ kasyacijjanaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4851: ekañca na karma karmotpādakamiti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4852: bhavatāṃ śāsane śabdaḥ śabdāntareṇa viruddhaḥ pṛthak,
SA16hvsatssu:4864: (u) paśyasi khalu saṃyoga ekaḥ san yaṃ śabdamutpādayati [so] 'pi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4867: evañca dravyaṃ pañcasvabhāvaṃ trisvabhāvaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4874: evaṃ śabdo 'pi karagṛhīte khaḍge śabdaḥ spandena sahoparamati /
SA16hvsatssu:4877: yathā kalpayasi ādyakarmaṇaḥ saṃskāra uttarottarakarmotpādaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4885: pūrvaṃ karmaṇi niruddhe hi tadanantaraṃ dravyamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4897: kiṃ yathā khalu viṣaṃ viṣauṣadhena viruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:4899: tathā no cet ghaṇṭā na śabdadvayavatīti [na] syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4905: tathā no cet ekasminneva kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4908: yadi śabdāt śabdāntaramutpadyate tadā na hetumanuvarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:4922: tasya rūpamupādāya jala ādarśe rūpamutpannaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4923: evaṃ jale candra ādarśe pratibimbameva rūpaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:4924: tathā ca vaiśeṣikasūtraṃ sarvaṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4930: khaḍgavaṃśādīnāmavayaveṣu mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭeṣu vibhajyamāneṣu ca mitho nodanācchabdo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4931: na ca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ saṃyogācchabdo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4936: kevalaṃ caturṣu mahābhūteṣu saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu vā śabda utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4941: (pṛ) yadyāha bhavān- gandho nāsikāṃ prāpto jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4946: yadi manyase yat asmādgandhāt santatyā gandhakāraṇamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4951: yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti kusumāvayavasya rūpamapi draṣṭavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4958: (u) yatra sūkṣmāvayavarūpaṃ [tatra] tadgandho jighrayata iti pratyakṣadṛṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:4971: yathā ekapalaṃ kuṅkuma[kusumaṃ] sadā sagandhaṃ gatvāpi sadaikapalam /
SA16hvsatssu:4973: yathā jalaghaṭa ekabindvapagame tatkṣayo na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4988: nāpi vāyuḥ kusumasya gandhaṃ boḍhvā gamayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4990: tadupādāya gandhavāyuḥ tataḥ samutpanno gandhavāyurnāsikāṃ prāpya jighryate /
SA16hvsatssu:5000: sa kusumagandhaḥ kusume niṣpīḍite vā niṣpiṣṭe vā saṃparitāpite vā kṣīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5006: sa ca gandho dīrghakālaṃ tile vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:5011: (u) ayaṃ tilagandhaḥ kusumamupādāya samutpanno na tilādviyujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5027: tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadudakāvayavā stejovayavā eva vā vāyumanugacchanti,
SA16hvsatssu:5029: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtram- trayaḥ sparśā sparśakāyā vā na pṛthivyudakatejasāmityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5030: anena vacanena trividhāḥ sparśā vāyau kadācidāgantukā vānāgantukā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5034: bhavato mataṃ yat dṛṣṭa udake tejasi śītoṣṇaspaśau staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5037: evaṃ dṛṣṭapṛthivyāmanuṣṇāśītasparśo 'stīti so 'pi vāyvayavīyo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5041: kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ vāyusparśamātra manuṣṇāśītaṃ na tu pṛthivyavayava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5042: vayamapi vadāmo rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivyāmeva santi nābādiṣu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5043: yat bhavatāṃ matam- yat dṛṣṭeṣu abādiṣu rūpādikamastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5044: tat pṛthivīyogād dṛśyate na tu tat tatrāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:5050: tadā sambhavati vaktum idaṃ rūpamabīyaṃ na pārthivamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5063: yatra nāsti tatra gandhamupādāya gandha utpadyate ityasya ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5064: yadavādīḥ pūrvaṃ gandho dūrāt jighryata ityaprāptyā syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:5072: ato jñāyate aprāpya na jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5089: tathāpi tattejo vartate iti sparśātt jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5091: bhavatāṃ sūtre nāstyarūpaṃ teja ityayameva doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5103: yathā vā jvarārtasya puruṣasya tejaḥ kāyaniśritamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:5116: kiñca mano gacchatīti kiṃ jñātvā gacchet /
SA16hvsatssu:5124: yat cittaṃ manyate śrotraṃ gamiṣyāmīti tacchrotasmaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:5130: yaḥ pumān pūrvaṃ nagarādīn dṛṣṭavān sa idānīṃ pūrvamanurudhya smarati na jānāti pratyutpannān /
SA16hvsatssu:5136: yo dharmo gacchati sontarāle sarvān viṣayān jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5137: yathā kaścitsañcaran madhyemārgaṃ rūpādīn padārthān jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5139: yathā cittamasadapi jānāti yadutātītamanāgataṃ śagaśṛṅgaṃ kūrmaromāhipādaṃ vāyurūpaṃ lohitalavaṇagandhamityādīni [sarvāṇya]pijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5167: tā vedanā stistraḥ- duḥkhāḥ vā sukhā vā aduḥkhāsukhā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:5177: ālambanaṃ vijñānasaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa vijñānamityucyate ato na gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:5184: yathā kaścitsvapne pibati naiba tat tṛṣṇāmapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5187: cittaṃ dṛṣṭe śrute mate jñāte dharmamātre vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:5189: yadi gamanena prāpnoti tadā dharmāntaramapi jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5215: (pṛ) yadyuktaṃ sūtre- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādāḥ pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5220: bhagavān kāṃkṣāvataḥ svaśiṣyān pratyāha- karmajāni pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5226: ato bhagavānāha- indriyāṇi rūpīṇi rūpādīnupādāya siddhānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5227: kadācidyāni rūpādīnupādāya bhavanti tāni sanidarśanānīti brūyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5235: tīrthikā vadanti- saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca [rūpi]dravyasamavāyādarūpiṇo 'pi cākṣuṣāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5236: ato bhagavānāha- eṣāṃ rūpamātraṃ sanidarśanam nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5250: yo dharmaḥ pratiniyataḥ sa pratiniyataṃ dharmaṃ pratihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5259: dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ tadā [na] saṃkhyeyāni pañcendriyāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:5268: (pṛ) cakṣuṣo raśmirmahadalpaṃ paśyati sudūraṃ gatvāpi rūpamapratihataṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:5270: raśmirayaṃ dve cakṣuṣyupādāyaikatra militvā ekībhūto rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:5271: cakṣurekaṃ śrotraṃ nāsikā ca kāyasyāntarvartamānā na vibhaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5272: ato bhavadvacanam anyatpaśyati anyadvijānāti idaṃ nirastam /
SA16hvsatssu:5305: yadavādīḥ sannikarṣo nigūḍha ityato na dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5317: karmabalena pariṇamitāni mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi bhūtvā vibhaktāni santi /
SA16hvsatssu:5344: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- indriyāṇi bhautikāni niyatānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5357: yathā catussatyābhisamaye dharmān sākṣātkṛtya [ta]ddharmatāṃ samyak bhāvayatīti sarvamidaṃ manovijñānenaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:5362: kiṃ prāpya vijānāti kimaprāpyeti sarvaṃ pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5381: hrasvadīrghādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñāne samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5394: (u) [kasmiṃścit] dharme sthānāntara uddhite yadi parasyopakāro hiṃsā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5410: na tu vadanti ghaṭe śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5415: sattvānāṃ pūrvākṣiptakarmavāsanatvādyadi padārthā nityaṃ saśabdāḥ syuḥ tadā na tātkālikaḥ [śabdaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:5419: mahābhūtānāṃ sadā mithaḥ sammardāt sarvaṃ saśabdaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5420: (u) na padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sammardaḥ sarvaḥ śabdahetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5434: (pṛ) saṃvṛtitaḥ sadā vadanti śabda ākāśaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5459: (SSS_151) ākāśe vartamāne 'pi auṣṇyamasti kadācit kadācinnetyākāśo nauṣṇyakāraṇamiti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5465: dṛṣṭe tāvanna paśyāmaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśamupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5489: yathā pūrvaṃ kusume gandhamāghrāya paścādvastre jighrataḥ ayamāgantukaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5495: yadi bravīṣi jalādāvasti rūpaṃ svata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5496: (SSS_152) vayamapi vadema kāṃsyādau svata eva gandho 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5497: yo dharmo yasya vastuno 'vinirbhāgavartī sa tasyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:5498: ato yo gandho yatrāvinirbhāgavartī sa tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5501: yathā vadanti- asti candramasi tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5502: vadanti ca gharmagṛhe 'gnyapagame 'pi śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo 'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5514: candrādayaḥ śītā api taijasā iti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:5527: ataḥ kāryata iti vacanaṃ na hetuḥ kalpate /
SA16hvsatssu:5533: tejaso rūpaṃ bhāskaraṃ śuklam kāṃsyādīnāntu abhāsvaram /
SA16hvsatssu:5534: kāṃsyāṃdīnāṃ tejasā vailakṣaṇye 'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:5542: asamyakcintanāt bravītha yūyaṃ- gandhaḥ pṛthivīmātre vidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5548: na tu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu tāratamyena bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5549: yathā vadanti pṛthivyā apāṃ bāhulyena madhura iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5552: ato jñātavyam - padārthāt pṛthak [pṛthak] svabhāvo raso jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5562: saṃvṛtyā rasā vibhaktāḥ yathā janā manyante madhuraṃ madhurameva bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5570_0: sparśo nāma kaṭhinaṃ mṛdu guru laghu prabalaṃ durbalaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ karkaśaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:5570_1: kṛśaṃ śthūlaṃ praśrabdhiḥ klamathamaklamathaṃ rogo viśeṣo vā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyamālasyaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:5571: sammohaḥ stambharna vyathā śūlaṃ vijṛmbhikā jighatsā pipāsā santṛptiḥ sātaṃ visātaṃ maurarvyam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5572: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- trayaḥ sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5576: (pṛ) aulūkyā vadanti- pṛthivyā anuṣṇāśītasparśastathā vāyorapi sparśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5579: [tādṛśa]niyamo nāstīti pūrvamevoktam- yaduta sarpirādīnāṃ niyatā śītatā kāṃsyādīnāmanuṣṇateti /
SA16hvsatssu:5580: kiñcoktaṃ pūrvaṃ triṣu sparśeṣu yadi vāyavīya āgantukaḥ tadā sparśāntarābhāvādvāyuraniyatalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5587: (u) kāṃsyādīni sarpirādīni ca kaṭhinadravyāṇi agnisaṃyogādravī bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5593: agnisaṃyoge sa sparśo yadi na vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5603: [tadā] paro 'pi brūyāt payolakṣaṇamanirudhya kevalaṃ dadhilakṣaṇaṃ parāvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5605: yadi bravīṣi na paśyāmaḥ payaḥ punaḥ payorūpeṇeti /
SA16hvsatssu:5608: anādau saṃsāre kiṃ dravyaṃ nāgninā dagdhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5611: ato jñāyate pāko na nityo 'parāvṛtta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5612: evañca śītasparśe vinaṣṭe punaḥ śītasparśa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5617: vaiśeṣikā vadanti- pṛthivīmātre pāko bhavati nāpsu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5618: bhiṣajastu vadanti- yastaptāṃ yavāgūṃ pāti sa vijātīyaṃ phalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5638: yathā mārgavarge smṛterekasyā eva pañca nāmānyu[cyante] smṛtyupasthānaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smṛtibalaṃ smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyaksmṛtiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:5641: sambodhirityādīni nānā pṛthak pṛthaṅ nāmāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5642: eka eva samādhiḥ dhyānaṃ vimuktiḥ nissṛtiḥ samāpattirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5646: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tasya kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate avidyāsravaccittaṃ vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5649: api coktaṃ sūtre- yadā bhagavān sattvānāṃ kallacittaṃ mṛducittaṃ dāntacittaṃ vimuktilābhapravaṇatāñca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5652: api coktaṃ sūtre- cittasaṃkleśātsattvāḥ saṃkliśyanti cittavyavadānātsattvā viśudhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5654: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuścatvāri dhyānānyupasampadya viśuddhākopyacitto (SSS_157) bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5655: sa duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgamāryasatyañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5660: api coktaṃ sūtre rāṣṭrapālamāhūyāvadat idaṃ vastu punaḥ punarājavajjavaṃ mahārāja cittaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5661: āha ca ādhyātmiko vijñānakāyo bāhyaṃ nāparūpamiti dvidhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5667: ato jñāyate cittamātramasti na caitasikamasti pṛthagiti //
SA16hvsatssu:5677: yadbhavatāṃ mataṃ- cittamanyena cittena samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5680: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dūraṅgamamekacaramaśarīraṃ guhāśayam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5683: yathā bhikṣurekākī san satsvapi maśakā[di]prāṇiṣu sajātīyo nāstīti ekākītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5684: ato (SSS_158) jñāyate nānyacittena cittaṃ samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5687: caitasikāstu ekena dhātunā ekenāyatanena tribhiḥ skandhaiśca saṅgṛhītāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5697: yathoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5705: tādṛśavibhāgāt jñāyate cittamanyat caitasikā anya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5711: bhagavān svayamāha- ye cittajāścittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5714: paro 'pi vadet- caitasikāḥ santi na cittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5736: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ dharmālambanaṃ cittaṃ cittaviśeṣāścaitasikā mārgavargoktavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5753: sūtre bhagavān na pariniṣṭhitaṃ vakti idamasyādhivacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5754: yathāha sūtram- ekaṃ dharmaṃ prajahītha ahamājānāmi anāgāmimārgaṃ pratilabhadhve yadidaṃ kāmacchandam /
SA16hvsatssu:5761: yaduktaṃ bāhyaṃ nāmarūpamiti sa eva caitasika[dharma] ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5766: yat bāhyaṃ sa eva viṣaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5793: evaṃ cittaṃ cittamāśrayata iti na nāmāntaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:5805: sa hi bravīti- pūrvaṃ vijñānasya kālaḥ paścātsaṃjñādīnām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5811: cittameva dvidhā vadāmi ekaṃ jñānamaparaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5813: yadāha bhavān- bhagavān svayamāha ye cittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5817: kintu vadāmi cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5825: cittañca caitasikaiḥ saha cittādutpadyata iti caitasikamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5826: caitasikamātramastīti yo vadati sa vadet caitasikadharmā arthākhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5834: citta utpannaṃ cittameva citte vitarka udabhūdityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5848: vijñānasya buddhervā [anyeṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5851: yathā laukikā vadanti yadbhavān vijānātīmaṃ puruṣamiti tat jñānameva vedanā saṃjñā iti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5859: asmin cittaskandhe saṃkleśo 'vidyā ca sarvathā saṃprayuktā /
SA16hvsatssu:5866: ato jñāyate avidyāto 'pi cittameva vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5869: yadi ca saṃkleśebhyaścittaṃ vimucyate avidyātaḥ prajñā vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5871: ataścittaṃ vinā na kiñcidvimucyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5877: laukikā bhūyasā sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi vijānantīti vedanādayo '[pi] vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5882: bhagavān sattvānāṃ kleśatāratamyavaśātsadā viṣādākrāntacittaḥ san vadati ayameko dharma iti /
