SA16hvsatssu:5894: dharmāṇāṃ sasamprayogatve 'pi sparśa eva vedanādīnāṃ hetuḥ na vedanādayaḥ sparśasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5908: ato nāsti samprayogaḥ gambhīre pratītyasamutpāda[sūtre]bhagavānāha- asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5909: yathā ca bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpādīni hetuphalābhyāṃ kramikāni dṛṣṭāni /
SA16hvsatssu:5911: yadbhavān manyate kāmādayaḥ kleśā rūpasya saha[bhū]hetavaḥ sahajāḥ syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:5928: (u) kasya pratibandhādekaṃ kramikamālambanaṃ na kramaśaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānyutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5929: jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryamiti kramaśa utpādaheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5930: sūtre coktam- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5934: yo nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti sa dṛṣṭvā gṛhṇāti na darśanakāle /
SA16hvsatssu:5936: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvānuprahṛṣṭacetano bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5939: ato jñāyate na sarvaṃ cittaṃ vedanādisamanvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5943: tasya (SSS_164) nāsti saṃjñā nāpi daurmanasyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:5945: kecidāhuḥ tasyāpi kāmādayaḥ kleśā na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5950: kiñca bhavataḥ pañca vijñānāni na vikalpakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:5952: cetanāvikalpaḥ pūrvarbhaudārikaḥ san pañcātsūkṣmo bhavatītyato vitarkavicāraustaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5954: tadyathā vadasi mayi tava jñāpanāya prathamata evābhyūhādhīno vitarka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5960: ato 'bhyupeyaṃ pañca vijñānāni asaṃjñāni avitarkāni avicārāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5962: na hi pañcavijñāneṣu strī puruṣa iti vikalpo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:5965: pañcavijñānānāṃ nirvikalpakatvāt tadanantaraṃ manovijñānamutpadyata iti yuṣmābhiruktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5979: avidyā prajñā ca viruddhe na yugapatsyātām /
SA16hvsatssu:5983: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti naikasmin citte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:5987: ayaṃ puruṣo mama jñāto māmupakṛtavāniti yat smaraṇam,
SA16hvsatssu:5988: smṛtvā ca prītijananam tata kathamekasmin citte syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5997: ekasminneva hi citte 'sti jñānamajñānaṃ saṃśayo niścayaḥ śraddhāśraddhā vīryaṃ kausīdyamityevamādyā doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5998: sarve ca caitasikā ekasmina citte pariniṣṭhitāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5999: kasya pratibandhāt sukhaṃ dukhaṃ rāgo dveṣa ityādayo na bhavantyekasmin citte /
SA16hvsatssu:6000: yadyāha bhavān sukhaduḥkhādayo virodhānnaikasmin citte vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6004: “yo bhikṣuścaturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati ca smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6013: upekṣāyāṃ prajānāti” iti caitasikāḥ kramikā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6019: śīladharaḥ puruṣo na kaukṛtyabhāvāya cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6033: yo bhikṣuralpeccho viharati sa santuṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6063: ārakṣāṃ pratītya daṇḍādānaśasrādānakalahavigrahavivādāḥ sarve duḥkhopāyāsādayaḥ sambhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6071: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6073: cittacaittā ekakālikā iti vadatastrayāṇāṃ sannipāto nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:6074: ekaikaśa utpadyanta iti vadatastu asti trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6079: kasmāt yaḥ paśyati sa vedayata ayamātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:6084: puruṣasūtra uktam- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6087: asmin mate vividhaṃ nāmāsti yaduta sattvo devo manuṣyaḥ strī puruṣo mahānalpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6088: evamādīni nāmāni sarvāṇi skandhān pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6089: yadi cittacaitasikāḥ kramikāḥ tadā skandhadvayaṃ pratītya puruṣo bhavet na skandhapañcakam /
SA16hvsatssu:6092: bhavānāha- pratyutpanne na santi pañcaskandhāḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6094: ucyate tu sarvaskandhān pratītya na skandhadvayamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:6096: asti ca sūtre samprayogo yadutendriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6097: api coktaṃ sūtre- sparśo vedanāsaṃjñāvitarkaiḥ sahaja iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6101: (SSS_168) kathaṃ vijñānasthitiṣu vedanādiṣu sthitamidaṃ niśrayate tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6105: āha ca- sattvānāṃ cittaṃ dīrgharātraṃ rāgadveṣādisaṃkliṣṭamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6109: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6110: akālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānām yaduta dharmapravicayabodhyaṅgasya vīryabodhyaṅgasya prītibodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6113: [yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati] kālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyai yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6116: akāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6120: ] kāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgasya vīryasaṃmbodhyaṅgasya prītisambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6124: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- ekakālaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bodhi[pakṣikā] dharmā na viyujyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6128: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yaḥ paśyati sa vedayate sa ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:6131: na vibhajanti vedaneyamidaṃ vijñānaṃ niśrayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6133: te cittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvā avibhajanto vyavahāramātrāsaṅgāttathā (SSS_169) vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6135: yadavocaḥ- sarvān skandhān pratītya puruṣo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6136: tatra pañcaskandhānāṃ santatiṃ pratītya puruṣa ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ skandhānāṃ vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:6137: yathā loke vadanti- sukhī duḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6155: yathā ca vadanti rājā mānthātā smṛtimātreṇa svargamāruroheti /
SA16hvsatssu:6157: pṛthagjanānāṃ vijñānasyālambanakriyāyāṃ catvāro dharmāḥ kramikā bhavanti- vijñānānantarajā saṃjñā,
SA16hvsatssu:6169: vitarkavicārau ca na saṃprayuktāviti pūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:6171: tatsūtra uktā vijñānasya pratyaya[rūpā] sthitiḥ na niśrayarūpā /
SA16hvsatssu:6173: tasminneva hi sūtra uktam- vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya snehapramodābhyāṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6175: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā- yadi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6181: tatra tṛṣṇodbhavati udbhūtatṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānasthiti rityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6200: yadi bravīṣi cittaṃ pūrvamutpadyate tanmahimnā caitasikānāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6203: yadbravīṣi cittaṃ kleśasaṃkliṣṭamityato jñāyate 'smi samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6206: tadā sa eva pariśuddhadharmā dūṣyo bhavatīti dharmalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:6213: tathā ca sattvā api samprayuktāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6232: caitasikāścittajāścittaniśritā iti yat bhavato vacanaṃ tatpūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:6236: na tu sāhāyyāya mitha ālambane samudācarantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6245: tasmin samaye praśrabdhyādīni trīṇi bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6261: (pṛ) ājñātaṃ na santi pṛthak caitasikāḥ nāsti ca samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6286: saṃyogato viyogato vā hetusamanantarālambanādhipatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viśeṣāccittāni bhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6291: yathā sūryaraśmiḥ prakṛtito viśuddhā na kadāciddūṣyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6292: yat prakṛtito 'viśuddhaṃ na tat viśodhayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6293: yathā roma prakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nāvadātaṃ kartumarhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6298: yathocyate bhikṣurvijñānamupabhuṅkte keṣāṃ vijñānaṃ yaduta sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhānāṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:6313: yathā markaṭopasūtra uktam- yathā markaṭaḥ [araṇya upavane caramāṇaḥ] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6315: evameva cittaṃ [rātryā divasasya ca] atyayena anyadevotpadyata anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6320: yat citta- [mityucyate tat rātryāśca divasasya] atyayena anyadevotpadyate 'nyannirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6324: yathā caikaṃ karma [kṛtaṃ] na punarādeyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6337: ratnahārasūtra uktam- yaścittaṃ sadā śraddhayā śīlena tyāgena śrutena prajñayā ca bhāvayati sa mṛto deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6338: dhyānasūtre coktam- prathamadhyānalābhī cittasya paridamanāya prathamadhyānādvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:6348: tiṣṭha markaṭa mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathā purā /
SA16hvsatssu:6350: ato jñāyate- cittamekaṃ pañcendriyadvāreṣu kāyakuṭikāyāṃ paribhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:6352: ata āha “mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathāpurā” / iti / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:6357: ekameva hi cittaṃ karmāṇyabhinirvṛttya punarvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:6358: cittaṃ mriyate cittamutpadyate cittaṃ badhyate cittaṃ mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6376: yadekaṃ cittaṃ tadeva rūpaśabdādigrahaṇarūpāṇi nānākarmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6377: yathaikaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcachidrake gṛhe sthitaḥ tatra tatra gatān viṣayān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6378: tadeva cittaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnamālokadipratyayamapekṣya rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6379: yathā sa eva puruṣa anyatra sahāyamapekṣya [aparaṃ] kāryaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6381: yathā sa eva pūrvaṃ jñānī san paścādajñānī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6382: evaṃ mithyājñānaṃ punaḥ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6383: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ viśuddhaḥ paścādaviśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6384: evaṃ yat sandigdhaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva niścitaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6385: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃśayitaḥ punarniścito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6386: yadakuśalaṃ cittaṃ tadeva punaḥ kuśalamavyākṛtañca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6387: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ kadācitkuśalaṃ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:6390: yathā sa eva puruṣo 'tītānāgatādau nāneryāpathān karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6393: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ prasannaḥ paścādaprasanno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6395: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvamanyaṃ sukhayati paścātpunarduḥkhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6397: yadavādīḥ- ekameva vijñānaṃ na ṣaḍvivaṣayān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6401: yat vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ tat rūpamātraṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6407: yathā pradīpa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati anyānapi prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6408: yathā gaṇaka ātmānaṃ gaṇayati anyānapi gaṇayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6411: yathā markaṭaḥ śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti tāṃ muttkāparāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6415: svayameva punarvipākaṃ vedayate iti saṃkṣipya pratyavocam /
SA16hvsatssu:6419: anyadvedayate anyanmṛnmriyate anyajjāyata ityādayo doṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6423: atrocyate / yadabravīḥ- cittamekaṃ kāmādinā ciramupakliṣṭam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6436: tenaiva cittena tadeva smaryata iti kathaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6450: idānīṃ kurvan paścātkariṣyan nitya eko 'vikārītyata ātmā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6457: brahmādayo vyāmohagatā evaṃ manyante kāyo 'yamanityaḥ cittaṃ vijñānantu nityam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6462: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- dakṣiṇena dṛṣṭvā vāmena vijānīyāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:6467: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi [ārya]jñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6485: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam /
SA16hvsatssu:6489: yadavādiḥ- vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6490: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:6497: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo 'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6511: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6522: tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6526: saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6540: yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittaṃ] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6542: yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6547: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñāna[mutpadyate] ityanayorabhede vijñānamapyabhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:6561: ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6579: tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam /
SA16hvsatssu:6581: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6597: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6617: puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6629: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:6630: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6657: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6662: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6665: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6666: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti //
SA16hvsatssu:6669: atrocyate / yaducyate bhavatā- bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6677: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6691: tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:6701: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān /
SA16hvsatssu:6703: uktañca sūtre- yadā sukhā vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6704: tadā [anye] dve vedane niruddhe yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:6705: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6707: ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6708: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6709: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6711: ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6712: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6724: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6737: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6738: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:6747: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6752: yathoktam- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6756: tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6757: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6770: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti / vadanti ca-
SA16hvsatssu:6773: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā /
SA16hvsatssu:6776: yathoktam- āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6781: uktañca sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhate nājānan nāpaśyan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6783: āha ca bhagavān- prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6786: anukramasūtre coktam- viśuddhaśīladhāriṇo na cittaṃ paritapati yāvadyathābhūtajñānāya cittaṃ samādadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6791: āha ca bhagavān- sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6793: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6795: yathāha mahānidānasūtram- yacca sūtre 'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6796: api cāha- samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6797: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā (SSS_185) iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6802: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6806: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6814: yathoktam- siṃho mṛgarāja iha nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:6815: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta]māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6822: kiñcāha- trīṇi nimittāni yaduta samādhinimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6827: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6833: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- yo bhikṣuḥ rūpaśabdādinimittaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6840: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:6842: kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6844: duṣṭanimittaniṣedhārthamāha- rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6845: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6851: yathoktaṃ- dharmanimittasya grāhī na duṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6884: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6885: (pṛ) nanu sa evoṣṇasparśaḥ utkaṭaḥ san duḥkhakaro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6893: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6903: kiñcāha- rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6904: kiñcāha- sukhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyāḥ sukhe sthite sukham /
SA16hvsatssu:6906: duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:6908: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6921: na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6928: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:6930: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6934: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6938: na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam /
SA16hvsatssu:6939: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6941: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:6942: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam //
SA16hvsatssu:6947: cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6949: annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu /
SA16hvsatssu:6956: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6957: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā /
SA16hvsatssu:6958: sarveṣāmavaśyamātyantikaduḥkhatvāt jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] sadevordhvakālaṃ budhyate pādukākṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:6968: yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6973: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti /
SA16hvsatssu:6975: yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:6981: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam- sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:6988: ato bhagavānāha- yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7001: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti /
SA16hvsatssu:7002: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7010: sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7020: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7023: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:7024: jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaduḥkhaṃ vipriyasamāgamaduḥkhaṃ priyaviyogaduḥkhaṃ prārthitādivighātaduḥkham ityādibhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7030: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7031: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:7050: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāmavirāganirodhāt (SSS_191)
SA16hvsatssu:7068: yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7081: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya mūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7091: lābhakāle na tṛpyati srotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva /
SA16hvsatssu:7095: sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di]doṣamapi sukhato matvā na citte parikhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7111: uktañca sūtre- dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe /
SA16hvsatssu:7114: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā /
SA16hvsatssu:7116: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā[pi] praheyā /
SA16hvsatssu:7123: loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7132: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7133: (u) ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā bhavanti yat viheṭhakaṃ tat duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7144: (u) puruṣo 'yaṃ tribhiḥ sparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ yaduta duḥkhasparśaḥ sukhasparśa aduḥkhāsukhasparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7150: yadbhavato matam- aduḥkhāsukhasparśe na vedanotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7156: puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7170: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7171: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7172: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho 'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo 'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7181: ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve 'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7184: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7188: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7189: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7190: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7194: ataḥ sarve 'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7196: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:7198: itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7204: anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7210: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7218: te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7219: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7222: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7232: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho 'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7243: puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7244: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7247: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā /
SA16hvsatssu:7249: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7257: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete /
SA16hvsatssu:7261: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam /
SA16hvsatssu:7268: (u) puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:7270: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7271: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo 'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā avidyānuśayaḥ so 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7274: (u) sūtramidaṃ svayamāha- vedanānāṃ samudayāstagamādīnavādīn yathābhūtamaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7278: ata idaṃ sūtramevaṃ vaktavyam- aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7287: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7289: tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7294: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7295: sa evaṃ prajānāti- utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7301: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato 'pyanavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7305: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7309: sūtre tūktam- sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7311: kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7319: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram /
SA16hvsatssu:7320: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7324: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7325: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:7328: (u) sarvāsu vedanāsu evaṃ smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7334: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7335: ato bhagavānāha- vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7344: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:7345: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7351: yathocyate sūtre- asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7353: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7358: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā /
SA16hvsatssu:7367: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7374: sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7376: yathā pañcakāmaguṇasampannasya puruṣasya maśakapataṅgadaṃśe yo duḥkhānubhavo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7387: yathā kṣetre tṛṇavīraṇāni svayaṃ prarohanti na sasyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:7388: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya guruke pāpakarmaṇi pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7400: sā ca vedanā triṣu dhātuṣu vyāptā /
SA16hvsatssu:7403: tadvedanārāgaṃ pratītya jīvati aśīti mahākalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhalakṣaṇān skandhānanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7410: sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā tu laukikamārgasyāpi doṣaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:7423: sukhendriyaṃ caturthadhyāne nirudhyate upekṣendriyaṃ nirodhasamāpattau nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7429: (pṛ) rūpārūpyadhātau kuśaladharmān samyak bhāvayato duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nasyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7437: eṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ yā kācidvedanā sā duḥkhā vā sukhā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7442: yatkiñcanarūpaṃ [sarvaṃ tat] anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma iti rūpadhātoḥ sarūpatvāt astyāsvādacittaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:7451: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya saṃjñā vedanā ca śalyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7458: rūpārūpyadhātvorapi tathāṣṭasaṃskārāḥ samānamuktā iti kasmānnāsti duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:7462: āha ca sūtram- atra santīrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ kleśā (SSS_201) iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7463: yathā brahmā brahmāṇamāmantyāha- dhrūvamidaṃ sthānam mā bhavantaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7466: api coktaṃ sūtre- tatrāsti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7469: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- sarve kleśā akuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7471: uktañca sūtre- rūpārāmā [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyāḥ rūparatā rūpasamuditāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7478: prākṛtānāmajñānāṃ kasya śaktibalena priyaprāptipratyayaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7480: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgaṃ pratipannasyaivāyuṣo 'nte rūpe saumanasyaṃ daurmanasya ñca nāsti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7481: ato jñāyate sarveṣāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyaṃ sadānuvartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7482: bhagavān svayamāha- daurmanasyavigataṃ saumanasyavigatañcaikaṃ cittamupekṣāyāmupavicaratītyayamarhato guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7486: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadupekṣācittaṃ sarvaṃ tat rūpaniśritaṃ na rūparāgavimuktam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7488: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśayaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7493: uttamabhūmau ca pravṛtte kāyacitte śāntasukhe na mahadanugṛhīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7496: na te tadiryāpatheṣu dīrghakālaṃ sthātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7497: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saptadināni samāviśya vimuktisukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7499: yathoktaṃ sūtre praśrabdhiriti sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7500: ato jñāyate sarvāsu bhūmiṣu asti sukhā vedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:7511: tasmāt ucyate [tatra] nāsti sukhaṃ nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7512: tatra ca sukhaduḥkhe sūkṣme na pratīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7513: asiśastrādi duḥkhaṃ bandhamaraṇādi daurmanasyañca nāstītyato nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7517: yaducyate triṣu dhyāneṣu sattvā ekakāyā ekanimittā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7519: yathā vadanti- yo dhyānavihārī na samyak styānamiddhauddhatyānyapanayati so 'viśuddhābha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7521: yathā ca laukikā vadanti alpalavaṇe bhojane alavaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7522: evaṃ tatra saumanalyaṃ daurmanasya ñca na pratītamito nāstītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7524: uktañca sūtre bhagavatā saṃjñāpratyayo vitarka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7525: atra saṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ kathaṃ nāsti vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7527: [cittasya] audārikatā vitarka iti dhyānadvaye niruddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7533: sūtra uktam- ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7536: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avaracetanā avaraprārthanā avarapraṇidhānam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7541: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yathāpi [bhikṣavaḥ] yavakalāpī caturmahāpathe vikṣiptā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7546: kiṃ punaridaṃ bhikṣavo bhavatāṃ manasi vipacyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7550: evaṃ hi sa moghapuruṣaḥ suhatataro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7561: yatrāsmīti tatreñjitaṃ manaskṛtaṃ prapañjitaṃ spanditaṃ rāgagatam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7564: kiñcāha- yo bālo janmaprabhṛti maitrīmabhyasyati so 'kuśalaṃ karma karoti cetayate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7567: āha ca cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7571: upālisūtre uktam- nighaṇṭo nāthaputraḥ śītodakapratikṣipta uṣṇodakapratisevī /
SA16hvsatssu:7579: sahetusapratyayasūtra uktam- aśrutavataḥ pṛthagjanasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7580: mahānidānasūtra uktam- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:7581: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- duḥkhī bhūyasā sukhārthī kiṃ na prārthayate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7582: āha ca- yadā puruṣaḥ pañcakāmaguṇeṣu rajyate sa rāga eva prārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7583: api cāha- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamiti paryeṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati paścādupādānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7588: kasmāt upālisūtra uktam- asañcetanikaṃ karma na mahāsāvadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7591: yathā vadanti ko jñānī idaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7598: yathā kañcitpraṇidadhannāha- ahamanāgate 'dhvani īdṛśaṃ kāyaṃ pratilapsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7602: yathoktaṃsūtre- manaḥsañcetanāyā [bhikṣavaḥ] āhāre parijñāte tisrastṛṣṇāḥ parijñātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7616: kāryaprahāṇāddhetuprahāṇamuktaṃ yaduta manaḥsañcetanāhāraprahāṇāt tisṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ prahāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7619: tṛṣṇā hi dvividhā hetubhūtā phalabhūtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7622: codayati / yadi hetvavasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇā phalāvasthāyāṃ cetanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7625: yo dharmo hetvavasthaḥ so 'nyaḥ phalāvastha ścānyaḥ ityato jñāyate cetanā na tṛṣṇāṅgamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7626: yathoktaṃ sahetusapratyaya sūtre mūḍhasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā /
SA16hvsatssu:7629: yasya yasmin vastuni rāgaḥ tasya tasmin vastuni prārthanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7644: manasā cet praduṣṭhena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7654: yadā puruṣaḥ parasattvānāṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:7660: ato jñāyate ekaiva cetanā nānānāmabhirucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7675: ato jñāyate asti ca caitasika dharmaḥ sparśākhya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7676: ṣaṭ ṣaṭkasūtra uktaṃ- ṣaṭa sparśakāyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7681: sūtre cāsti dvividhaḥ sparśaḥ eka trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7683: ato jñāyate dvividhayoḥ sparśayorekaḥ svarūpasan aparaḥ prajñaptisanniti /
SA16hvsatssu:7688: yathā ca bhikṣūṇāṃ samavāyo na bhikṣubhyo 'nyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7693: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na cakṣurādibhyo bhidyata iti nāstyavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7695: prāguktaṃ mayā [yadā] cittamālambanaṃ gṛhāti tasmin samaye sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7700: na vayaṃ svīkurmaḥ sparśo 'yaṃ dvividha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7707: ato jñāyate sa sparśo na tribhyo bhidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7708: kiñca yadi sparśaścaitasikadharmaḥ tadā anyebhyaścaitasikebhyo bhidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:7715: yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7716: (u) sparśasya kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yadanyacaitasikānāṃ noktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7719: vedanādyakālīnā tṛṣṇānantarakālīnā iti vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tu tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7722: na tūcyata iti jñātavyaṃ nāsti vibhinnaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7724: yathāha yo duḥkhopaghātaḥ sa āgatya janakāyaṃ spṛśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7730: yathā loke vadanti sukha uṣṇasaṃsparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7742: ato jñāyate nāsti pāramārthikaḥ pṛthak caitasikadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7743: yo dharmaḥ kāyagataḥ sa sparśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7744: yat vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetukriyāṃ prayacchati tasmin samaye sparśa iti nāma pradīyate //
SA16hvsatssu:7755: (pṛ) kiṃ vijñānānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ manaskārabalenotpadyate kiṃ vā na /
SA16hvsatssu:7761: kadācidālambanabalādutpadyate yathā dūrataḥ pradīpaṃ paśyan tasya kampaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:7773: kadācitsamādhibalādutpadyate yathaikatra pratibaddhacitto vijñāne prakarṣaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7779: saukumāryādutpadyate yathā lomākṣigataṃ sat cittasya duḥkhajanakaṃ nānyatra gatam /
SA16hvsatssu:7791: ata evamāha- kasyacit cittāntarajanakamanaskāre 'sati vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7804: yathā vadanti samyak praśnaḥ samyag dūṣaṇaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:7808: (SSS_210) ato jñāyate yuktayanuyāyimanaskāraḥ tattvamanaskāra ityādayaḥ samyaṅ manaskārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7823: kiñcāha- yadi bhikṣavo mama śāsane tīvracchandā [vartadhve] /
SA16hvsatssu:7824: tada mama śāsanaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7829: ayaṃ vīryasahakāriṇā prajñāsamādhiṃ sañcinotītyebhyaścaturbhyo 'bhilaṣitamṛddhyaṅgamiti nāmabhāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7830: āha ca- tvaṃ vihāyasā gamanaṃ chandayasi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7831: tenakhalu samayena sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ svādhyāyabahulo viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:7833: atha khalu tasminvanaṣaṇḍe adhivasantī devatā tasya bhikṣordharmaśṛṇvantī yena sa bhikṣuḥ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7836: kasmāt dharmapadāni tvaṃ bhikṣurnādhyepi bhikṣubhiḥ sukhaṃ vasan /
SA16hvsatssu:7837: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ labhate prasādaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme labhate praśaṃsām // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7838: abhūt pūrvaṃ dharmapadeṣu chando yāvadvirāgeṇa samāgato 'smi /
SA16hvsatssu:7839: yato virāgeṇa samāgato 'smi yatkiñcidṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7850: bhagavān yat sattvānāṃ nānādhātūn prajānāti tat dhātujñānabalam /
SA16hvsatssu:7858: ata āha- sattvānāṃ yathādhātu santānamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7870: (pṛ) tathā cet svayaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ śraddhā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7876: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ bhagavan asmin vastuni yathā bhagavadvacanaṃ śraddhadha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7880: tasyeyaṃ cintā bhavati sa dharmaḥ paramārthasatyo na mṛṣeti,
SA16hvsatssu:7883: tadyathā rogī pūrvaṃ bhiṣagvacane śraddadhāna auṣadhamupasevya rogānmuktaḥ paścāttasmin bhiṣaji prasannacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7888: jñānajā yathā caturṣu [avetya] prasādeṣu buddhādiṣu cittaprasādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7889: sā tridhā vibhaktā kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7895: tathā no cet akuśalā vedanā vedanā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7898: yā śraddhā indriyeṣu gaṇitā vimuktyanugāminī saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣikeṣu gatā sā niyamena kuśalaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:7903: tatrāmyutsāhaḥ sadā cittaikāgratāsamudācāraḥ sa vyavasāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7905: yat caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣu antargataḥ sa kuśalaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7908: tasya paścādutpadyate vyavasāyo 'kuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ samādānāya /
SA16hvsatssu:7917: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat ciraviprakṛṣṭānubhūtaṃ smarati na pramuṣati sā smṛtirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7931: tatra pratyutpannā prajñaiva na tu smṛtiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7932: atastathāgato [yadā] pūrvaṃ smṛtināmnā vimuktimuktavān tadā tāmeva prajñetyavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:7934: (u) smṛterdharmaṃ evaṃ yat svasantāne yo dharmaḥ [pūrva]mutpannaniruddhaḥ tameva [svasantānikaṃ] viprakṛṣṭaṃ vijñānāntaramālambata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7935: jñānānāṃ vijñānadharmaśca tathā yat vijñānāntarānumūtaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7936: yathā cakṣurvijñānena vijñātaṃ rūpaṃ manovijñānaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7944: yathā bhagavān salyakaṃ nāthaputramavocat pūrvaṃ manasi kṛtvā vyākuruṣva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7946: ato vijñaptyādidharmā api pūrvavastvanusmaraṇarūpā smṛtaya ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7950: samādhiḥ prajñā ca samādhivarge prajñāvarge ca vakṣyate //
SA16hvsatssu:7954: yat cittaṃ vyagraṃ muharmuhurālambhakaṃ sa vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7958: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamadhyānamupasampadya viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7960: yā cittasya vyagratā kiñcitsūkṣmatā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7967: ato 'pratyakṣavastuno 'nuvitarkaḥ samyagvitarko vā mithyāvitarko vā iti taṃ kathayāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7971: samyagvitarkaḥ yadapratilabdhaṃ tattvajñānamanumitilakṣaṇena jñānena labdhvā yogī nirvedhabhāgīyakuśalamūle vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7975: tasminneva vitarke anena hetunā evaṃ bhavati anena hetunā naivaṃ bhavati iti cintanā vicāraṇā vā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7991: yat kuśalasyānācaraṇaṃ mithyācaraṇaṃ vā sa pramādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8016: [anye] kecidāhuḥ trīṇi tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8018: avyākṛtānugaṃ cittaṃ yaddhetujaṃ sa heturavyākṛtamūlaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8021: cittasamācaraṇakāle yat kāyaścittaṃ dauṣṭhalyavigataṃ praśāntaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8025: dhyāneṣu yat sukhaduḥkhaviviktaṃ vimuktiparāyaṇaṃ cittasamācaraṇaṃ sopekṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:8034: aprāptiḥ asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ nirodhasamāpattiḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ jātiḥ vyayaḥ sthitiḥ anyathātvaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8046: uktaṃ hi sūtre yaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpañca karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:8049: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- mṛtasya puṇyaṃ na praṇaśyati yaduta phalaprāpakameva /
SA16hvsatssu:8073: na hi nirudhyante pṛthagjanānāṃ cittacaitasikadharmā iti paścādvakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8089: bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ gabhīraṃ yatpratyayānāṃ sāmagryā dharmā (SSS_220)
SA16hvsatssu:8095: kiñca vadanti jātyādayo dharmā ekakālīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8099: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin tasmin [sattvanikāye] jātiḥ skandhānāṃ pratilābhaḥ....... [sā jātiḥ] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8102: āha ca- skandhānāṃ jīrṇatā bhugnatā jareti /
SA16hvsatssu:8105: vyañjanebhya utpannaṃ nāma yathā vadanti devadatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8119: tīrthikānāṃ hi sūtreṣūktaṃ- anyo ghaṭo 'nyat ghaṭatvam /
SA16hvsatssu:8129: ato gabhīramananuvicintya vavīṣi- asti pṛthagjanatvaṃ pṛthagiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8139: śāstramāha- duḥkhasatyaṃ parisamāpya samudayasatyamidānīṃ vakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8149: (u) ghaṭādi kāyikakarmaṇaḥ phalam na kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8155: (u) idaṃ kṣaṇikavarge pratyuktaṃ yadekasmin dharma utpadyamāne 'nyasyāpacaya upacayo vā [tat] kāyikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8156: (pṛ) tathā cet kāya eva kāyikaṃ karma bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8158: na tu kāyena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8169: atastatsamudayo yadi vā kuśalo [yadi vā] akuśalaḥ na tu sākṣātkāyikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8172: (SSS_223) cittabalāt śabdavyavahārasamuditaṃ karma kuśalamakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8174: ya imaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti adhyavasitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8179: (u) tat dvidhā bhavati mana eva mānasaṃ karma manasa utpannaṃ vā mānasaṃ karma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8180: sattvaṃ hanmīti yadadhyavasitaṃ manaḥ tadakuśalaṃ mana eva manasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8191: nahyasti tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ kāyikavācikāvijñaptirevāsti na mānasikāvijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:8192: sūtre coktaṃ dvidhā karma- cetanā vā cetayitvā vā [karme]ti /
SA16hvsatssu:8194: cetayitvā [karma] trividham- cetanāsañcitaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8202: (u) cittaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ puṇyapāpaṃ middhamūrchādikāle 'pi yannityaṃ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:8208: teṣāṃ divā ca rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravartate // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8224: uktaṃ hi sūtre- vīryavān puruṣa āyurvaśāt bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8229: āha ca vanādiropasya divā rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravardhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8232: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt puṇyaṃ sadā pravardhate,
SA16hvsatssu:8248: idānīṃ kimidaṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8254: (SSS_225) (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8256: (u) pratipāditamidaṃ pūrvaṃ yadasti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ cittaviprayuktamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8286: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- hetukṛtaṃ karma ahetukṛtaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8298: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8299: yadyakaraṇacittapūrvakaṃ karoti- yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8305: kṛtānupacitamiti- yathā hananādikarma kṛtvā paścāccittaṃ paritapati /
SA16hvsatssu:8309: upacitākṛtamiti- yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8310: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8311: kṛtopacitamiti- yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8312: akṛtānupacitamiti- na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8314: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8315: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8318: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8328: (u) yastattvajñānaṃ na bhāvayati sa pāpakarmaṇo 'nuśayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8344: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:8353: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavālpamātrānindā /
SA16hvsatssu:8364: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:8379: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato bhavati gurutaraṃ pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:8383: nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:8384: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8385: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8394: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭ triṃśacca pañca ca arbudānām
SA16hvsatssu:8395: yadāryagarhī nirayamupaiti vācaṃ manaḥ praṇidhāya pāpakam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8397: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8413: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8421: (SSS_230) tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8426: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:8430: yathā bhagavān bodhyā śrāvakebhyo 'tiricyate na prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:8435: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8444: āha ca- dandhānāṃ hiṃsayā kāmarāgakalahacittaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:8452: tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ- tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8453: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete /
SA16hvsatssu:8455: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha- nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8463: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi]citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya svayamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tamanugacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8470: (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:8475: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8476: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8479: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8481: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:8486: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8487: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8492: (u) idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8502: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8523: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8529: āha ca ca sūtram- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8530: yathāha gāthā- mriyamāṇañca saṅgrāme patiṃ barayatepsarāḥ iti / kiñcāha-
SA16hvsatssu:8532: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat // iti
SA16hvsatssu:8535: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8536: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8543: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:8544: veda uktam- prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8546: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam- yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8549: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8557: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā prāṇivadhenābhīpsitalābhādasti puṇyaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8569: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8572: yathā loka āhuḥ- ayaṃ puruṣo 'lpapuṇyo bahukurvannapi na vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8580: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8587: yadāha bhavān- caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8591: yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8594: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8596: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8604: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8605: ime duṣkarmaṇā jīvanto 'pi nocyante śīlavyasanina iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8609: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva- cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:8617: tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8623: corahanane 'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8624: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8631: yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8633: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8646: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8647: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8648: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8649: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8655: tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:8658: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8664: yadabravīḥ- kaściccittabalena prāṇātipātaṃ kurvan puṇyaṃ prasūte /
SA16hvsatssu:8670: yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8672: pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8680: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8686: devā api sadā yuddhe 'suraiḥ saha vadhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:8699: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8702: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam /
SA16hvsatssu:8707: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8722: yo dharmo 'duṣṭaḥ na sa dharmaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8724: keciddharmāḥ svarūpato 'kuśalā ityataḥ pariharanti yathā madyapānavikālabhojanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8728: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8734: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8736: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8744: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate 'kuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8747: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8748: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8750: yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8751: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8762: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8766: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8774: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8781: teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ labhanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8783: (pṛ) yathā viṣaṃ pītavāniti hetāvahetāvubhayathā puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8784: yathā ca vahniprakramaṇaṃ jñāne 'jñāne ca puruṣaṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:8786: jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8794: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:8803: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8806: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8808: tadā vimuktilabdho 'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:8813: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8816: hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8818: tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8820: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8832: yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8833: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8840: tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8847: avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena /
SA16hvsatssu:8855: yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:8863: vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8867: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi /
SA16hvsatssu:8868: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8872: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8878: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8894: yaḥ (SSS_240) prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam /
SA16hvsatssu:8896: na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8901: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8916: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8923: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:8937: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8944: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8947: uktañca sūtre- na tathāgataḥ san nāsan,
SA16hvsatssu:8948: nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8951: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:8952: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8953: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8969: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8971: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8973: yathoktaṃ sūtre- eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:8978: yadbhavānāha- na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8980: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:8981: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:8982: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane 'pi sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8987: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi sarve lokāḥ karuṇācittamācaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:8992: tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe 'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8993: bhagavati piḍājananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:9000: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vāvaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet /
SA16hvsatssu:9005: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:9007: tadā [svāmī] prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva /
SA16hvsatssu:9014: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9017: ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:9018: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9020: yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9023: yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9035: (u) bhagavānāha- dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9044: bhagavānāha- trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9053: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9054: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9055: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9059: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:9064: yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9073: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- sarvāṇi duścaritāni apriyavipākakarāṇi sucaritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9075: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9089: (pṛ) samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9092: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9093: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā (SSS_244) vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9095: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate //
SA16hvsatssu:9104: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam /
SA16hvsatssu:9112: anye 'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9115: (u) ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ- pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9120: kecidāhuḥ- imāni trīṇi caritāni ekasyaivārthasyavibhinnāni nāmāni /
SA16hvsatssu:9126: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- cittameva vyupaśamacaritaṃ na cetaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:9132: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃṃ- sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9136: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9140: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:9141: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamavocat- paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto 'pi durgatāvutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:9143: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9149: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9151: (u) yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9154: (pṛ) avyākṛtaṃ karma aniyatavipākañca karma kimeteṣu nāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:9161: (pṛ) tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9162: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:9165: yasya (SSS_246) kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:9170: tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9172: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9190: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9192: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9200: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:9202: kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9215: purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta /
SA16hvsatssu:9216: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9221: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9231: uktaṃ hi sūtre- asti aprasaṃyuktā vedeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:9237: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9245: uktaṃ hi sūtre bhagavatā- mithyādṛṣṭirduḥkhakleśānāṃ heturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9247: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9251: yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha- mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam /
SA16hvsatssu:9254: anye 'pi brahma [kāyikā] devāḥ tatra bhavantaṃ tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ dūṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9261: (u) yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:9270: (pṛ) kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:9272: tathā tatra vikṣiptacittasamutpāditakuśalakarmaṇo 'smin loke vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9273: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9275: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9276_0: (u) tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva
SA16hvsatssu:9276_1: samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9277: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9280: sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat- cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9282: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:9283: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9285: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto 'smin loke āyuṣo 'nte 'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ satkaromīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9303: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9309: tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9316: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9317: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra /
SA16hvsatssu:9320: (u) kecidāhuḥ- vyādhyarthakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharma eva vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9321: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:9325: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9326: kecidāhuḥ- trividhakarmaṇāmeṣāṃ yathāpraṇidhānaṃ vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9329: yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9334: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9340: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u)
SA16hvsatssu:9343: (pṛ) yo 'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9352: uktañca sūtre- prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako 'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9353: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:9357: sūtre hyuktaṃ- sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā bhavati ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:9362: aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:9364: yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9369: (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9373: udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9377: pāpo 'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9378: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:9379: bhadro 'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9380: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:9383: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo 'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9385: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt //
SA16hvsatssu:9406: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti /
SA16hvsatssu:9435: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9444: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9445: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9452: yathā ca rogī kaścit [roga]duḥkhābhihataḥ punaḥ kāyacittapīḍanayātyadhikadaurmanasyopāyāso bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9461: prasenajitaṃ rājānamapṛcchat- api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo 'si iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9462: uktañca- devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9469: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:9472: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttatvānna vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9475: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:9476: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9487: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trīṇyāvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9493: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo 'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade 'vatarati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9496: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9498: yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9501: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9502: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9518: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9519: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9520: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9521: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9531: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām /
SA16hvsatssu:9533: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān /
SA16hvsatssu:9535: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:9536: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:9554: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9555: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9557: idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9558: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9559: (SSS_255) yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino 'pi syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9570: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9572: tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā pratijñāpya paścāddāsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9574: (pṛ) nanu sūtre 'pyuktam- yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9575: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9576: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9583: na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9584: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9586: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9590: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9597: tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:9599: ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9620: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9621: anyatra ca savyābādhye 'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9623: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9625: yena karmaṇā samutpadyate savyābādhye 'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9627: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam /
SA16hvsatssu:9628: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9635: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9636: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9637: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vāpaharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9653: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9656: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9658: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9665: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9666: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9667: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9670: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9671: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9694: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9703: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9704: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9705: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9710: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9713: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9718: tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9722: (u) yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:9726: yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9735: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9766: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9784: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9790: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9791: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9797: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9804: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9813: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9815: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9820: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9834: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9835: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9842: sa duṣparipācanamāhāraṃ bhuṅktvā na paripaktuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9844: yathā kaściccauryaṃ kṛtvā laghutaraṃ gurutaraṃ vā badhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9845: yaḥ sarvakuśalamūlaviviktaḥ yathā hastinā yudhyamānaḥ [tasya] hastaṃ na parirakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:9853: gaṇḍasyāntaḥ srāvavat pāpasya mrakṣaṇe narakaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9854: yo dīrghakālaṃ cittagatamakuśalaṃ na sahasā niyacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9856: yathā cikitsāyai dattaṃ viṣameva puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9859: yathā rāṣṭrapālā bahavo vijñāḥ pūrṇādivadakuśalamithyācāramācarantonyānyapi bahūn śikṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9860: yacca kṛtaṃ karma bhūyasā sattvānāṃ byābādhāya bhavati yathā vanadāhādi /
SA16hvsatssu:9861: bahūnāṃ śāsanaṃ yena adharme te patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9868: karoti sa tathātmānaṃ yathainaṃ icchanti dviṣaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9876: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ pāpīyānapi sunigraha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9878: yat hetupratyayaiḥ pāpaṃ karma karoti tadaṇīyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9879: yaḥ pramādāya vyutsṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtamaśubhaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9880: yo vijñaiḥ paripālito bhavati sa deveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9884: (SSS_262) śāriputraprabhāsvaramāhātmyamavalokyācintayat ayaṃ mahātmā na hantavya iti viśuddhacittena saptakṛtvaḥ śāriputramūrdhvamadho vyavālokayat /
SA16hvsatssu:9888: yathā cāṅgulimālaḥ pāpakaṃ karma bahukṛtvā mātara[mapi]hantumaicchat /
SA16hvsatssu:9889: bhagavān tatkuśalābhijñatvāt tasya vimuktiṃ prāpayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:9892: evamādayaḥ puruṣāḥ akuśalakarmakā api na narake patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9893: ata uktaṃ yaḥ pramādāya vyusṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karma narakāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9897: yaḥ kuśalaṃ kartumagaṇayan mriyamāṇo durutpādakuśalacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9900: sa pūrvākuśalahetukaṃ mithyādṛṣṭi pratyayañca narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9904: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāvocat- yān sattvān paśyatha kāyikamithyācārān vācikamithyācārān mānasikamithyācārān tān jānīta narakaprekṣakāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:9921: yathā kaścitkarmavipākamajñātvā śraddhayā ca nānāvākkarma tathā karoti yathā vadanti ayaṃ puruṣo markaṭavadaticapala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9936: evamādyakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karma kṛtvā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9939: yo nāgagaruḍādīnāṃ śaktibalaṃ śrutvā praṇidadhāti sa tatrotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9940: uktañca sūtre- yo nibiḍasthāne mriyamāṇaḥ praṇidadhāti vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9942: yaḥ paritarṣito mriyate sa jalārthitayā jaleṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9944: vyomāhāt laghu karmāṇi kurvan vyāmiśrakuśalatvāt makṣikālīkṣākṛmikīṭādiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9945: yaḥ parānupadiśan asaddharme pātayati so 'vidvatpada utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9969: sa kṛpaṇaḥ yācanāṃ kurvati kasmiṃścit nāstīti vadan anṛtavāditvātpreteṣu patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9973: kadaryo 'yaṃ dānacāriṇaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dānapatiṃ dvipyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9975: cirādārabhya kadaryacittavāsanayā na svayaṃ dadāti paramapi niṣedhati /
SA16hvsatssu:9976: yatkiñcidasti vihāre saṅghadravyaṃ yajñe ca brāhmaṇadravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:9977: (SSS_264) tat kaścit svayaṃ kevalamabhilaṣati na parasya dātumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9981: yo dānapuṇyavigataḥ sa tadupapattyāyatane vipākālābhī tato yācakādhikṣepakarmaṇo duḥkhaṃ tatraivānubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9982: ayaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārditaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdayacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10030: yaḥ pitroḥ pūjyānāñca satkāre svabhiruciko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10033: manuṣyeṣu ca yo viśuddhakarmapratyayaḥ sa uttara[kuruṣū]tpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10036: yaḥ śuklakarma samyagācaran parānapīḍayitvā dhanamādatte dānāya nābhiṣvaṅgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:10037: svayañca śīlamācaran na pūrvāparaparivāreṣu śīlaṃ bhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10047: manuṣyeṣūktavat praṇidhānahetunā ca viśrutadeveṣu sukhavedanāpratyayaṃ kṛtakuśalakarmakāḥ sarve tatra janmagatiṃ praṇidadhati /
SA16hvsatssu:10048: yathoktaṃ- aṣṭapuṇyasargasthāne yaḥ karuṇāmuditopekṣāsu viharati sa utpadyate brahmaloke yāvadbhavāgram /
SA16hvsatssu:10052: yasya samyak prahīṇāni sa viśuddhataraprabho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10060: idaṃ karma narakeṣu preteṣu tiryakṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10061: (pṛ) anyāsu catasṛṣu gatiṣu kuśalakarmavipāko vedayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10064: yathā [kaści]darcirnarakādvimukto dūrato vanaṣaṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditacitta āśu tasmin vane praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:10065: śītavātakampite tasmin vane [yāvat] asitomarāṇi na patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10067: athavā kṣāranadīṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ prasannasalilamiti drutagati pradhāvya muhūrtaṃ sukhabhāgbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10074: ya eṣāṃ saptānāṃ vastunāṃ samagro vā asamagro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10084: kecidāhuḥ- rājānaḥ pratipakṣiṇo rājñaḥ śāsanāvasare etadakuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10092: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhitasattvāt saṃvaramimaṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10094: yathā kaścit śīladhārī sarvasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10120: yo bhikṣuḥ parāvṛttendriyaḥ na sa vinaṣṭasaṃvaro bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10122: (pṛ) pañcasu gatiṣu kasyāṃ gatau sattvā akuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10124: kecidāhuḥ- [tathā nocet] siṃhavyāghrādayaḥ sadā duṣkarmaṇopajīvino 'pi samanvitāḥ syuriti //
SA16hvsatssu:10128: (pṛ) asattvākhyebhya imaṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10131: kuśalasaṃvaro 'yaṃ trividhaḥ- śīlasaṃvaro dhyānasaṃvaraḥ samādhisaṃvara iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10134: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti punaḥ prahāṇasaṃvaro yaduta kāmadhātuvīta[rāgaḥ] tasmin kāle kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10137: (pṛ) tīrthikā imaṃ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhante na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10140: ācāryaḥ śīlamupadiśati adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādipāpaṃ mā kuryā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10141: (pṛ) anyāsu gatiṣu imaṃ śīlasavaraṃ labhante na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10142: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- nāgādayo 'pi dinamekaṃ śīlamupādadate /
SA16hvsatssu:10157: (pṛ) asti ca pratiṣedho vinaye pātakinīcavṛttikabhikṣuṇīdūṣakādayo na bhikṣucaryāṃ śṛṇvanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10165: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhyādisattvebhyaḥ kiṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10167: tathā no cet saṃvaraḥ prādeśikaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10169: ayaṃ tu saṃvara upacīyamāno 'pacīyamāno nirgranthaputradharmasamaśca yaduta śatayojaneṣvantaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyo viratiḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10171: ya āha asya puruṣasya vadhādviramāmi na tasya puruṣasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:10182: ekāhorātraṃ vā ekadinamātraṃ vā ekarātrimātraṃ vā ardhadinamātraṃ vā ardharātraṃ vā yathaśakti kālaṃ svīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:10184: ya āha- āhamekamāsamātraṃ māsadvitayamātraṃ vā ekavatsaramātraṃ vā [śīlaṃ samādada iti] /
SA16hvsatssu:10187: (pṛ) yaḥ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate sa punaḥ saṃvarādbhraśyati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10190: (pṛ) kiṃ pratyutpannasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā traikālikasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10192: yathā (SSS_269) kaścidatītān pūjyān pūjayitvāpi puṇyaguṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10199: yathaikasya puruṣasya tathā sarvasattvānāṃ samantādapi pratikṣaṇaṃ sadā pratilābhādapramāṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10219: yasmādayaṃ śīlasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattveṣu sadā pratikṣaṇaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10220: tasmāducyate catvāro ratnākarā nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāṃ dinamekaṃ saṃvarasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:10234: tadā sampīḍanīyasattvebhya eva kuśalasaṃvaro labhyeta ityayamasti doṣaḥ /
