SA16hvsatssu:11017: ato jñāyate karmato vipāko labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11018: janā īśvarādīn kāraṇaṃ vadanto 'pi karmāṇi niśrayante yaduta svadehaṃ khedayanta upavāsādīn svīkurvanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11021: sarve cāryāḥ śīlādikuśaladharmān niśrayante yato jānanti karmahetorloko 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11029: yathā upari vṛkṣe phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānanti vṛkṣastaddheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11031: durgatau mohādayaḥ prabalā iti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ durgatikāraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:11040: sajjānānāṃ citte yadyakuśalamutpadyate tadaiva prayatnena nigṛhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11043: tathā nocet yatheṣṭaṃ kuryaḥ idameva paramaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11044: tadā hatvā sattvānāṃ bhojanaṃ paradravyāpahāraḥ yadi vā parastrīgamanaṃ imānyapi sukhāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11054: catussatyajñānāt satyāśrayāḥ kleśā na kadāpi punarudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11060: yathā śuṣkabhūmau bīje ca dagdhe na sarvo 'ṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:11061: evaṃ vijñānasthitikṣetre tṛṣṇāsnehānabhiṣyandite karmabīje ca tattvajñānadagdhe nordhvadehāṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:11062: vidvānetadvastu prajñāya vijñānasthitikṣetraṃ śoṣayituṃ karma bījaṃ dagdhuñca vīryamadhiṣṭhāya prayatate /
SA16hvsatssu:11063: ato jñāyate karma kāyopādānasya pratyaya iti //
SA16hvsatssu:11083: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11085: sattvā duḥkhābhihatā skandhakāyaṃ parijihīrṣavo vibhavaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:11087: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aihikaṃ saumanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ saumanasyaṃ ihalaukikasukhavedanā āmuṣmikasukhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11088: kiñcāha- aihikaṃ daurmanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ daurmanasyaṃ ihalaukikaduḥkhavedanā āmuṣmikaduḥkhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:11089: yathoktaṃ devatāpraśne- kiṃ nandati putraiḥ putravān /
SA16hvsatssu:11100: yathoktaṃ sūtre- samudayasatyaṃ yaduta tarṣaṇaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11120: uktañca sūtre- nirodhaṃ varjayitvā rāgo daurmanasyañca sarve 'kuśalā dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11123: yathocyate dveṣo daurmanasyamiti tadā jñāyate nandiḥ rāga ityupyucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11124: ato 'ṣṭādaśamanaupavicāreṣu na kleśā ucyante kevalaṃ vedanā ucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:11130: tṛtīyavedanāyāmucyate pṛthagjanā asyā vedanāyā na jānanti samudayaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:11133: na jānanti ādīnavaṃ na jānanti nissaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:11135: ime pṛthagjanāḥ sadā pañcadharmān tān na jānantītyato 'duḥkhāsukhavedanāyāṃ sadāvidyānuśayaṃ rvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11144: saptānuśayānāmaṅgaṃ dvidhā bhavati- kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11149: asati rāge na janma bhavati ityataḥ pṛthagucyate bhavarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11154: pradarśayati ca bhagavān tatra[āpi] bhavaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11156: daśākuśalakarmapatheṣu caturṣu bandhaneṣu ca kāmarāga ityākhyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11162: ayaṃ rāgo yadyadhamācaraṇaḥ tadā akuśalarāga ityākhyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11166: yadi vā mātṛbhaginīsvasrācāryapatnīḥ pravrajitapatnīṃ svapatnīṃ vāmārgeṇa jigamiṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:11175: yadalpadravyasyālpadānaṃ labdhvā priyataraṃ kāmayate na tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11179: ayañca rāgo dvividhaḥ kāmarāgaḥ upakaraṇarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11197: yathā kaścit anena vastunā duḥkhito vastvantaraṃ paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:11198: yathoktam- sukhī na paryeṣate duḥkhī tu bahu paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:11225: tadyathā priyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā citte idaṃ [priya]miti vacanaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:11240: yadi vā tadrūpe yadi vākāre yadi vā sparśe yadi vā subhāṣite [mithyāmanaskāramutpādayati] /
SA16hvsatssu:11249: yathā śuddhaṃ vastra [mapagatakalaṅkaṃ] samyaṅ malena dūṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11257: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅko vā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11258: aśucyādi vilokya apratihatālambanasya kāmarāgo vegaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11261: strīrūpādyalambane prīto nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti paricchedañca gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:11271: kāmarāgasya hitāsvādamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadānīnavamajānataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11272: ṛtunā ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā vasantādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11273: sthānavaśena ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā kiñcitsthānaṃ yatra cirādārabhya kāmacāro bahuśo 'bhyastaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11279: pakṣiṇāṃ kalaravaṃ strīṇāṃ sukumārabhūṣaṇarutāni subhāṣitāni vā śṛṇvataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11287: alabdhacittasamādhānasya antaḥ sattvaṃ paśyato bahiḥ rūpādi paśyataśca kāmarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11293: (pṛ) kāmarāgasya ke doṣāḥ santīti kāmaḥ prahātavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11307: yathoktaṃ- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānaṃ yāvanmahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11310: kiñcāha- vidyamānāni duḥkhāni bhikṣavaḥ kasmādbhavantīti manasikṛtvā jānīdhvaṃ [tāni] kāmahetukāni /
SA16hvsatssu:11312: kiñcāha- kabalīkāre [bhikṣava] āhāre 'sti nandi asti rāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11319: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yathā śvā raktaliptamasthikaṅkālaṃ svādayitvā [sva]lālāyogānmanyate yanmadhura[mida]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:11320: tathā rāgyapi nīrase kāme mithyāviparyāsabalena manyate yadidaṃ rasāsvādamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11324: sattvānāṃ kāmarāgapratyayaṃ sukhamalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahu kena kim [syāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:11325: kāmatṛṣṇāvān sukhahetoḥ sarvaduḥkhānyanubhavati yadutārjanakāle duḥkhaṃ rakṣaṇakāle duḥkhamupabhogakāle 'pi duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:11326: yathā kṛṣivāṇijyasaṃgrāmarājasevāparicaryādīni arjane duḥkhaṃ hānabhītyā rakṣaṇe duḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:11328: iṣṭasaṅgame prītiralpā virahe ca duḥkhaṃ bahu /
SA16hvsatssu:11330: yathāha bhagavān- kāmatṛṣṇāyāḥ pañcādīnavāḥ- alpāsvādo bahuduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:11335: kleśā rāgamupādāya bhavanti yathā kāmarāgāt kleśāḥ sarve samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11340: yathā kṛṣṇaśuklā gauḥ svayamabaddhā rajjunā paramabaddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:11345: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pūrvā koṭirna [prajñāyate] avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ sandhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11346: api coktaṃ sūtre- rāgaprahāṇādrūpaṃ prahīyate yāvadvijñānaṃ prahīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11356: kāmarāgaḥ sadā kusumāramukhataḥ samudācaratītyataḥ paramamakuśalaṃ nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:11357: kiñca sattvāścittapramodena kāmarāge pravartante yāvanmaśakapipīlikā[daya]ḥ sarve 'pi āhāramaithunayoḥ pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:11358: sa kāmarāgo nānākāraṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ cittaṃ badhnāti yaduta mātṛpitṛsvasṛbhaginīpatnīsaṃjñā dhanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11366: yathā rūpāṇāmāsvādādhyavasānamityuktaṃ yaduta rūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ saumanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:11371: yasmāt sattvāḥ kāmaḥ sukhaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ samāpattiḥ sukhamiti saṃrajyante /
SA16hvsatssu:11374: yathoktaṃ- yasya vairāgyaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhamanuprāpnoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11375: kiñcāha- yaḥ sarvasukhalābhamicchati tena sarvāṇi kāmasukhāni tyaktavyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:11381: yasya cittaṃ rāgatṛṣṇāviviktaṃ tasya sarve duḥkhopāyāsā niruddhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11388: unmattavat pramattavacca na jānāti kurūpaṃ surūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:11391: kāmarāgo na vijānāti dharmaṃ andhatamasi ajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:11399: yathoktabhāvanāyogī so 'yaṃ tarati vai tadā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11407_2: sākūtasakākusasmitābhilāṣī durlabhakopaḥ sulabhapramodo bhūyasā dayālucittaḥ punaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:11413: yathoktaṃ- rūpasukhino [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparāgino rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāme duḥkhacittā viharanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11415: bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre nānādṛṣṭāntairimaṃ kāmarāgaṃ garhayati yaduta [āśī] viṣopamaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11438: (u) yaḥ sarvamanityamiti prajānāti na tasya kāmarāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:11439_0: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā [bhikṣavaḥ] bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā tadā sarvaḥ kāmarāgaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:11439_1: paryādīryate sarvaḥ rūparāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvo bhavarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvāvidyā
SA16hvsatssu:11440: yaḥ paśyati loko duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ rāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11442: yo nityaṃ smarati mayā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇānyanubhavitavyānīti sa imaṃ rāgaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:11449: kuśalapratyayasampannasya kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā dīnyekādaśasamādhyupakaraṇānīti paścānmārgasatye vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11456: yathā jñāyate rūgṇasya trivastusampannasya tasminneva samaye vyādhiḥ śāmyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11457: (pṛ) yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubha[bhāvanayā] rāgaṃ nirvāpaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11458: kasmāt bhavān bravīti aśubhādi anityatādi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11461: ādau aśubhayā rāgo vāryate paścādanityatājñānena prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11462: aśubhayā audariko rāgo 'panīyata itīdaṃ bahūnāṃ jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:11475: kaścit dveṣī parān nindituṃ daṇḍena tāḍayituñcecchati /
SA16hvsatssu:11487: kaścit dveṣī sahasā kiñcit gṛhītvā nānākāraṇai[rna] tyaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:11492: kaścit dveṣī hitalābhinaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā citte mātsaryamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11494: kaścit dveṣī sadā kalahapriyo dhṛṣṭamanovāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11497: kaścit dveṣī ciramātsaryeṇa śīlamupadiṣṭo 'pi punaḥ pratilomayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11500: kaścit dveṣī kiñcidabhīṣṭasya amanaḥprahlādanasya vastuno lābhe kṣubhitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11503: kaścit dveṣī asukumāravacanaḥ sadā bhrukuṭilālaso na manaḥ pūrvamālāpaṃ yojayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11509: kaścit dveṣī kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ satīrthyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭopāyāsaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:11512: kaścit dveṣī sadā garhāprakaṭanaprīto vigītavastupriyaśca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11515: dveṣo 'yaṃ dvividhaḥ- kadācitsattvamupādāya bhavati kadācidasattvamupādāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11525: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11526: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11527: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11528: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam /
SA16hvsatssu:11530: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:11534: ātmabuddhimadhyayasya [tatra] mānaparipoṣaṇaṃ padārthādhyavasānañcetyevamādipratyayeṣu satsu dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11537: (u) uktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11550: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat /
SA16hvsatssu:11551: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha- dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro 'praśāntabuddhiśayaḥ sadā bhīrucitto janānāmaśraddheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11554: bhrukuṭikṣepeṇa durabhigamo 'saṃśliṣṭamukhavarṇo durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī sajjanavidveṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:11564: (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11572: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11575: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11579: dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11582: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11583: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11586: (u) yo 'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11589: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11591: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti,
SA16hvsatssu:11596: aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11610: mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11612: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11614: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:11618: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11621: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11623: kiñcaivaṃ cintayet- aśubhanindādinā na mama duḥkhamiti vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11624: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti- kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe 'pi vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11627: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11628: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:11629: so 'tīva hryapatrapāsāpekṣaḥ cintayati ahaṃ mahāpuruṣasya bhagavataḥ śrāvako mārgabhāvayitā /
SA16hvsatssu:11631: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11640: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11649: sūtre ca vidyāyā artho vivṛtaḥ- yasya kasyacit jñānaṃ vidyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:11660: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā /
SA16hvsatssu:11662: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11667: pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11672: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve dharmā abhāvāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11678: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpāpi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11688: vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyeti yathā vadanti loke- adho 'rūpadarśī,
SA16hvsatssu:11690: viparītā vidyā avidyeti- yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11698: arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyāvidyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11712: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11717: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11735: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato 'vidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11745: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtasya [bhikṣavo vālasya] tṛṣṇāsamprayuktasyaivamayaṃ kāyaḥ samudāgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11746: siṃha nādasūtre coktam- upādānāni tṛṣṇānidānānīti / gāthā cāha-
SA16hvsatssu:11750: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo 'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11751: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11753: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11758: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe 'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:11759: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11765: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11771: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11773: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11781: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11787: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11791: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11792: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11793: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11802: susthāne prītivigataḥ sajjanadveṣī durjanasnidgho 'bhiprāyasya viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:11803: na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho 'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:11805: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11809: apariśuddho 'nairyāṇiko bhāṣaṇe 'paṭuḥ sadā krodhopanāhamuditaḥ paropadeśaṃ viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11818: kasmātsūtra uktam- avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11820: hetau bhrāntā vadanti- īśvarā dayo lokakāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11832: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto 'nyo 'sti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11833: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11834: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye 'ntadvaye na patati /
SA16hvsatssu:11835: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11840: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11841: ekadharmasya nāmno 'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11845: api coktam- saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11847: ukta ñca sūtre- yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11848: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ (SSS_307) paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11849: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so 'parapratyayaḥ paramārthato buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11852: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe- yā kācana prajñā sarvā sāvidyāvyāvartinīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11853: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate //
SA16hvsatssu:11876: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha- na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:11882: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato 'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo 'samuddhataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11888: (u) dhyānābhyāse 'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11895: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11896: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet- atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11900: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11905: tathāyamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11906: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:11918: yat sujane pūjye pṛṣṭhato 'satkāra uddhatamānaḥ saḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11922: yathoktaṃsūtre- ye kecit [śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā] anityena rūpeṇa [duḥkhena vipariṇāmadharmeṇa] śreṣṭho 'hamasmīti samanupaśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11923: sadṛśo ['hamasmāti samanupaśyanti] hīno ['hamasbhīti samanupaśyanti] kimanyatra yathābhūtasyādarśanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11930: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco 'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11931: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve 'pi asthimāṃsasnāyusirāpañcasandhipeśīkalalasamavāyamayakāyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11934: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11935: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11939: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11941: śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11944: kaḥ prājño 'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11949: na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11966: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11972: (u) ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo 'satkāracitto 'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
SA16hvsatssu:11978: śāstramāha- vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:11982: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11983: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11984: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11985: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:11986: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11988: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11989: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11990: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11991: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11993: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:11994: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:11996: sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11997: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12002: pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati (SSS_311)
SA16hvsatssu:12003: puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:12005: dvidhāśravaṇam- yadi kaścicchṛṇoti asti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12008: dvidhājñānam- yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12015: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12016: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12024: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12030: yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12032: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro 'nādirityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12034: (u) vicikitsābahulasya laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaṃ na sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:12036: sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:12044: kiñcāha bhagavān- vicikitsā nāma tamaso rāśiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:12045: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12048: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12050: tadyathāha- aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12051: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12054: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:12055: uktañca sūtre- vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12071: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12073: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate /
SA16hvsatssu:12078: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati //
SA16hvsatssu:12087: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12097: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12099: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12104: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12112: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:12118: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyānātmatāṃ śrutvā mahābhītimutpādayanti ātmā na bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:12120: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante /
SA16hvsatssu:12124: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12126: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:12127: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12128: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12131: svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12136: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12139: (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12141: hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayet,
SA16hvsatssu:12151: tadyathā andha[kalpa]sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12154: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ vibhinnān /
SA16hvsatssu:12166: aṇoraṇiyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12185: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:12203: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12204: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12211: lokasatyato 'styātmā paramārthato nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12212: paramārthato nāsti saṃvṛtito 'stīti vadan na dṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:12214: yathā vyāghrī svapotaṃ mukhenāpaharati atiniṣṭhuragrahaṇe kṣataṃ [bhavediti] atiśithilagrahaṇe bhraṃśo [bhavediti] /
SA16hvsatssu:12221: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito 'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12228: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12230: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12233: ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ jvālāvacca santānenotpannatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12236: tadā pṛthagjanā vyāmuhya yadi vā ucchedavāde pateyuḥ yadi vā skandhānāṃ nāstītākathane avineyāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12237: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:12246: saṃvṛtyāstīti kathane na tadā punaḥ paramārthato (SSS_317)
SA16hvsatssu:12248: uktañca sūtre- yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:12250: ato jñāyate pañca skandhā api na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12253: mahāśūnyatāsūtra uktam- yadidaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanaṃ yadi vāyaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[-lakṣaṇa] iti vacanaṃ /
SA16hvsatssu:12254: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva jīvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:12257: kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12258: yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti nairātmyasyābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:12259: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam /
SA16hvsatssu:12264: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre- rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā]kṣayāya [pratipadyata] tadyathā pāṃsvāgārikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12271: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12272: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
SA16hvsatssu:12274: yathāha sūtram- rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo vidalayata sattvakṣayāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12275: asmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12276: pūrvasmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā vikīrṇā niruddhāḥ te dharmaśūnyā bhavanti iti //
SA16hvsatssu:12280: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha]dṛṣṭirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12281: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- yadā kaścidāha ātmā śāśvato vā aśāśvato veti iyamevāntagrahadṛṣṭiḥ na sarve dharmāḥ[śāśvatā vā aśāśvatā vā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12283: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu pratyakṣaṃ [yat] bāhyaṃ vastu samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12290: asti ca nāsti ca karma paraṃ maraṇādityatra yadastīti sa śāśvata[vādaḥ] yannāstīti sa ucchedavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12292: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12295: uktañca sūtre- ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni nirudhyante santyanyānīti śāśvatavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12297: ātmā pūrvamakarot paścātkariṣyatīti yaddarśanaṃ sā śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ ātmā pūrvaṃ nākarot paścānna kariṣyatītīyamucchedadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12298: api cāha mithyādṛṣṭisūtram- puruṣasya saptakāyāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ sukhaṃduḥkhaṃ jīvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12300: kiñcāha- kṣureṇa ca krakacena prāṇino hatvā [eka]māṃsapuṃñca kuryāt nāsti [tato nidānaṃ]pāpaṃ [nāsti pāpasyāgama] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12303: asti paralokaḥ yaḥ kārakaḥ sa eva vedaka iti yadvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:12307: (u) yena hetunā bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12308: yena hetunā na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānamucchedadṛṣṭirbhavati /

SA16hvsatssu:12963: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute] 'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:12964: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12965: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ- yaḥ kāyo 'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12973: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:12974: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12977: (SSS_336) ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:12979: asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame 'nye pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12989: (u) sūtra uktaṃ- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet- mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā,
SA16hvsatssu:13007: naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13026: evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13028: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13034: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13041: uktaṃ hi sūtre- bālānāṃ maithunacittameva nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:13046: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- satkāyadṛṣṭisamucchede 'nuśayāḥ sahaiva samucchidyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13049: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:13051: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte 'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:13068: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave 'pi jvarārta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13073: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13075: yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13088: yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13103: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13107: vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13115: mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet- bhagavataḥ śāsane 'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na (SSS_339)
SA16hvsatssu:13128: evaṃ cintayati- ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13146: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13163: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13178: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13187: (pṛ) daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo 'vidyāsamprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:13198: ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13209: sūtra uktam- mahābrahmā brahmakāyikānāmantryāha mā bhavanto śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramantu /
SA16hvsatssu:13213_0: uktañca sūtre- [atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā
SA16hvsatssu:13213_1: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- ahamapi na jānāmi yatremāni catvāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣāṇi nirudhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13218: īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca [tatrā] akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13219: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13226: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13229: kiñcāhurābhidharmikāḥ- yaḥ kuśalaḥ na [sa] kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13246: varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13259: ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13269: (u) ime sarve dvidhāpi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:13270: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13276: yathā srotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:13277: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13278: (u) pūrvoktāḥ satyadarśanaheyāḥ ṣaḍanuśayāścaturdhā bhavanti duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13294: yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13298: ato duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajānāti- śīlaṃ duḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:13310: (pṛ) rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadaurmanasyendriye varjayitvā [tadanya]trividhendriyasamprayuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13317: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13319: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13321: evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13324: samudayasatya[darśana]heyāśca mithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsā rāgapratighamānaviprayuktāvidyāśca ime sarvatragānuśayā anye 'sarvatragānuśayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13344: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13348: rāgaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇālambano 'pi caturo devān tadadhastanāṃśca saṃkleśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13349: yathāha dīrghanakhasūtram- sarvaṃ kṣamata itīdaṃ saṃrāgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:13356: uktaṃ hi sūtre- īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti jīva ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13362: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran /
SA16hvsatssu:13364: cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13367: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13371: manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:13372: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti //
SA16hvsatssu:13375: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- kleśā navavidhā- adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama madhyamamadhyamamadhyamottamā uttamādhamottamamadhyamottamottamā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13385: karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni tānyagaṇayanannapi kṣīṇamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prajānāti idaṃ kṣīṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13386: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13387: ato jñāyate 'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13388: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13390: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā- prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13391: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vināpi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13393: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13398: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva /
SA16hvsatssu:13403: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13404: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13406: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13417: (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13420: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13429: (pṛ) [nanu] sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhānanityādinā bhāvayitvā srotaāpattipalaṃ yāvadarhatphalaṃ vindate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13435: ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13440: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13447: ato jñāyate 'saṃskṛtālambano mārga eva kleśān prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13463: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13494: yathoktaṃ bhagavatāsūtre- yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:13497: ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13498: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13504: anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:13507: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13514: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13515: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:13522: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13523: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13525: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13528: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13542: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu śāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:13549: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13557: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:13560: ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13568: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13572: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13573: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke 'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13576: ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13586: jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13592: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13600: kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13611: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13612: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu kāmadeveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13617: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13622: śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13627: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:13629: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle 'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13632: yathāpi mūle 'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13633: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye 'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13635: svato 'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta /
SA16hvsatssu:13647: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe 'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13649: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke 'bhiramante /
SA16hvsatssu:13654: prārthanā hi dvividhā- kāmaprārthanā bhavaprārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13661: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13681: catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13685: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13686: catasraḥ kāyavedanāḥ- kaścidātmaghātako na paraghātaka ityādayaścatasraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13689: catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ- rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam /
SA16hvsatssu:13729: kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13737: [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:13745: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo 'pi kramaśo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13749: draṣṭavyamavaśyaṃ rāgādipratyayamidānīmāyatyāñca glānyupāyāsān labhanta ityato 'vaśyaṃ [teṣāṃ] prahāṇaṃ prārthayante /
SA16hvsatssu:13757: bhagavānāha- tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13777: śāstramāha- trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:13785: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13790: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13791: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat- dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:13792: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13794: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve satye paramārthasatyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13805: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13809: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13816: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13820: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:13821: evaṃ jinaśāanamādāvagādhagabhīram- tadyathā mahāsamudraḥ kramaśo gabhīraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13823: yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13824: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut- paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13825: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam /
SA16hvsatssu:13826: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvātha paramārthajñānena vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13827: uktañca sūtre- dharmāṇāṃ pravicayapūrvakaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parijñātavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13828: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:13840: yathoktaṃ sūtre- lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13841: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13843: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13848: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13856: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13857: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13859: yathoktaṃ sūtre- arhantī bhikṣuṇī pāpīyāṃsaṃ māramavocat-
SA16hvsatssu:13860: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:13871: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13873: yathāha bhagavān- ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:13874: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13876: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:13880: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13881: yo 'yaṃ lokasatyato 'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:13883: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13886: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13887: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13888: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13901: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto 'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13902: evaṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathito 'pi na vastusan bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13903: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:13907: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13909: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13927: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13941: yathā kaścidaśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati- aśvaṃ paśyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13957: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13958: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13959: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati /
SA16hvsatssu:13960: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13966: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13973: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān /
SA16hvsatssu:13983: yathāha bhagavān- vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:13992: yathāha- [kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā /
SA16hvsatssu:14006: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14008: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14009: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14010: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14012: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14013: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14014: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14016: (pṛ) nirodhasatye 'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14017: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye /
SA16hvsatssu:14018: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14021: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14036: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:14042: pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī /
SA16hvsatssu:14049: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:14064: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:14075: anirvacanīyatvam- rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14082: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:14090: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14106: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14107: laukikā vadanti- pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14108: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana /
SA16hvsatssu:14109: anyadharmalakṣaṇenāvaśyaṃ pradarśyate- yathā amukasya puruṣasya kuṭīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14116: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14117: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14121: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14124: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo 'stītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14125: yathā bhagavānāha- santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14128: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14137: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14153: na (SSS_363) syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:14158: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati- vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:14166: yathā pūrvamuktaṃ- śabdo rūpādivyatiriktaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ santānapravṛttaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14168: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti //
SA16hvsatssu:14190: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14194: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14201: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:14202: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14203: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14207: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14208: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14209: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannāpi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14210: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14213: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro 'madhuro vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14214: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14216: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14217: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14229: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14235: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14243: indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14255: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14263: yathā andho 'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko 'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14267: bhavatāṃ sūtre 'pyuktam- kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam- adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:14270: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14279: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14280: ato jñāyate mate ['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14284: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam //
SA16hvsatssu:14299: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14311: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate 'nirvācya iti //
SA16hvsatssu:14315: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14316: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho 'pi abhāvaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14318: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14320: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14321: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo [yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14338: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14343: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14349: tathā ca kena kāraṇenāha- sarvamabhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14351: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:14353: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so 'bhāva ityucyate //
SA16hvsatssu:14363: avayavinyagrāhye 'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam /
SA16hvsatssu:14374: sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato 'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14403: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14404: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:14407: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14436: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vāprāpya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14447: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14450: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14461: tathā hi- yadi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurāśritaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:14463: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14464: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo 'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14471: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14489: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14494: śabdo 'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathāpi na śravaṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14523: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathāsti doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14527: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14534: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14537: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14547: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvāpi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:14559: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:14567: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14568: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14572: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14574: yadi (SSS_372) hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14575: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:14576: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14585: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14615: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:14619: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14620: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe 'nyonyahetuke /
SA16hvsatssu:14631: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:14641: na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ (SSS_373) kurvantam /
SA16hvsatssu:14648: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati- āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14660: garbhe 'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:14669: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati- evaṃ kartavyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:14679: yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti- sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14699: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14703: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham /
SA16hvsatssu:14708: tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14711: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14712: upadeśe 'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān /
SA16hvsatssu:14714: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14715: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ- vastu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14718: yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā,
SA16hvsatssu:14721: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate /
SA16hvsatssu:14723: tathāgatastu āha- santi pañca skandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14724: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti //
SA16hvsatssu:14732: (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14733: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14734: (pṛ) yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo 'vināśadharmo 'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14746: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14747: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14750: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14753: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14757: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati /
SA16hvsatssu:14760: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14766: kiñcāhaikaṃ sūtrama- rūpaṃ rādha tathā vibhida,
SA16hvsatssu:14768: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:14770: bhāvanā ca dvividhā- śūnya[tā]bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14772: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14773: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14784: bhagavānāha- saṃskārāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santi māyāvat nirmitavat /
SA16hvsatssu:14786: paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam- ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14787: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14788: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14793: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14794: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam,
SA16hvsatssu:14796: (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:14798: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14799: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14802: ya āha- sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram,
SA16hvsatssu:14806: yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14807: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14815: uktañca sūtre- yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:14823: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14831: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14834: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo 'pi satyamiti vaktum /
SA16hvsatssu:14837: tathā yo 'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:14841: yathāhānandaḥ- dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:14843: kṣemakaḥ pratyāha- na khalvāyuṣmanto rūpamasmīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:14858: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14862: na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:14864: yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte 'vatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:14865: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14869: phenasūtre bhagavānāha- yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:14884: ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14900: yathāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14901: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi /
SA16hvsatssu:14905: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14906: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14908: ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve 'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti //
SA16hvsatssu:14926: śāstramāha- etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ)
SA16hvsatssu:14929: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14933: anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14935: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14937: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14940: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:14941: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante /
SA16hvsatssu:14942: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:14943: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14948: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:14950: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14953: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:14955: saṃsāre 'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14956: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14957: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14960: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14964: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:14965: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14968: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate /
SA16hvsatssu:14974: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:14987: mārgasatyam- āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ samyak dṛṣṭiryāvat samyak samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14995: yadi bahuvāraṃ na bhāvayati tadā kṣiprameva vikṣipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15011_1: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ dukhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāmimārgamāryasatyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15015: ato jñāyate laukikaṃ lokottarañca hitaṃ samāhitacittenaiva labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15018: yathoktaṃ sūtre avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye /
SA16hvsatssu:15020: (SSS_383) vidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye anvageva hrīḥ apatrāpyam /
SA16hvsatssu:15023: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ satkuśalaṃ samādhimupādāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15027: (pṛ) uktaṃ bhavatā cittasyaikatrāvasthānaṃ samādhilakṣaṇamiti tatra samādhiścittañcaikaṃ uta bhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:15047: yathā pūrvamuktam- yatra cittaṃ sukhi bhavati tasminnālambane 'vatiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15056: tasya kālasya dvividhaṃ nāma samādhiriti prajñā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:15062: sā samādhirdvividhā ekā vimuktihetuḥ aparā avimuktihetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15070: cittaṃ kiñcitkālamavasthāya yadi parīttamālambanaṃ paśyati[tadā] parīttetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15077: yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇaṃ dravayati tāpayati secayati kāle ca sthapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15090: samādherasyāstrividha upāyaḥ samādhyavatāropāyaḥ samādhyavasthānopāyaḥ samādhivyutthānopāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15098: (u) yogāvacaraḥ svacittalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇan evaṃ pragṛhṇan evaṃ vyuttiṣṭhan evaṃ parityajan samādhāvavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:15107: yathā kiñcidviśuddharūpaṃ kiñcitprakāśarūpañca dṛṣṭvā vadeta- mahāhitaṃ labdhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15108: anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamityādyanusmarataḥ cittaṃ na sukhi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15128: prathamadvitīyau yadi dāntau samau tadā labhete //
SA16hvsatssu:15134: (u) ekāṅgabhāvana iti yat samādhiṃ bhāvayati na prajñām /
SA16hvsatssu:15136: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti samādhiṃ bhāvayati prajñāñca bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15141: yathā sthaviro bhikṣurāha- yogāvacaraḥ samādhinā cittaṃ bhāvayan prajñāmupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15142: prajñayā cittaṃ bhāvayan samādhimupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15143: samādhinā prajñayā ca cittaṃ bhāvayan svabhāvamupādāya vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15144: svabhāvo nāma yaḥ prahāṇasvabhāvaḥ viyogasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15147: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- ekāṅgabhāvana iti yadi samādhimupādāya raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:15149: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti yat rūpañca paśyati raśmiñca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15150: āryaḥ samyaksamādhiriti yat śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ pratilabdhaḥ samādhiḥ (SSS_386) iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15152: (u) raśmimātraṃ paśyati na rūpamiti nāsti kiñcana sūtram sūtre kevalamuktam- ahaṃ prakṛtito raśmimapaśyaṃ rūpamapyapaśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:15155: bhavatā ca vaktavyaṃ kena kāraṇena raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpam ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:15157: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyato 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15159: (u) yadi yogāvacaro na paśyati sattvaṃ nāpi dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:15168: śūnyaṃ bhāvayan hitaṃ labhate yaduta nimittaṃ na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15175: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yaḥ samādhiḥ śūnyānātmākāreṇa bhavati ayaṃ śūnya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15176: ya ākāro 'nityato duḥkhato hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayato mārgato yathāvadācarato niryāṇato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15178: ya ākāro nirodhata upaśamataḥ praṇītato viyogato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15181: (u) yadāha bhavān- anityato duḥkhata ākāraḥ apraṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15184: bhagavān sadā vadati yadanityaṃ tadeva duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:15188: hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayata ākāra iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:15191: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yatkiñcitsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti paśyan nirvidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15195: yathāsūtramuktam hīnaṃ madhyamaṃ praṇidhānaṃ na mārga āsaktijanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:15197: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhānnirodha ityucyate iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:15201: ato jñāyate ime traya ekārthakā iti na syādbheda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15206: (u) śūnyena pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā ekena śūnyena punarimaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:15208: apraṇihitena pañcaskandhān nirvidya apraṇihitena punarimamapraṇihitaṃ nirvedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15210: animittena pañcaskandhān praśāntān dṛṣṭvā animittena punaranimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15212: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- traya ime samādhayaḥ sāsravā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15228: yogāvacareṇa hi sāsravāṇāmanāsravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodho 'dhigantavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15239: bhagavānāha- dvitīyadhyānaṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāmne saṃvartate anyadharmāya saṃvartate yathā piṇḍapātāya śrāvastyāṃ praveśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15258: tadarthamāha- pañcakāmasukhānāṃ viyoge paramaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhaṃ pratilabhadhva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15261: laukikā vadanti sukhaṃ gṛhasthasya na pravrajitasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:15262: ato bhagavānāha- idaṃ pravrajitasya dṛṣṭadharme sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15268: dvitīyā samādhibhāvanā laukikahitāya bhavati yaduta jñānadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:15277: yogāvacaro yā vedanā vitarkāḥ saṃjñā utpadyante sarvā[stāḥ] pratijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15288: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmudayavyayānudarśī skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15290: sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi hitāni caturṣu saṅgṛhītānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15291: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- caturthadhyāne 'rhatphalaṃ pratilabhamānasya ānantaryamārga āsravakṣaya ityucyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15293: (u) na hi tatrāsti viśiṣṭahetuḥ caturthadhyānamātrasyānantaryamārga āsravakṣayo nānyasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:15310: yathā suvijñaḥ suvijñāya sadā hitaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:15311: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ kṛte sadā sukhaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:15314: (u) nityaṃ lakṣyata aihikāmuṣmikahitasukhaprakarṣaprārthanāṃ kurvan naiva viruddhāsukhaprārthanām /
SA16hvsatssu:15315: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sattvānāṃ sukhameva prārthayate nāsukham /
SA16hvsatssu:15320: (u) citte dveṣasmṛtimutpādya satvān tāḍayituṃ vihisituṃ vā icchati /
SA16hvsatssu:15326: yogāvacarasya sarvasattvānāṃ lābhaprakarṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahatī prītirbhavati yathātmano hitalābhe /
SA16hvsatssu:15331: na kaścidadviṣan duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dayate /
SA16hvsatssu:15332: yadā sarveṣu sattveṣu paramaṃ maitracittaṃ kaścidduḥkhopadravasambhrāntaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭveva samācaratitasmin samaye pravṛttaṃ maitracittaṃ karuṇetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15333: atha vā kaścit parasya duḥkhe karuṇāmutpādayannapi na parasyotkarṣe pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15336: kiṃ punarlabdhavijayaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā [na] pramodyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15337: yogāvacaraḥ sarvasattvān samṛddhilābhino dṛṣṭvā svābhedataḥ pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15339: ato jñāyate maitrīcittaviśeṣaḥ karuṇā muditā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:15341: (u) śatruṃ mitrañca paśyato maitracittaṃ na samamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:15346: ato yogāvacaro mitre maitramupekṣya śatrau śātravamupekṣya cittasāmyaṃ cikīrṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:15349: ataḥ sūtra uktam- rāgapratighaprahāṇāyopekṣāṃ bhāvaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15355: yathā vadanti uttamamaitracittena trīṇi dhyānāni bhāvayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15367: ] nāsmai agnirvā viṣaṃ vā śastraṃ vā kramate /
SA16hvsatssu:15370: yogāvacaro 'nusmarati- ahaṃ vyāpādamutpādya ahameva vipākamanubhavāmi nānya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15372: kiñca yogāvacaro manasi karoti ahamalpakena pāpakena anyasya kṛtena bahūni pāpakāni tacchataguṇāni tadabhinnānyanubhavāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:15379: garbhiṇī prasavitrī ca madarthaḥ duḥkhaṃ vyavasyamānā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15380: atha vā syāt mama pitā bhrātā bhāryā putro vā /
SA16hvsatssu:15383: anusmareccāgāminyadhvani mama pitā mātā bhrātā vā bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15384: arhan pratyekabuddho buddho vā bhavediti [anusmaraṇaṃ] kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15388: pūrvañca nibhṛtaṃ paśyet janasya svabhāvaḥ kuśalo 'kuśala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15398: kṣāntiguṇo yogāvacaro 'nuvicintayati- ahaṃ yadi paraṃ dviṣāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:15399: tadā pṛthagjanasya grāmīṇasya tasya [mama] ca nāsti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15407: na kṣametādhamaḥ sattvaḥ śilavṛṣṭiṃ yathā khagaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:15409: kṣameta hi māhasattvaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ yathā gajaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15413: yogāvacara ime sattvā mūḍhā avijñā bālasamānā na vidveṣyā iti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15418: atyantasukhāsaktān dṛṣṭvā ca cintayati- kathamahaṃ parapraṇihitaṃ hāpayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15420: duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhitvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15421: sukhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā anitya[sukha]tvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15422: ataḥ sarve sattvā duḥkhabhāgina ādāvante vā na vimuktilābhina ityanena pratyayena karuṇāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15424: (u) yogāvacaraḥ parahiterṣyālutā pṛthagjanalakṣaṇamiti dṛṣṭvā muditāṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15435: (u) viṣamacitte doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittasāmyacikīrṣayā upekṣāṃ carati /
SA16hvsatssu:15439: (pṛ) ābhidharmikāḥ kecidāhuḥ- tṛtīyadhyānādūrdhvaṃ nāsti saumanasyendriyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15460: yaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhākāṃkṣī sa sukhavipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15463: ākāśe ca rūpaṃ nāstītyato vijñānānantyāyatanacittasyālambane paramasukhavihāritvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15475: bhagavānapramāṇasūtra āha- iha bhikṣurmaitrasahagatena cetasā ekāṃ diśaṃ[sphuritvā viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15476: tathā] dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ caturthī ityūrdhvamadhastiryak[sarvadā sarvatratāyai] sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ [maitrasahagatena cetasā] sphuritvā viharati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15477: rūpārūpyakadhātukasattvā anityā bhaṅgurā durgati gāmina ityasti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15479: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- kāmadhātugato yogāvacara evāpramāṇānyupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15482: (pṛ) yadi tanna jātā api upasampadya viharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15489: (u) astīdṛśaṃ karma satyapi nivṛttihetau na nivartante /
SA16hvsatssu:15497: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi kaścidekāgracittena dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15505: ata ucyate maitrī bhāvanayā anāgāmiphalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15518: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkṣayāya vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15521: duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā [tat] apaneṣyāmīti niyamena cittoddhāpanaṃ mahākaruṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:15525: karuṇācittaṃ hi parasya pāpakaṃ smṛtvā pratighātamutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:15531: ātmano hitaṃ tyaktvā parasya hitamātramākāṃkṣata iti mahākaruṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:15537: uktaṃ hi sūtre- pañcāṅga[bhūtā] āryasamādhayaḥ yaduta prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaviśuddhiḥ prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15543: prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇasya hetuṃ kṛtvā pañcaskandhān paribhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15548: (u) bhagavān svayamāha- yogī cintayati mamāyaṃ samādhirāryo nirāmiṣa iti prathamajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15550: samādhirayaṃ śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ prītipraśrabdhilabdha iti tṛtīyajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15551: ayaṃ samādhiḥ pratyutpannasukha āyatyāñca sukhavipāka iti caturthajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15552: sa khalu punarahamimaṃ samādhiṃ smṛta eva samāpadye smṛta eva vyuttiṣṭhāmīti pañcamaṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15558: samādhiṃ kṛtvā āryaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ chandayāmītīdaṃ prathamajñānamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15574: ato nityaṃ smṛto vyuttiṣṭhati smṛtaḥ samādhimusampadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15581: (pṛ) uktaṃ sūtre- samādhayaḥ ṣaṭ aṣṭyekalakṣaṇabhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:15595: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya dhyānasamādhiṃ pañcaskandhopāya ñcotpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15597: (pṛ) kecidārmidharmikā āhuḥ- ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15598: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15599: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthaṃ dhyānamupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15600: nānālakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit pañcāṅgabhūtasamādhīnupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:15616: (u) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yogī nirodhasamāpattāvatāramicchatītyato dhyāneṣu samāpatti (= praveśa)
SA16hvsatssu:15618: tasmānna syāt yadi vānulomyena yadi vā prātilomyena yadi vānulomyaprātilomyena vyutkramādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15620: yogī nirodhasamāpattiṃ prāpayituravaśyaṃ kramaśo 'vataret kramaśaśca vyuttiṣṭhet /
SA16hvsatssu:15624: yathā ca vidagdho jano na punarabhiramate mūḍhe /
SA16hvsatssu:15633: yathā kaścit śreṇimāruhya ekaṃ sopānaṃ vyutkramet na dvau /
SA16hvsatssu:15638: sūtre yadyapyuktaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇaṃ samāpadyamāno 'nulomapratilomaṃ vyutkramya dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15643: yadi yogino nirodhasamāpattāvatāraṃ vadati tadānulomyena samāpattiḥ syāt naikakṣaṇe pañcadhā /
SA16hvsatssu:15644: yogī yadi sākṣānnirodhasamāpattyavatāramicchati tadā naikakṣaṇe syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15646: vaśitvāparihāṇitvāt anulomapratilomaṃ vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca /
SA16hvsatssu:15655: yaduktaṃ yathā na kaścit bālakrīḍāyāmabhiramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15657: yathā kaścidvṛddho naṭaḥ sarvadā nṛtyati na tṛpto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15659: evamāryaḥ anulomapratilomaṃ dhyāneṣu vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pradarśanakāmitvāt maharṣīṇāṃ samādhiṣu vaśitābalācca /
SA16hvsatssu:15660: bhagavān parinirvāṇagamanakāle paramapraṇītadhyānasamādhibhirvāsitaśarīratvāt svatantraṃ samāpadyata vyudatiṣṭhat anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ vyudakrāmīt /
SA16hvsatssu:15666: [tat] bodhisattvapiṭaka uktaṃ vyuktrāntilakṣaṇam- prathamadhyānāt vyutkramya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15672: śāstramāha- sapta niśrayāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityāsravakṣayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15678: samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayākhyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ prārthayīta /
SA16hvsatssu:15681: (u) bhagavānāha- yogī yenākāreṇa yenālambanena prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa yogī tadākāraṃ tadālambanaṃ na punaḥ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:15682: kintu paśyati prathamadhyāne yadrūpāṇi yadi vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15686: yogī kāmadhātumohitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nirvāṇamiti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15692: (u) uktaṃ hi susīmasūtre- atikramya sapta niśrayān asti āryamārgapratilambhanam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15694: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānasāmantakamaprāptabhūmiṃ niśritya [api] arhatphalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15707: kasmādāha bhagavān saptaniśrayāḥ sapta saṃjñāsamādhaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15709: sarve niśryāḥ saṃjñākaluṣitā na vimokṣāya bhavanti ityataḥ saṃjñāsamādhirityākhyā /
SA16hvsatssu:15710: āryāstu saṃjñāṃ bhaṅktvā samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayamupādadate /
SA16hvsatssu:15712: yathoktaṃ yogī dharmānimān paśyati rogato gaṇḍata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15716: śāstramāha- sūtra uktaṃ- aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ- adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati iti prathamo vimokṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15719: dvitīyavimokṣe hyuktam- adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15721: ato jñāyate yogāvacaraḥ prathamavimokṣe krameṇa kāyarūpamabhibhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15725: ato na paśyati adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā rūpañca /
SA16hvsatssu:15729: antarbahiśca no paśyan ahaṃ pṛcchāmi vastvidam // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15731: yathoktaṃ ṣaḍdhātusūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ pañcasu dhātuṣu atyantanirviṇṇaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:15749: (u) tīrthikā vimokṣādhimuktyā rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vināśayanti na tu śūnyabhāvanayā /
SA16hvsatssu:15751: yathābhāvanādhimuktiprayogaṃ mṛtaparityaktaṃ kāyaṃ śmāśānikakṛmayo bhakṣayanti ityādi paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15756: āryāḥ punarārūpyasamādhimupādāya caturaḥ skandhān rogata ityādyaṣṭabhirākāraiḥ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15765: na tu vivicya ayaṃ cittanirodhaḥ ayaṃ kleśakṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15766: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodho dvividhaḥ [kṣaya]nirodhaḥ anupūrvanirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15771: kiñcoktaṃ (SSS_402) sūtre nirodhasamāpattimupasampanno bhikṣuḥ kṛtakaraṇīya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15775: (u) sūtra uktaṃ śaikṣo navānupūrvasamādhīn labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15777: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15779: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15787: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā /
SA16hvsatssu:15800: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15801: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15803: eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15804: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15815: jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15823: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15827: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mama bhikṣavaścīvaramupāditsoḥ kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15834: kecidāhuḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catvāro 'rūpasamādhayaḥ sarve dhyānamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:15837: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha- śāriputraḥ- saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15844: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:15845: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā reṇuparyavasannaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15847: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15848: uktañca sūtre- asti vidyāsvabhāvaḥ asti śūnyasvabhāvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:15851: svabhāvaḥ astyākiñcanyāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15859: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyāvidyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15862: yathā bhagavān ekaṃ bhikṣumanuśāsti- śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15863: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15869: yogāvacara[ścintayati]- yatkiñcanamanaskāraḥ yatkiñcanakṛtakaraṇam sarveṣāṃ nirodhaḥ śreyāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:15871: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:15872: (u) sūtra uktam- vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15875: dvitīyasvabhāvo 'pi rūpopādāno rupamupādāya tathā vivecayati yathā śūnyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15877: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15879: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15881: (u) yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15883: (pṛ) eṣu vimokṣeṣu kati sāsravāḥ kati anāsravāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15888: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:15892: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat] idaṃ dvitīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15893: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15894: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15895_0: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā
SA16hvsatssu:15895_1: umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam /
SA16hvsatssu:15903: na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:15912: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede 'nāsravāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15915: ato bhagavān śrāvakāṇāṃ kṛta āha- abhibhvāyatanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15919: navānupūrvavihārāḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nirodhasamāpattiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:15920: prathamaṃ dhyānam- yathoktaṃ sūtre yogāvacaro vivicyaiva kāmairvivicyākuśalai (SSS_406)
SA16hvsatssu:15921: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15926: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15933: yathoktam- rūpādayaḥ padārthā na kāmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15935: vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15936: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15938: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:15940: yathoktaṃ mahānidānasūtre- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:15946: yathoktaṃ sūtre- savitarka savicāraṃ vihāraṃ viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15949: yadā samādhipariniṣpattyā cittaṃ na bhūyasā vikṣipati tadā vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15952: prītiriyaṃ prathamalabdhā kāyaṃ sukhayatīti sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15957: tadā na syāt pañcāṅgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam /
SA16hvsatssu:15960: uktañca sūtre- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /
