SA16hvsatssu:15963: tadā saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu prasrabdhibodhyaṅgaṃ na pṛthaguktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15968: prathamaṃ dhyānamapi pañcakāma[guṇā]nāṃ pratyāsannamiti [te] aṅgāni vaktavyāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15978: [tato] vyāvartane punassamādhinimittamupādāya tatrālambane cittaṃ samādhāya maulikaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15988: yathā śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatīti kiñcidviprarṣe 'pi sahetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15990: yathā bhūtapīḍitaḥ puruṣo [bhūta] anudgrame 'pi pīḍita ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15995: yathoktaṃ sūtre- praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15996: (pṛ) tathā cet kathaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15998: yathā saptabodhyaṅgāni kālābhisandhiṃ labdhvā caturdaśa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16007: prītau jātamātrāyāṃ kāyacitte aduṣṭhule sukumāre dānte ca bhavata ityataḥ praśrabdhirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16009: arogiṇaścaturmahābhūtānāmudayaḥ tadā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukhīti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:16012: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskārāṇāmanupūrvanirodhaḥ- tathāhi- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannasya vāk niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16013: yāvannirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16016: yadi mataṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkavicārasamprayuktamiti tadapi na yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:16018: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi yogāvacaraḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16019: tadā vāk niruddhā bhavati iti vitarkavicārau ca vāco hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16029: ato jñāyate prathamadhyāne vitarkavicārau syātām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16032: uktañca sūtre- prathamadhyānasya śabdaḥ kaṇṭaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16035: (u) prathamadhyāne samādhigataṃ cittaṃ kusume salilavat peśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:16046: [punaśca yogāvacaraḥ] vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāt adhyātmaṃ samprasādanaṃ cetasa ekotibhāvamavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16050: (u) yathā prathamadhyāne duḥkhendriye 'satyapi dvitīyadhyāne duḥkhendriyavyupaśama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16055: (u) prathamadhyāne santyapi vijñānāni na duḥkhendriyasyāśrayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16058: (u) tathā ce ddaurmanasyendriyaṃ manovijñānasvabhāvajamiti sarvatra bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:16072: ucyate ca duḥkhasya sukhasya ca prahāṇāt caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16074: yogāvacaraḥ prathamadhyāne 'paripūrṇasamādhiḥ sadā vitarkavicārābhyāṃ vikṣipyata ityata ucyate dvitīdhyāne vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16114: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye yogāvacaro dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:16115: asya pañca nīvaraṇāni tasmin samaye na bhavanti,
SA16hvsatssu:16116: saptabodhyaṅgāni ca tasmin samaye bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16121: pūrvaṃ prītau samutpannāyāṃ paścādanāsravaṃ yadyathābhūtadarśanaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16122: na ca sarvāḥ praśrabdhayaḥ prītiṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16126: na vayaṃ brūmo jñānavinirmukto 'sti pṛthagvedanādharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16132: bhagavān sadopekṣācitte viharatītyata āha- asti bhagavataḥ prītiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:16140: (pṛ) yathā dvitīyadhyāye 'sti prītiḥ nāsti tu daurmanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:16143: (u) sarveṣu dhyānasamādhiṣu asti daurmanasyaṃ yathā indriyārtheṣūcyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16149: anāsrave citte ca prīti rna bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:16152: uktaṃ hi sūtre- prathamadvitīyadhyānayoḥ kevalaṃ prītirasti na caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16159: kintu paśyati prathamadhyānagatāni rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍato yāvadanātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16160: (pṛ) rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghata ityetāni catvāri lokacaritāni nānāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:16161: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ pramāṇīkṛtya nānāsravaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:16168: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- prītisukhacittena catvāri satyāni pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16174: kiñca tatsūtraṃ prakāśayati na prītyā paramārthajñānaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16178: prītyāśca virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yadāryā ācakṣante upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16185: yogāvacaraḥ śāntaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ labhamāno dvitīyadhyānaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16188: yathā kaścit putrabhāryādibhiḥ sadā na prīto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16191: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi prītiṃ prathamata āgatāṃ tu sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16195: yogāvacaraḥ kena duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16197: yogāvacaro 'nayā prītyā pīḍita iti aprītisamādhau sukhasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:16206: yathā bhagavān kauśāmbibhikṣuvivikta āha- ahaṃ sukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16224: ataḥ sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:16230: puruṣo 'yaṃ prajñāyopekṣate yat prītāvādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvidyata ityataḥ sūpekṣāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16238: (u) nāhamasmin śāstre vadāmi vedanāvyatiriktaṃ pṛthagasti upekṣāsukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16257: sukhasya ca duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16270: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt cittaṃ neñjate /
SA16hvsatssu:16284: caturthadhyānaṃ prāpya sukharāgasya prahāṇāt smṛtiḥ pariśuddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:16303: (u) tathā cet aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā nānāsravā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16311: atra kāmadoṣo 'tisūkṣmaḥ duravabodhaḥ ato 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16322: parvataṃ vā ārohati tadāśvāsaḥ sthūlo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16336: uktaṃ hi sūtre- sukhavedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16348: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanaskārā danantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16353: etāḥ saṃjñā vividhakleśānāṃ vividhakarmaṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhānāṃ hetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16358: tatra saṃkṣepānnoktam asya samatikramādasya nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16359: kecidāhuḥ- sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñeti cakṣurvijñānāśritā saṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16365: pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyata iti vadato rūpaṃ saṅgrahītameva /
SA16hvsatssu:16367: rūpasaṃjñāṃ pratighasaṃjñāñca vinā nāsti pṛthaṅmanovijñānāśritaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:16374: kiñcāyaṃ kāyo maraṇavipannaḥ smaśānāgninā dagdhaḥ praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16375: ato jñāyate kāyo 'yaṃ pūrvaṃ sākāśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16377: (u) ādita ākāśālambanaḥ svīyaskandhālambanaḥ parakīyaskandhālambanaśca siddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16379: karuṇāśīrṣaka evaṃ cintayati- sattvā dayanīyā rūpasaṃjñāpīḍitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16385: rūpe tu cittaṃ na suprabuddhaṃ nābhiraktaṃ nābhyāsaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:16386: yathoktaṃ sūtre- āryaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān dṛṣṭvā saṃsmaran na tatrābhinandati na prabodhayati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:16391: yathā ca yogāvacaro rūpasaṃjñāvivikto 'pi ākāśāntena caturthadhyānamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:16410: (pṛ) asti punaḥ sūtravacanam- ālokaṃ pratītyākāśaṃ jānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16411: na rūpaṃ vihāyāstyanyo dharma ālokaṃ pratītya jñāpyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16439: (u) ākāśaṃ na pratyakṣadṛśyamiti pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt- yat tamasyapi jñāpyamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:16444: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- ṣaḍ dhāturayaṃ puruṣakāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16449: (u) yo vastusan dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16456: rūpe rūpaṃ pratihanyate rūpamasati viruddharūpe vivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16458: [yat] bhavānāha- na hi śaśaśṛṅga madṛśyamarūpamapratighamityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16468: abhāvamātreṇa kṛtakāstitālābhādabhāvadharma iti jñāyate ato 'yaṃ samādhiradita ākāśamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:16471: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- arūpasamāpattayo nirodhālambanā api ayaṃ anumānajñānabhāgīyaṃ nirodhamātramālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:16484: yathā kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cābhijñābalādanyasmin rūpe anyasmin citte sthito 'pi na cyavate /
SA16hvsatssu:16491: samādhiṃ vinā yadi saṃkleśaḥ yadi vā vvavadānam sarvamākāśānantyāyatanamityākhyāyate ? //
SA16hvsatssu:16495: sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya [anantaṃ vijñānamiti] vijñānānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16499: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi ākāśaṃ pratītya rūpaṃ paribhedayan [ākāśa]mapi parijihīrṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:16500: vijñānānantyāyatanamiti yogāvacaro vijñānenānantamākāśamityavalambamānaḥ tadā anantaṃ vijñāna[mapi ālambate] /
SA16hvsatssu:16507: tatpariśramanirviṇṇo vijñānaṃ paribhidya tatparijihīrṣayā ākiñcanyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16514: saṃjñā ca duḥkhopāyāyāsāya bhavati rogato gaṇḍataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16515: yasya saṃjñā nāsti sa punarmūḍho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16518: yogāvacaraḥ saṃjñāṃ vipadaṃ āsajñikaṃ sammohaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16526: yadi rūpadhātau cittaṃ niroddhumalaṃ bhavanti kasmādārūpyadhātau nālam /
SA16hvsatssu:16529: idānīṃ punaścittaṃ nirudhyate rūpacittayoryugapannirodhaṃ paśyata utrāsasammohaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16539: yathā nirmitagataṃ rūpam nirmitacitte punaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16544: asaṃjñi samāpattau ca na cittaṃ nirudhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:16550: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dīrgharātraṃ [hyetat bhikṣavaḥ] aśrutavataḥ] pṛthagjanasya adhyavasitaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmṛṣṭam etanmama eṣo 'hamasmi eṣa ma ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:16552: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- tīrthikāḥ trayāṇāmupādānānāṃ samucchedaṃ nirodhamupadiśanti nātmavādopādānasya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16554: yathā markaṭopamasūtram [aśrutavān] pṛthagjanaḥ kāyaṃ virajyeta na cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:16555: varaṃ [bhikṣavaḥ aśrutavān] pṛthagjana imaṃ cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāya[mātmata] upagacchet na tveva cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:16557: dṛśyate 'yaṃ [bhikṣava ścāturmahābhautikaḥ] kāya [ekamapi varṣaṃ] tiṣṭhan.....daśa varṣāṇi [tiṣṭhan] yāvacchatavarṣāṇyapi tiṣṭhan /
SA16hvsatssu:16558: yacca khalu [etadbhikṣava] ucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyayena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16562: ekameva bhikṣavo yadidamucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi /
SA16hvsatssu:16563: tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyāyena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16564: ] tatra śrutavān [bhikṣavaḥ] āryaśrāvakaḥ pratītya samutpādameva sādhukaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:16567: sarve tīrthikā avikalpapratyayajñānatvāt na cittaṃ nirodhayitumalam /
SA16hvsatssu:16575: pṛthagjanānāñca dharmo [yat] uttamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratītyāvarāṃ bhūmiṃ vijahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16577: kintu samādhibalena sūkṣmasaṃjñāmabhimukhīkṛtya cittasya prabodhāt vadati nāsti saṃjñeti /
SA16hvsatssu:16582: yathā vā sammūrchābhraṣṭacetanāḥ suṣuptāḥ krimayaḥ śītibhūtamakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16584: tathā tatrāpi vastutaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ satyāmapi saṃvṛtito 'saṃjñītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16587: sarvaśonaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16591: (u) uktaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ dhyānasamādhiṣu santi vitarkavicāraprītisukhādayo dharmā iti ato nocyate sarvaśaḥ samatikramyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:16601: (pṛ) yat sahaivoktaṃ asti kaṇṭako yaduta rūpasaṃjñā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:16611: yat bhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ navānupūrvikeṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodha iti tat virudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16613: kleśānāṃ kṣayarūpā vimokṣeṣu vartate kleśānāmakṣayarūpā anupūrvaṃ [vihāre]ṣu vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:16619: atra saṃjñānāṃ vyupaśame 'pi anyasaṃyojanānāṃ sattvāt punaranutpādikā na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16629: yathā caturthadhyāne cittacaittān nirundhya āsaṃjñike praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:16633: niruddhacittameva nirodha ityucyate na punaranyo 'sti dharmo nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16634: ato jñāyate imā navabhūmīrvihāyāpyasti cittanirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16640: saṃjñākārāṇāṃ prajñaptigatatvāt prajñaptiśca dvividhā- hetusaṃghātaprajñaptiḥ dharmaprajñaptiśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:16643: ataḥ saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau sarvanirodha ukto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16654: saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau ca sarvacittacaittānāṃ nirodha ukto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16669: (u) aṣṭavimokṣāḥ sarve kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharantīti vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16679: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi sattvo 'cittaka ityato 'yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:16680: uktañca sūtre- āyurūsma vijñānamime trayo dharmāḥ sadāvyabhicāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16696: cittameva cetanā manaskāro bhavatītyavaśyaṃ nirodhena taṃ samatikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:16708: atrocyate / yadbhavānāha- nāstyacittakaḥ sattva iti acitta[tā] sāmye 'pi maraṇe 'sti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16709: yathā sūtre paripṛcchati- yo 'yaṃ [bhante] mṛtaḥ [kālakṛtaḥ] yaścāyaṃ (SSS_425)
SA16hvsatssu:16716: āyurūṣma tu kāyād vibhaktaṃ vartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16738: yathā cakṣū niruddhaṃ sat na tadvijñānaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16741: yanmanaḥ yacca manovijñānam ime dve mithaḥ pratisambandhinī /
SA16hvsatssu:16744: yadavocaḥ santānasamuccheda eva cittaṃ nirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16746: trividho hi nirodhaḥ- rūpanirodhaḥ cittanirodhaḥ kadācidrūpacittobhayanirodhaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:16747: kadācidrūpasya nirodho na tu cittasya yathā nirodhasamāpattisamāpanne /
SA16hvsatssu:16749: yadavocaḥ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno na mṛta ityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16753: puruṣasyāsya ca āyurūṣma pratītya cittaṃ punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16755: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yadi niruddhaṃ cittaṃ punarjāyate, (SSS_426)
SA16hvsatssu:16762: yathā nirodhasamāpattivarga uktam- nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni kāyajīvitañca pratītya punarvyuttiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16764: nirvāṇaṃ praviṣṭasya cittaṃ paraṃ na punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16768: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodhasamāpattervyutthitasya cittaṃ nirvāṇabhāgīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16776: yathā sukṛṣṭe kṣetre sasyamavaśyaṃ bahulaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16791: asyāḥ samāpattervyutthito nirvāṇālambana ityataḥ prajñaptisaṃjñayā viviktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16792: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasya dānapateḥ satkāraṃ bhuṅktvā apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya (SSS_427) viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16797: kiñca aṣṭabhirguṇai ralaṅkṛtamidaṃ puṇyakṣetram- samyak dṛṣṭiḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:16798: nirvāṇālambanaṃ cittaṃ anyāni cāṅgāni taiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16812: nirvāṇaṃ pratītya hi nānye skandhāḥ samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:16815: yogāvacarāṇāmīdṛśo dharmaḥ syāt nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanne praṇihitānugamanāccittaṃ na pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:16817: (pṛ) imāṃ samāpattimevānupūrvaṃ samāpadyata iti kimanupūrvameva vyuttiṣṭheta /
SA16hvsatssu:16820: (pṛ) sūtra uktamnirodhasamāpattervyutthitaṃ cittaṃ prathamaṃ trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti- aniñjyaḥ [sparśaḥ] animittaḥ [sparśaḥ] apraṇihitaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16822: (u) asaṃskṛtālambane citte vidyamānaḥ sparśaḥ aniñjyaḥ animittaḥ apraṇihita iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:16828: ata ucyate vyutthāne trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16833: yogāvacara etatsamāpattisamīpsayā prathamata eva sarvān saṃskārān paribhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16837: sūtra uktam- [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyamānasya bhikṣornaivaṃ bhavati] ahaṃ [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhaṃ samāpadye iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16845: ataḥ sūtramāha [atha khalvasya] pūrvameva tathācittaṃ bhāvitaṃ bhāvati [yat tat tathātvāya] upanayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16847: tadā asaṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayitvā kamupakāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16848: (u) dīrghakālaṃ bhāvitatvāt samāpattidārḍhye jñānadarśanaṃ suniścitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16849: yathā saṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ paśyato 'pi nāsti kṣaṇikādanyat /
SA16hvsatssu:16855: yogāvacaraḥ parīttanimittaṃ gṛhītavān adhimuktibalena tat vipulayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16869: (u) dīrghakālaṃ tat bhāvayan sadā pṛthivīnimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16871: (pṛ) yoginā dṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivīnimittaṃ dravyataḥ pṛthivī na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:16872: (u) adhimuktibalāt darśane pṛthivī bhavati na dravyato bhavati pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:16873: (pṛ) nirmāṇabalāt bhūyamānaṃ nirmitamapi kiṃ na dravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:16874: (u) nirmitaṃ samādhibalātsiddhamityataḥ kṛtakaṃ vastu yaduta prabhā aptejādi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:16875: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- aṣṭakṛtsnāyatanāni caturthadhyānamātre vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16877: (u) yadi vartanta kāmadhātau triṣu dhyāneṣu ca ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16878: antime dve kṛtsnāyatane pratyekaṃ svabhūmau bhavetām /
SA16hvsatssu:16882: (u) yogī adhimuktyā ca cakṣuḥśrotrādyākāśalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16885: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- sarvapṛthivīsamādhiṃ samāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati- ahameva pṛthivī,
SA16hvsatssu:16901: (pṛ) vastuto nāsti khalu sarvaṃ pṛthivī ityādīni /
SA16hvsatssu:16914: vedanādi ca cittasya prabheda iti pratipāditameva pūrvam /
SA16hvsatssu:16915: kiñca yogī na paśyati vedanādi sarvatra vyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:16939: yathā tīrthikānāṃ sūtramāha- triṇāciketasya kartā śāśvate pade jāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16941: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane 'pyuktam śakro devānāmindraḥ kratuśataṃ kṛtvā punaḥ patatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16942: uktañca gāthāyām- śakrādayaḥ śatasahasrādhikānāṃ kratūnāmanuṣṭhātāro 'nityāḥ kṣīyanta itri /
SA16hvsatssu:16959: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyuktam- brahmā sahāṃpatirapi guṇānāṃ [prakarṣāya] sadā kratuṃ yajamāno vrataṃ dhatte iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16962: śrūyate ca bhavatāṃ granthe vacanam- asti brahmaṇaḥ [sahāṃ] patermaithunarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16963: sati ca tasmin dveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśā avaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16965: evaṃ pāpī kathaṃ nityaṃ vimokṣaṃ pratilabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:16966: na ca sarva ṛṣayo devān yajante /
SA16hvsatssu:16976: śīlasamādhiprajñādyapramāṇaguṇasampannā mahānto dīpaṅkarabuddhādayaḥ pratyekabuddhā mahāsammatādayaḥ kalpādyā rājānaḥ sarve 'pyanityāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16980_0: yathoktaṃ gomayapiṇḍisūtre- atha khalu bhagavān parīttaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā
SA16hvsatssu:16980_1: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- nāsti kiñcidīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ [yat rūpaṃ] nityaṃ dhruvaṃ [śāśvataṃ]
SA16hvsatssu:16981: asminneva sūtre punarvistaraśa uktam- śakrabrahmacakravartirājānāṃ [ye] phalavipākāḥ [te sarve] 'pi atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17004: sukhavedināṃ sadā saṃvāsaṃ priyaṃ vā vastutastu vidvān sarvathā vimuktimeva prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:17005: ato jñāyate samudayadharma na nityaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:17006: atha punarvaktavyaṃ samudayadharma sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ muhūrtamapi na tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:17010: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
SA16hvsatssu:17015: yathā kaścit subhikṣakālo na dīrgha iti budhyan maithunarāga āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17016: kusumaṃ nāticiraṃ navaṃ bhavatīti jānan sukhāyāśu tadupabhuṅkte /
SA16hvsatssu:17017: parasya [dayitājanasya] surūpaṃ na nityaṃ bhavatīti jānan maithunarāgaṃ drutataraṃ vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17021: yāvattiryañcaḥ anityamiti jānanto 'pi na kleśān bhindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17030: so 'nātmā ityanityamanātma ca bhāvayato yogino nātmabuddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17033: anityasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan svaparakāyaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ maraṇa[dharma] ca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17038: yathā kaścidvālakaḥ śūnye hastaḥ tuccha iti jñātvaiva na [tatra]saṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17040: yathā kaścit bhaṅguratvāt bhājane na pramudyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17041: yathāpi ca kācinnārī amukasya puruṣasyāyurna saptadinānyeṣyatīti śrutvā [vadati] satsvapi subhikṣakālārjavabahumānadhanaprabhāvabaleṣu ko vā prīyeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17048: tadā sa bāhyaṃ vastvanityaṃ paśyan śocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17052: vidvāṃstu duḥkhahetau sthita eva na duḥkhaṃ nirodhyamiti jñātvā tyajati duḥkhahetuṃ yaduta pañcaskandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:17053: ayaṃ yogī ābhyantaraskandhān paribhettuṃ anātmasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:17055: anātmapratilābhī kiṃ punaḥ prārthayīta anityasajñyapi na kiñcitprārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:17058: ata uktaṃ sūtre- ekāgreṇa cittena pañcaskandhānanityān bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:17059: ya ādhyātmikān skandhān aparibhidya bahirdhā vastu anityaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17064: eṣāṃ satyapi anityajñāne na sādhubhāvanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17073: ata ucyate- ekāgracittena anityamiti samyambhāvanā kleśān vināśayati / iti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17075: sati tattvajñāne na bhavanti kāmādayaḥ kleśāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17086: dharmā anityā iti jñānānna moha utyadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17094: pratyutpanne vastuto duḥkhaṃ yadasiśastrādi tad duḥkhaduḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:17097: śūnyānātmajñānalābhino yaccittaṃ bhavati saṃskṛtadharmāḥ sarve viheṭhanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17103: na hi duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayitā kāmaprītiṃ sevate /
SA16hvsatssu:17107: dharmā anityā anātmakā api na duḥkhajanakāḥ tadā naiva tyājyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17110: sarve sattvā atitarāṃ bhītā bhavanti yadidaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:17111: yadi taruṇo vṛddho vā pāmaraḥ paṇḍito vā āḍhyo daridro vā jānāti idaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:17113: sarve yogacāriṇaḥ puruṣā nirvāṇe śāntopaśamasaṃjñotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17120: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat rūpaṇamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma,
SA16hvsatssu:17126: ato bhagavānāha- ye duḥkhaṃ budhyanti teṣāmahaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ vyākaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17133: anayā saṃjñayā ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsāre yātāyātānāṃ mānasaṃ kliśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17143: duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayato mano na catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu sukhaṃ viharati sarvatra duḥkhadarśitvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:17144: yathā mugdhāḥ śalabhāḥ sukhasaṃjñayā pradīpe patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17156: yogī sarve dharma bhaṅgavipariṇāmalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17157: yasmin rūpe āttmatayābhiniviśate idaṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharma /
SA16hvsatssu:17160: yathā kaścit girinirjharānuvāhito yatkiñcidavalambya tadvihāya mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17166: pṛthagjanā ātmasaṃjñayā paramārthato duḥkhe na duḥkhaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17167: anātmasaṃjñayā tu atyalpe 'pi duḥkhe tadupaghātaṃ budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17181: nāstyātmātmīyamiti cintayato dharmeṣu vinaṣṭheṣu na duḥkhamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17185: idaṃ vastu ātmano hitamityataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17188: ahamāyuṣo 'nte kariṣyāmi na kariṣyāmiti dṛṣṭivicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17192: cittaviśuddhyā ca kāñcanaṃ loṣṭaṃ candanamasidhārāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nindāñca samaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17206: svakāye puruṣasaṃjñāṃ parakāye ca strīsaṃjñāmutpādya [tatra] abhiniviśate /
SA16hvsatssu:17218: kāmadhātau yāni santi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tāni annapāna maithunarāgaṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17221: yathā kalpādau sattvāḥ svargādāgatya loke 'smin upapādukā abhūvan /
SA16hvsatssu:17224: evaṃ krameṇa jarāvyādhimaraṇaśālinaḥ yāvadvatsaraśataṃ bhūyasā duḥkhaiḥ pīḍitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17225: āhārābhiniveśavaśāt sarve te tādṛśemyaḥ phalemyaḥ praṇaṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17229: tebhyo 'kuśalaṃ karma kurvanti akuśalakarmataḥ trīn doṣān vardhayitvā devamanuṣyāṇāmapakurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17230: tasmāt sarvāḥ kleśavipattaya āhārakāmāt bhavanti jarāvyādhimaraṇalakṣaṇāni annapānādhīnāni /
SA16hvsatssu:17234: yadi vā bālo vṛddho gṛhasthaḥ pravrajito vā anāhārapīḍito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17245: ye samucchinnāhārāḥ teṣāṃ kleśā na kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:17254: dantena carvitaṃ lālayā siktaṃ liṅgaṃ vāntavadāmāśayapatitaṃ kāyasya hitakaram /
SA16hvsatssu:17257: yadi kaścinmadhuramāhāraṃ labhamāno 'pi punarvāntaṃ na bhunakti /
SA16hvsatssu:17265: yathoktaṃ karmavarge- yastarṣito mriyate sa jalakrimibhāvenotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17277: ayañca yogī bhāvayati prītiviviktaṃ samādhiṃ tadyathā anātmasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāmāhāre pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ maraṇasaṃjñām /
SA16hvsatssu:17289: pratyutpanno daridro na pratyayopalabhyanirgama iti prajānānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17293: yathoktaṃ sūtre- alpatarāḥ susthāna utpadyante bahutarā dusthāna utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:17296: puruṣo 'yaṃ paśyati kāmādayo doṣāḥ kleśāssadā santānamanuvartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17302: sa cettu pāpakaṃ karma kariṣyati karoṣi vā /
SA16hvsatssu:17310: tadyathā āśīviṣakaraṇḍaḥ pañcokṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ śūnye grāme coraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17313: tadyathā lavaṇatiktatṛṣṇānadīvāhitaḥ pañcakāmaguṇaviṣaśalya [viddhaḥ] avidyāndhakārāṅgārakarṣau [patitastādṛśāni] duḥkhāni sattvānanuvartante /
SA16hvsatssu:17316: kasmāt, [yasmāt] pratidīnaṃ lokaistūyamānā vanaṣaṇḍaprasūtasphītaphalasamṛddhiśālino ['pi] bhūpā na dīrghakālasukhalābhino dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:17322: tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayatā kṣipraṃ mokṣo labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17326: asya ca citte na kleśā udbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17335: (u) yogī paśyati kāyasya bījamaśubhaṃ yaduta mātāpitoraśucimārgajaśukraśoṇitasaṅghātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17337: upapattisthānañcāśuci yaduta mātuḥ kukṣau paripūrṇamaśuci bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17341: annaṃ pānaṃ vastraṃ puruṣakāyagataṃ parīhitaṃ sarvaṃmaśuci bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17354: aśucilūkṣāmakṣikāmaśakādayaḥ sarvā aśucikrimayaḥ sarvadāgatya kāyaṃ spṛśantītyaścāśuciḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17366: asmin kāye tu śatasahasradhā krimayaḥ sadā jāyante mriyante ca /
SA16hvsatssu:17375: surabhikusumagandhamālālaṅkṛto 'yaṃ kāyaḥ iti veditavyaṃ kāyo 'yaṃ svabhāvato 'śuciriti /
SA16hvsatssu:17390: samantato 'yaṃ kāyaḥ sadā aśuci nissārayati yaduta navarandhrāṇi aśucidvārāṇi romakūpeṣu ca naikamasti śuci /
SA16hvsatssu:17397: ayaṃ hi kāyo durgandhamalairaśuciścarmāvṛtatvātparaṃ na jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17408: yathoktaṃ sūtre- asti vṛkṣe viśuddhatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17411: evaṃ vinīlakalohitakādilakṣaṇaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhāvayato 'śubha[saṃjñā] sampūrṇā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17424: maraṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ svasya hitaṃ bhavati yaduta cittaikāgryeṇa kuśaladharmāṇāmupacayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17425: (SSS_442) laukikāḥ sattvā bhūyasā parihitābhiratā svahitaṃ tyajantyeva /
SA16hvsatssu:17428: ājavañjavamanughāvatāṃ hi lokānāṃ sadā maraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17438: mṛṇmayo 'yaṃ ghaṭo yadi [samyak] prayogapālitaḥ kadācit ciraṃ tiṣṭhet /
SA16hvsatssu:17439: ayaṃ kāyastu ciratamaṃ tiṣṭhamāno na vatsaraśatamatikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:17442: saṃkṣepataḥ sarve sattvā asattvāśca kāyasya paripanthino dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17444: kiñca yogī paśyati kāyaḥ kṣaṇikanityo vipariṇāmalakṣaṇo naikaṃ kṣaṇamapyārakṣya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17446: yogī dṛṣṭadharme ca paśyati bālyayauvanavārdhakyāni savyādhīni nirvyādhīni vā na maraṇaparihārīṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:17457: na sāntvavacanenollāpanīyaṃ dhanenānuneyaṃ vigraheṇa vā mocanīyam /
SA16hvsatssu:17458: yathā mahati śaile caturbhyo digbhya āgate nāsti palāyanasthānam /
SA16hvsatssu:17463: kevalaṃ parāmṛśati kiṃ kuśalacārī kiṃ vākuśalacārīti /
SA16hvsatssu:17465: ato yogī kāyo 'niśrayo 'śaraṇo maraṇavartmagata iti paśyan maraṇasaṃjñāmanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:17466: kiñca yogī sadā paśyati kāyo 'yaṃ jarāvyādhiparipīḍito 'dhruvasvabhāvaḥ pratikṣaṇamutpannavināśī (SSS_443)
SA16hvsatssu:17468: kiñcāyaṃ yogī paśyati maraṇaṃ niyataṃ jīvitamaniyatam /
SA16hvsatssu:17478: uktañca sūtre- maraṇaṃ nāma mahātāmastram araśmikamarakṣaṇam asahāyakamanupasthāpakaṃ paramabhayasthānaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17481: traidhātuke sarvasyāsti maraṇaṃ na tathā jarā vyādhiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:17495: yathā caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣūktam- utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya [chandaṃ janayati vyāyamati]vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:17497: ime ca pāpakā akuśalā dharmā narakādiduḥkhakleśānāṃ pratyayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17505: (pṛ) imāṃ prahāṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan kiṃ hitaṃ vidante /
SA16hvsatssu:17506: (u) tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan sadā na pāpakān dharmānanuvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:17510: kleśaprahāṇābhirati dharmacī varasaṃvṛtaliṅgasya pravrajitasya hitam tayā nocet svakāyameva manyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:17520: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmarāgasya prahāṇāt pañcaskandhāḥ prahīyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17529: uktañca sūtre- trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17530: yaducyate prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāva iti tadarhata eva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17532: yaducyate nirodhasvabhāva iti tadāyuṣo 'nte jīvitavyapagame prahīṇasantānasya /
SA16hvsatssu:17535: yadabhihitaṃ prahāṇamiti tat avidyāṃ prajahātīti prajñā vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17536: yadvirāga iti tat tṛṣṇāṃ vivarjayatīti ceto vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17544: yāvannirodhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati sa kṛtasarvakṛtyo niruddhasarvakleśaḥ prahīṇaskandhasaṃyojanasantatirnirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇaṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17547: (pṛ) pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā- mārgasatyaṃ [dvividhaṃ] yat samādhiḥ tatpariṣkāraśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:17550: yasmāt sati samādhipariṣkāre samādhiḥ sidhyati na tvasati /
SA16hvsatssu:17566: mṛṣāvāda piśunavācā paruṣavācā sampralāpa itīme catvāri vācikakarmāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:17570: tathā hi tadyathā suvarṇakāraḥ pūrvaṃ sthūlamalamapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17580: imāṃ samāṃ bhūmiṃ vyavasthāpya catvāri satyāni paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17586: pūrva śīlabhedāpattiṃ śīlasamādānahitañca pratisaṃkhyayā vicārya śīlaṃ samādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:17594: tathā kleśavyādhicikitsāyā asati śīle na sampadyata auṣadham /
SA16hvsatssu:17604: pariśuddhaśīlo na vikṣipatītyato niyamena nirvāṇamadhigacchati gaṅgāsrotasi dāruskandhavat /
SA16hvsatssu:17614: yathā pārarahite kṣetre jalaṃ na tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:17625: tathāgatamārgārthī mahākaruṇācittena sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte na śīlalakṣaṇaṃ samādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:17629: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvau khalvāyuṣman pratyayau samyakdṛṣṭerutpādāya parato ghoṣo yoniśo manaskāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17632: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- [anyataro] 'rhan bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati sma ekānte niṣaṇṇasya mama evamabhavat- abhisambodhisampadā tu mārgapratilābhasya vikalaḥ pratyaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17634: maivaṃ vocaḥ yābhisaṃbodhiḥ sā tu mārgasya pratilābhasya sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17636: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇāḥ sattvā ātmano 'bhisambodhiṃ labhamānā hi jātijarāvyādhimaraṇebhyo vimucyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17638: tadyathā sālavṛkṣo himavantamupādāya pañca vastūni vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17645: tadaiva smṛtirudapādi pratilabdho mayā dharmaḥ yamupādāyābhisambuddhaḥ tameva dharmamupaniśrayiṣya iti /

SA16hvsatssu:18501: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mamaudārikaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ cittasya dūṣaṇamabhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18505: (u) yoginaḥ śūnya tāmanusmarato na prītipramodyaṃ jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18506: asti sattva iti saṃjñayā hi prītiprāmodyaṃ jāyate /

SA16hvsatssu:18515: yogī nirodhalakṣaṇaṃ lābhaṃ paśyatītyato nātapālokādibhiḥ [tasya] prītiprāmodyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18516: ayaṃ yogī upaśamaṃ bhāvayan kleśānāṃ kṣayamicchati /

SA16hvsatssu:18522: tāni sarvāṇi anityaṃ vikṣepakamiti parīkṣya [tāni] nānuvidadhīta /
SA16hvsatssu:18533: na hiṃsāprayogapratyaya ityanusmarato na bhavati bhīrutā /
SA16hvsatssu:18534: yogyayaṃ mārge paramābhirata ityataḥ kāyajīvite 'napekṣo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18557: yathā vā dāntā vīṇāyāstantryo 'tyāyatā vātiśithilā vā ubhayathā na svaraṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18559: yathā bhagavānanuruddhamāha- atyārabdhavīryasya kausīdyaṃ bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18586: punastrividhaṃ samādhau samāpattilakṣaṇaṃ sthitilakṣaṇaṃ vyutthānalakṣaṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18589: yadāha- ahameva samādhimupasampadya viharāmi na tu sa itīdaṃ mānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18590: yadāha- sa evopasampadya viharati nāhamitīdaṃ mānakalpaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18595: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣurekadharmeṇa samanvitaḥ sa na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti /

SA16hvsatssu:18607: yadbhagavānāha- trīṇa dharmānaprahāya na jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ tarati /

SA16hvsatssu:18619: trīn dharmānaprahāya na prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam [katame trayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18621: ahrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ pramādaṃ prahāya prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam /
SA16hvsatssu:18622: [evaṃ] yāvatsatkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ prajahan prajahāti rāgadveṣamohān jarāvyādhimaraṇāni ca tarati /
SA16hvsatssu:18627: muṣitasmṛtyasaṃ prajanyavikṣiptacittānāṃ samuccheda eva yat caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ bhāvanā /
SA16hvsatssu:18632: ahrīkyānapatrāpyapramādānāñca samuccheda eva yat gṛhiṇaḥ pariśuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18634: kasmāt / yat kaścit rahogataḥ pāpakaṃ kṛtvā na lajjate tadāhrīkyam /

SA16hvsatssu:18649: kausīdyāt sajjane 'prīto bhavati yat tattvato nāsti samyak caryāvihārīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18650: saddharmaśravaṇaṃ dviṣan āha samyak caritadharmā mithyādharmāḥ nāsti tataḥ kaścanopakāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18651: cittakaṣāyāt paradoṣaprakaṭane prīta āha- parasya dharmacaryāto matsadṛśaṃ nāsti kiñcilabdhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18660: cittasya mohāt na trīṇi saṃyojanāni samucchedayati /

SA16hvsatssu:18670: saṃkṣipya yāvaccīvarapiṇḍapātādayo dharmāḥ kuśalamūlāpakarṣaḥ akuśalamūlaprakarṣaśca sarvāṇi samādherapakṣālāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18675_0: (pṛ) bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre bhikṣūnāmantryāha- [iha bhikṣuḥ] araṇyagato vāyatanagato
SA16hvsatssu:18675_1: vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā manasi kuryāt dvau dharmau yaduta śamatho vipaśyanāca iti /

SA16hvsatssu:18841: (u) pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu kāyikaṃ karma pratikṣaṇavināśyapi bhāvanāvaśādvibhinnakauśalaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18842: bhāvanāvaśāt ciraṃ punaḥ punaḥ pravartyamānaṃ sat sukaraṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18844: anuvihitāvṛtti āvṛttyā ca praguṇīkṛtaṃ dṛḍhībhūtañca susmaraṇaṃ bhavati yathādhyayanādi /
SA16hvsatssu:18845: mānasaṃ karma ca kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyamiti jñātavyam /

SA16hvsatssu:18860: yathoktaṃsūtre- yogī khalu ayoniśo manasikārāt kāmādīnāsravānanutpannānutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18864: tadyathā bījādaṅkuramaṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāḷaṃ nāḷāt patraṃ patrātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti pratyakṣato hetuto 'nupūrvaṃ vivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:18866: pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ khalu vāsitatilasya gandhaḥ saṃṅgkrātyā vardhata iti /

SA16hvsatssu:18878: svarūpata eva sadāsthitasya bhāvanayā ka upakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18888: ato 'prāptaṃ na bhāvyata iti tava vacanaṃ na dūṣaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18889: pratyakṣato dṛśyate ca hetuphalayorayaugapadye 'pi bhavatyeva hetoḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18892: evaṃ prajñā pūrvacitaṃ bhāvayati tadūrdhvacittamupacitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18905: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtra uktaṃ- agnisaṃyogādaṇuṣu kṛṣṇavarṇe niruddhe raktavarṇaṃ jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18908: yadyādāvagnisaṃyuktadharmasya raktavarṇamutpadyata iti punaḥ paścādagnisaṃyuktadharmaḥ kimartham /
SA16hvsatssu:18913: yadi bhavatāmabhisandhiḥ raktavarṇaṃ kramaśo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18916: sarve dharmā sahetusapratyayā api kramaśo jāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:18918: evaṃ prajñāsamādhyādayo dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā api avaramadhyottamadharmakrameṇa jāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:18920: yathā pakṣacchadasyoṣmaṇi mṛdunyapi aṇḍaṃ kramaśo vikriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18933: yathā bahubhiḥ puṣpairekasmin samaye tilaṃ vāsayati na yathā puṣpālpāni kramaśaściraṃ vāsayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18934: medasā paripuṣṭiḥ jale [naukā] nimajjanaṃ bhittinirmāṇaṃ ityādirapi tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:18938: bālakādīnāṃ śarīraṃ stanyapānādinā paripacyata itīdamapi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:18939: ato jñāyate dharmabhāvanā sūkṣmā praṇītā duravabodhā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:18948: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kuśaladharmeṣu na bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kuśaladharmānanupādāya kevalaṃ praṇidadhāti āsravebhyaścittavimokam /
SA16hvsatssu:18957: kintu pariśuddhatailaṃ pariśuddhavartikāñcobhayamapekṣya [anya]vastusaṃsparśacāñcalyarāhitye ca tatprakāśaḥ pariśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18960: nāpi ca praṇidhānamātrāt deho rūpaṃ balañca labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:18964: ko jñānī hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyata iti prajānan taddhetumupekṣya anyasmātphalamākāṃkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:18966: dharma bhāvayan dṛṣṭa eva phalavipākaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:18967: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tiṣṭhantu saptadināni mayā śāsitāḥ śrāvakā muhūrtaṃ tāvatkuśaladharmaṃ bhāvayanto 'pramāṇavarṣeṣu nityaṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18968: bhikṣuṇyo bhadantamānandamavocan- vayaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantyaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18969: sūtre ca bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- aśaṭhasya māmupasaṅkramato yanmayā prātarupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ tadartha sāyaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:18970: yat sāyamupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ prātastaddhitaṃ vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18971: yaccārhanmārgaṃ spṛśati na tat parapudgalaḥ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:18974: anuttaraṃ buddhamārga eva nanu kuśaladharmasyopacitabhāvanayā spṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:18975: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- dvau dharmau niśrityāhamanuttaraṃ mārgaṃ samāpannaḥ yat śubhābhiratāvanirvedo mārgabhāvanāyāmaklāntiśca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18990: yogī sucaritacaryāyā asti phalavipāka ityanusmṛtya alabhamāno 'pi na viṣādaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:18991: kiñca yogī manasi kuryāt- mayā bhāvanāyāḥ phalavipāko 'nuprāpta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:18997_1: vimuktāvapi cādhimuktatā abhyāgatasambuddhitā ityetaiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanvitaḥ kathaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:19000: (SSS_484) kleśānāṃ prahāṇamatisūkṣmaṃ dūravabodhaṃ vāśījaṭāyāṃ kramaśaḥ kṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:19003: ato jñāyate kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ vīryamuttamaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19004: alpīyasī prajñāpi kleśān vināśayati yathā alpīyān prakāśo 'ndhakāramapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19011: yogī samanucintayet samādhisamāpattiratikṛcchrā yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ puṇyena prajñayā ca ghaniṣṭhaḥ ṣaṭvarṣāṇi vyavasyan ante 'nuprāptaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19026: sadā kuśalasya bhāvayitā dṛṣṭa eva kāyena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ spṛśet /
SA16hvsatssu:19027: yadi vā maraṇakāle spṛśet yadi vā āyuṣo 'nte susthāna upapadya tadantarā spṛśet /
SA16hvsatssu:19029: yogī adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ vīralakṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtyaivaṃ cintayati ahaṃ kleśāvaraṇamaparyādāya na kadācidvṛthā pratinivarta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19030: kiñca yogī mānacittamāśrityaivaṃ cintayati- śraddhādīni kuśalendriyāṇi santīti anye samādhiṃ pratipadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19033: yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ arāḍādibhyo munibhyo dharmaṃ śrutvaivamacintayat ime śraddhādikuśalendriyatvāt dharmamanuprāpnuvan /
SA16hvsatssu:19035: yogī prajānāti- kleśā durbalāḥ prajñā balavatī /
SA16hvsatssu:19037: yathoktaṃ- bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato mukhamārutena himavantaṃ [parvatarājamapi] pradalayet /
SA16hvsatssu:19040: kiñca yogī cintayati- ahaṃ pūrvādhvani na samādhiṃ bhāvitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:19046: api ca yogī cintayati- yadyahaṃ sadā vīryamārabhe yadi cānanuprāptamanuprāpnomi /
SA16hvsatssu:19054: prajñāptau prajñeti saṃjñā na tu jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:19057: āryaśrāvakāḥ prajñāsinā saṃyojanānubaddhān anuśayaparyavanaddhān sarvān kleśān samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19065: yathoktaṃ sūtra- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19069: prajñayā yaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedaḥ [sa eva] saṃjñayetyucyate /

SA16hvsatssu:19571: bhagavānāha- rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19573: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19575: satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti- ayamātmā nityo vānityo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:19596: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19602: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:19604: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19605: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19607: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:19609: bhagavacchāsane ca vaiśāradyabalamanuprāpya phale supratitiṣṭhati / iti //
SA16hvsatssu:19615: āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:19625: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19630: (u) yat bhavānāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19634: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19647: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:19650: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19655: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19666: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19668: kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto 'pi sattvākhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19669: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate /
SA16hvsatssu:19672: tasmin dharme niruddhe 'pi tatsaṃjñānusmaraṇamutpādya [taṃ dharmaṃ] vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19673: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19674: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate /
SA16hvsatssu:19686: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti- idaṃ vastu tathā syāt,
SA16hvsatssu:19688: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19689: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:19692: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19700: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19704: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam /
SA16hvsatssu:19708: bhavānavādīḥ- dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19710: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte 'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:19712: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19714: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19715: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19716: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19720: tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam- atha nirvindate duḥkha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19737: bhagavānāha- sādhu sādhu khalu bhikṣava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19739_1: vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre 'ntike vā sarvaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:19740: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19745: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19746: kiñcāha bhagavān- atra niṣaṇṇaḥ kaścinmūḍho 'vidyāṇḍagato 'vidyāndhībhūtaḥ parityajya buddhaśāsanamimāṃ mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati- yadi rūpaṃ nātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:19751: kathamanātmā karma kṛtvā ātmanā anubhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19753: sūtre ca anātmajñānaṃ sarvadharmanālambata iti vacanasthānaṃ na kiñcanāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:19758: āha ca- daśa śūnyatāḥ sarvadharmālambanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19764: sarve dharmā anātmāna ityuktatvāt jñātavyaṃ yat saṃskārā iti vacanaṃ tat saṃskṛtābhidhāyakam /
SA16hvsatssu:19765: yat dharmā iti vacanaṃ tat sarvā[bhidhāyaka]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:19766: āha ca- ka ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānāti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ (SSS_504) paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19767: kevalaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samyak sambuddhā vimuktilābhina ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānanti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19772: sarvasaṅgrāhakamiti yathā bhagavānāha- aśaṃ sarvajña iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19776: yathā ca tathāgatavarge uktam- tathāgataḥ sarvatyāgī sarvajayī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19786: bhikṣurayaṃ sāmānyena sarve dharmā anityā iti prajānātītyataḥ sarvajño bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19810: ato jñāyate sarvamanātmeti vacane satyapi pañcopādānaskandhāna[bhisandhāya] uktaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:19819: (pṛ) laukikī śūnyatā sarvadharmānālambate na tu anāsravaśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:19822: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi dharmamudrāsūtre- śūnyatā laukikī śūnyateti /
SA16hvsatssu:19823: (u) iyaṃ lokottaraśūnyatā na tu laukikī śūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:19824: (pṛ) atroktaṃ jñānadarśanasyāviśuddhatvāt jñāyata iyaṃ laukikī śūnyateti /
SA16hvsatssu:19827: paścānnirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā abhimānaṃ vihāya jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19829: yadbhavānāha- sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19830: evaṃ hi syāt- yogī yadā nairātmyasaṃjñāsamanvitaḥ tadā dharmasaṃjñāsamanvitatvāt nairātmye dharma iti sa saṃjñocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19831: yathoktaṃ darśanavarge- yo duḥkhaṃ na paśyati,
SA16hvsatssu:19837: ataḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti vacanaṃ duḥkhasatyamātramālambya anātmā saṃskāra ityabhidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19842: asti dvividho vihāraḥ śūnyavihāra anātmavihāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19843: pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ śūnyavihāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19846: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ niskhabhāvaṃ paśyati [yāvat] vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ niḥskhabhāvaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19848: ato jñāyate rūpasvabhāvo na vastusan yāvadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvā na vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19849: api (SSS_506) coktaṃ sūtre- pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyāvat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19856: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19863: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mṛṣā nāma yat tucchakam /
SA16hvsatssu:19865: nirodhaḥ sa niyataṃ yathābhūta ityataḥ paramārthasan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19866: (pṛ) yadbhavatoktaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ [śūnyavihāra] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19870: sūtra uktam- yaḥ sattvaṃ paśyati sa pañcopādānaskandhān paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19872: ato jñāyate anāsravān skandhānupādāyāpi sattva ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19881: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtatṛṣṇāsaṃyojanayā pratibaddho mūḍha imaṃ kāyamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:19886: (u) sarve skandhā upādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19889: skandhā upādānaskandhaiḥ sahopādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityabhidhīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19895: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ paśyati śūnyamanātmā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānañca paśyati śūnyamanātmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19903: (u) yogī sattvakāraṇe na sattvaṃ paśyatītyata eva śūnyacittamutpādya tataḥ śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19904: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhe ca na paśyati rūpasvabhāvaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:19918: pañcavijñānasamprayuktā ca prajñā jñānameva ca darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:19925: uktañca sūtre- yat dharmeṣu dharmān parīttaṃ prajñayā vipaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19929: prathamā cānāsravā prajñā prāthamikaṃ darśanaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19942: parīttavacane ca kevalamuktaṃ vipaśyanā kṣāntiriti na jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:19944: yadi manyase yogino jñānavata eva kṣāntirbhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19946: uktañca sūtre- [evaṃ] jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19948: kiñca bhagavānāha- duḥkhajñānaṃ samudaya[jñānaṃ] nirodha[jñānaṃ] mārgajñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19951: bhagavān vimuktyarthamāha- yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti jñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19955: na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19970: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19971: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19975: (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19977: (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19981: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:19982: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19984: yaduta sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayo 'rhataścitte samutpadyata ityata[stata] samyag jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20004: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:20007: bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20017: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:20024: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20025: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20027: (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:20028: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:20030: (pṛ) uktaṃ nanu sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20032: (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20045: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rāhulo bhikṣurvimuktiprāpiṇīṃ prajñāṃ sampādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20046: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20047: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:20048: yathocyate- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthagatiṃ cintayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20050: api cāha- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ cintayan sadā pratipadamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20053: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve /
SA16hvsatssu:20055: kiñcoktaṃ saptasamyagjñānasūtre- yat bhikṣu dharmaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:20066: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trīṇyāyudhāni śrutāyudhaṃ vivekāyudhaṃ prajñāyudhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20099: api coktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20100: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā /
SA16hvsatssu:20103: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ (SSS_512)
SA16hvsatssu:20112: tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20114: śrutvā yat pratisañcikṣati- sambādho gṛhāvāso 'bhyavakāśā pravrajyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:20127: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:20135: evamādinā tatra tatra sūtre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:20140: yathā hastaka upāsako 'tapyaddeveṣūpapadya tatra dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20147: (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:20148: (pṛ) na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:20149: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti /
SA16hvsatssu:20153: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20159: (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:20160: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20165: yadi nāsti, vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:20169: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20174: yayoktaṃ sūtre- cittasamādhānaṃ mārgaḥ cittavikṣepo 'mārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20187: (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:20192: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20193: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20208: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20209: [katamau dvau] bhikṣuśca kṣīṇāsravo rājā ca cakravartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20219: vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20225: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20229: ato [yat]bhavatoktaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ kṣīṇakleśo 'pi punarutpadyata ityato na kṣīṇa[kleśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20231: bhavānapyāha- pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20233: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām
SA16hvsatssu:20237: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20241: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20244: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20249: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20259: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20263: susīmasūtre coktam- pūrvaṃ khalu dharmasthitijñānaṃ pañcānnirvāṇajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20265: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20282: uktañca sūtre- yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno 'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20288: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:20304: yadbhavatoktaṃ- śubhaṃ praṇītaṃ pramodamupaśamarasañca pratilabhamāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20312: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha- bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:20326: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /

SA16hvsatssu:21085: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:21092: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti /
SA16hvsatssu:21094: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti- īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:21096: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha- dharmo 'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:21104: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:21113: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:21125: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- saptasaptatijñānāni yaduta jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti [jñānam] /
SA16hvsatssu:21134: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ- jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:21137: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti- laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:21148: (u) pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:21149: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo 'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:21157: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:21159: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:21176: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam //
